title: OtterAI Transcribe Voice Notes
description:
Never take team meeting or lecture notes again. Get an AI meeting assistant that records audio, takes notes, voice memos, automatically captures slides, and transcribes voice summaries. Show live caption in real time. Great for in-person recordings and online meetings. Also available on the web. English, Spanish, French only.

Condense a 1 hour meeting into 30 seconds. Otter transcribes all your meetings, interviews, lectures, and everyday voice conversations in real time. Get automated notes for in-person, Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams. 

KEY FEATURES
★ AI chat: get answers, write emails
★ AI meeting note taker & real-time AI transcription
★ Audio recorder 
★ Transcribe notes live
★ Automated meeting note taker, voice memos & summarizer
★ AI Channels: Instant chat on various channels
★ Share & collaborate 
★ All notes are searchable & shareable 
★ Edit & highlight
★ Organize & export
★ Import & sync

Many Uses
★ Save time - automatic note taking
★ Keep team in sync - share notes and action items 
★ Record and transcribe interviews, lectures, podcasts, videos, webinars, keynotes
★ Provide live captioning to anyone with accessibility needs

Record & Transcribe Live
★ Record instantly in one tap, with widget and shortcut 
★ Transcribe in real time (when online) with high accuracy
★ Automatic note taking
★ Highlight the key points to review later
★ Insert photos of whiteboard discussions, slides, etc.
★ Scroll back to grab a quote or revisit a point
★ Input audio via built-in mic or Bluetooth device

Enrich Notes with AI
★ AI meeting note taker 
★ Punctuate, capitalize, and break paragraphs automatically
★ Identify speakers (after some training)
★ Automated Slide Capture during virtual team meetings
★ Automated Summarizer after all team meetings

Share & Collaborate
★ Start a meeting recording inside a group to share the transcript live
★ Invite workplace team members to view, edit, and highlight collaboratively. All highlights are captured in the Takeaways panel.
★ Within the Takeaways panel, add comments & assign action items.
★ Share externally via links

Search & Playback
★ Search the text so you don't have to scrub through the whole audio
★ Playback at adjustable speeds
★ Follow along the highlighted word as the audio is playing
★ Tap on any word to jump the audio to that spot

Edit & Highlight
★ Edit the text to correct any errors
★ Tag the speakers to label the paragraphs and train Otter to identify meeting speakers 
★ Highlight sentences in one tap

Organize & Export
★ Organize your conversations and notes into personal folders
★ Copy to clipboard, or share directly into other apps
★ Export text as PDF, TXT, or SRT
★ Export audio as MP3

Import & Sync
★ Import audio (aac, m4a, mp3, wav, wma) and video (avi, mov, mp4, mpg, wmv)
★ Upload from Call Recorder - ACR or other call recording apps
★ Sync with your calendars to get reminders to record your teams meeting and auto-title your notes
★ Import your contacts so it's easier to share
★ Automatically back up your data to Otter’s cloud & access securely from any device

Otter Pro
★ Bulk export
★ More playback speeds and skip silence

Requirements
※ Android 6.0 & up
※ Internet connection for transcribing
※ Account creation. See our Terms of Service: otter.ai/terms-of-service

We take security and privacy very seriously. Your data is confidential with Otter. We do not sell or share your data with 3rd parties. You have full control to delete your data permanently. Learn more at https://otter.ai/privacy

Contact Us
▶ Support: https://help.otter.ai
▶ Facebook: @OtterAI
▶ LinkedIn: Otter.ai
▶ X (Twitter): @otter_ai
▶ Web: otter.ai

title: Turbo AI - Notetaker
description:
Turbolearn AI is now Turbo AI! We've rebranded and upgraded our AI-powered platform to transform audio, video, and text into exceptional study materials—generating high-quality notes, quizzes, flashcards, and podcasts instantly.

Turbo's advanced AI creates engaging notes featuring tables, emojis, diagrams, and equations, all synced seamlessly across our app and website (http://www.turbo.ai). Enhance your learning experience by chatting directly with your notes to extract deeper insights.

Students and professionals alike use Turbo AI for lecture notes, meeting summaries, journaling, and more.

Key Features:
- Rich Notes: Beautifully formatted notes with diagrams, equations, tables, and emojis.
- Quiz Questions: Instantly create amazing quiz questions from your notes.
- Flashcards: Effortlessly generate effective flashcards for quick review.
- Podcasts: Turn lengthy content into engaging, easy-to-follow podcasts.
- Folders: Easily organize notes into customizable folders for better management.
- Real-Time Sync: Sync notes across devices with instant updates.

Turbo AI is the better alternative to Coconote, Wave AI, Mindgrasp, and Study Fetch. 

Questions or ideas? Reach out to us at contact@turbolearn.ai :)

Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

title: Smart Noter - AI Note Taker
description:
Never Miss a Word: The AI Note Taker That Records Anything You Want.

Stop typing and start engaging with Smart Noter, the ultimate AI meeting recorder and speech to text converter. As an intelligent note taker, it captures every nuance of your conversations instantly. Whether you are leading a business meeting, capturing a lecture, or dictating a memo, our accurate audio to text technology ensures you never lose a thought.

Unlock the power of automated note taking. Smart Noter is not just a recording app; it is your personal meeting assistant. Seamlessly record meetings, transcribe voice or video to text, and generate summaries with a single tap.

Why Professionals Choose Smart Noter?

1. Flawless Speech to Text

Experience industry-leading accuracy. Our powerful speech recognition engine handles continuous speech with precision. Use it to transcribe audio from interviews, podcasts, or voice notes in real-time. It is the definitive transcriber for anyone who values clarity and accuracy over manual typing.

2. The Ultimate Meeting Recorder

Transform how you manage business. Smart Noter creates detailed AI meeting notes automatically. Simply record meetings, and the app will generate word-for-word transcripts and meeting minutes. It acts as a dedicated note taker, allowing you to focus on the dialogue while we handle the documentation.

3. Professional Dictation Tool

Your voice is your fastest tool. Use Smart Noter for seamless dictation of emails, reports, and ideas. Unlike standard voice recorders, we convert your speech patterns into editable text immediately. It is perfect for lawyers, doctors, and executives who need a reliable dictation recorder on the go.

4. Live Voice Translator

Break down language barriers. Our advanced live translation feature allows you to record and translate speech instantly. Whether it is a multi-lingual business meeting or a global conference, use the voice translator to understand and document foreign languages in real-time.

5. Summarize Audio & Video

Stop listening to hours of recordings. Our AI summarizer analyzes your speech transcripts to extract key points and action items. Whether you need to summarize video content or long audio files, Smart Noter provides concise overviews, saving you hours of review time.

6. Import & Transcribe Files

Already have a recording? Easily import files to transcribe audio to text. Our audio converter supports various formats, turning your existing voice memos and recordings into searchable, editable text documents in seconds.

7. Organize & Export

Keep your voice notes organized. Smart Noter is a powerful note organizer that categorizes your recordings. Export your transcribed speech as PDF, TXT, or SRF files. Share meeting notes directly to colleagues or sync them with your favorite productivity tools.

Smart Noter is perfect for:

  • Business Professionals: Generate meeting minutes, record speech, and organize sales calls with AI meeting notes.
  • Journalists: An essential interview recorder that provides instant speech to text for articles.
  • Students: Record lectures and summarize audio for efficient study guides.
  • Legal & Medical: A secure dictation tool for drafting letters and patient notes via speech.
  • Content Creators: Transcribe video to text for subtitles and content repurposing.

Download Smart Noter today. Stop typing. Start doing.

Terms & Conditions: https://static.smartnoter.ai/terms.html Privacy Policy: https://static.smartnoter.ai/privacy.html

title: Summary - AI Note Taker
description:
Summary AI makes meetings more productive by automatically recording, transcribing, and summarizing conversations. Whether it’s a business meeting, interview, classroom lecture, or podcast, Summary AI captures everything clearly so you can stay present and focus.

With one tap, the app records audio, generates accurate transcripts with speaker labels, and creates easy-to-read summaries. You can even ask questions like, “What were the key action items from the marketing strategy session?” and get instant answers, thanks to built-in AI.

Why Use Summary AI?

Take and share professional meeting notes effortlessly

Record and transcribe interviews, lectures, webinars, and podcasts

Generate captions for people with hearing impairments or quiet audio environments

Who Uses Summary AI?

Professionals: Capture meeting notes, action items, and client discussions

Students: Record and review lectures, study groups, and seminars

Journalists & Researchers: Transcribe interviews with precision

Everyone: From voice memos to webinars, it handles it all

Key Features

One-Tap Recording
Start recording instantly and stay focused. Summary AI takes care of the rest.

Unlimited Recording Time
Record as much as you need, no time limits, no interruptions.

Records in the Background or with Screen Locked
Keep recording while your phone is locked or you're using other apps. Perfect for discreet, uninterrupted sessions.

Accurate Transcription with Speaker Labels
Transcripts that make sense, clearly labeled, searchable, and easy to review.

AI-Powered Summaries & Key Points
Don’t just get a transcript, get the big picture with bullet-pointed summaries.

Smart Search & Timestamp Jumping
Type a keyword, jump straight to that moment in the recording.

Ask Questions About the Conversation
Get instant answers from the AI like “Who was assigned the budget review?”

Automatic Punctuation, Capitalization & Line Breaks
Clean, easy-to-read transcripts without any manual formatting.

Boost Your Productivity

Save time reviewing meetings, just skim the summary

Stay present in conversations, not distracted by note-taking

Export notes to PDF, share with teams, or save for personal reference

Never lose a detail, everything is searchable

Your recordings and notes are private, always. Summary AI prioritizes security, and your data is never shared with third parties.

title: Fireflies: AI notetaker
description: Fireflies.ai helps your team transcribe, summarize, search, and analyze voice conversations. Automatically record and transcribe meetings - Transcribe meetings across several video-conferencing apps, dialers, and audio files. - Easily invite Fireflies.ai notetaker to meetings on your calendar. - Fireflies captures video + audio and generates transcripts in minutes. - Integrates with apps like Google Meet, Zoom, Teams, Webex, RingCentral, Aircall, and other platforms. Find anything with AI-powered search - Review a 1-hour meeting in 5 minutes. - With 1 click, see action items, tasks, questions, and other key metrics. - Filter and listen to key topics discussed in your meetings. Collaborate with your co-workers - Create soundbites and easily share the most memorable moments from meetings. - Use AskFred to answer questions, summarize key moments, or create content. - Send meeting notes to your favorite collaboration apps like Slack, Notion, Asana, and more. Analyze meetings using Conversation Intelligence - Track speaker talk time, sentiment, monologues, and other key metrics to coach teammates. - Identify objections, competitors, and other topics that you can customize. - Measure performance and improve your sales, recruiting, and internal processes.
descriptionHTML:
Fireflies.ai helps your team transcribe, summarize, search, and analyze voice conversations.

Automatically record and transcribe meetings
- Transcribe meetings across several video-conferencing apps, dialers, and audio files.

Find anything with AI-powered search

- Filter and listen to key topics discussed in your meetings.

Collaborate with your co-workers

- Use AskFred to answer questions, summarize key moments, or create content.
- Send meeting notes to your favorite collaboration apps like Slack, Notion, Asana, and more.

Analyze meetings using Conversation Intelligence
- Track speaker talk time, sentiment, monologues, and other key metrics to coach teammates.
- Identify objections, competitors, and other topics that you can customize.
- Measure performance and improve your sales, recruiting, and internal processes.

title: Notion: Notes, Tasks, AI
description:
Whether you’re looking to track your personal to-do’s, write and organize class notes, or run project management with a team, Notion is the AI-powered workspace that works your way, for any need. Keep track of your personal and professional goals, take notes about what you care about, and stay organized.

"AI's everything app" — Forbes

Notion is a productivity app where you can write, plan, and organize your notes, projects, tasks and more - all in one place. Ask Notion AI about project updates, upcoming tasks, and suggestions for a more streamlined workflow.

Simplify writing notes, project and task management, and collaboration. Whether for personal, student or professional use, Notion scales to meet your individual needs with customization tools for everyone.

FREE FOR PERSONAL USE
• Create as many notes, docs, and content as you want.
• Use one of thousands of templates to get started.

FREE TO TRY WITH YOUR TEAM
• Millions run on Notion every day, from next-generation startups to established enterprises.
• Import Google Docs, PDFs, and other content types easily to get started
• Write and organize meeting notes, or transcribe with AI.
• Collaboration and team work at your fingertips, in one connected workspace.
• Connect tools like Figma, Slack, and GitHub to Notion.

FREE FOR STUDENTS
• Your study planner, class notes, to do lists and more, your way. Loved by millions of students worldwide.
• Get organized for your best school year yet with beautiful, customizable templates created by students, for students.

NOTES & DOCS
Communication is made efficient with Notion's flexible building blocks.
• Create docs with beautiful templates, images, to-dos, and 50+ more content types.
• Meeting notes, projects, design systems, pitch decks, and more.
• Find exactly what you need using Search with powerful filters to find content across your workspace.

TASKS & PROJECTS
Catch all details big and small in any workflow.
• Workflow manager: Create your own priority labels, status tags, and automations to choose the exact info you want to track.
• Capture every detail in a table. Break projects into manageable tasks to get the work done.

AI
One tool that does it all - search, generate, analyze, and chat - right inside Notion.
• Write better. Use Notion AI to help write and brainstorm.
• Get answers. Ask Notion AI questions about all your content and get answers in seconds.
• Autofill tables. Notion AI turns overwhelming data into clear, actionable information  — automatically.

SYNCS WITH BROWSER, MAC, AND WINDOWS APPS.
• Pick up on mobile where you left off on desktop.

MORE PRODUCTIVITY. FEWER TOOLS.
• Track to-dos, write notes, create docs, and manage projects in one connected workspace.

title: Wave AI Note Taker & Recorder
description:
Transform the way you capture ideas, lectures, and meetings with Wave AI Meeting Note Taker. Wave AI is your smart AI voice notes that uses Speech-to-Text to transcribe audio recordings and turn every meeting into clear, structured notes. With a high quality audio record, let our voice notes AI transcribe audio instantly, and summarize your meeting notes. With powerful integrations like Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, Notion, OneNote, and Evernote, Wave makes sure your meeting notes follow you wherever you work or study. Use it to transcribe audio recording and speech to text in real time so you can focus on the conversation, not the keyboard.

Transcribe audio record to text with Wave AI Meeting Note Taker

🎙 Crystal-Clear Audio Recording – Record every word from lectures, calls, and meetings and transcribe audio recording to text. 🤖 Smart AI Note Taker – With speech to text function, transcribe your meeting notes in real time. 📝 Lecture Note Taker Mode – Perfect for students to use it as a lecture note taker who need quick, organized study materials. 📋 Meeting Notes in Seconds – AI-powered meeting summary and transcription so you never miss key points. 🔄 Voice Notes AI – Transforms spoken ideas with speech to text into a structured AI notebook. 📂 Wide App Integrations – Sync with Notion, OneNote, Evernote, Google Docs, and more. 📞 Phone Call Recording via VOIP – Record, transcribe audio, and get key summaries 💻Web + Mobile Access – Use Wave AI Notebook seamlessly across devices. 📅 Calendar Integration – Link meetings automatically for easy retrieval. 🌍 Multi-Language Support – Ideal for global teams and diverse classrooms. With Wave, you don’t just get voice notes — you get a searchable, shareable, and AI-optimized transcription archive of your most important conversations. Using Wave AI Note Taker is simple: Record directly from your phone, web app, or through integrated meeting bots. Transcribe speech to text with cutting-edge AI for fast, accurate audio to text. Summarize to highlight the most important insights automatically. Share instantly with teammates, classmates, or your favorite productivity tools. Whether you’re capturing meeting notes, recording a lecture, or using voice notes AI for brainstorming, Wave handles everything behind the scenes so you can focus on listening. Perfect for Students & Professionals Wave bridges the gap between classroom and office productivity. Students love it as a lecture note taker that turns complex notes into easy-to-review summaries with AI note taker. Professionals rely on it for meeting notes that capture every decision and action item. For journalists, researchers, and content creators, Wave is the go-to AI note taking for fast audio to text conversion and accurate speech to text documentation. From one-on-one interviews to large conference calls, Wave ensures your AI note taker is always up to date, organized, and ready for action. Many apps can record. A few can transcribe and create meeting notes. But Wave AI combines AI note taker power, seamless integrations, and advanced meeting summary into one ecosystem. Unlike basic transcription tools, Wave delivers structured meeting notes, searchable archives, and automatic syncing with your favorite platforms. That means less manual work, more productivity, and zero missed details. Stop juggling multiple tools. Let Wave AI Note Taker Transcribe audio records, or use speech to text to get instant transcriptions. It’s not just a meeting note taker, it’s your meeting assistant. Download now to experience effortless note-taking.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices with Microsoft OneNote.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate with Microsoft OneNote today.

Homepage & Quick Capture Bar
• Find all notes from your connected accounts in one place to easily create, find, & act on your notes
• Now with Samsung Notes integration
• Capture text, voice, ink or images to your notepad with Quick Capture
• Capture notes in ink. Click the pen button & write down your thoughts

Scan Pictures & Extract Text
• Notes Scanner: Scan documents, pictures, or files to extract notes
• Capture images to extract text from documents, files, & more
• Apply different filters to change colors, add ink, crop images & more

Audio Notes
• Take accurate voice notes with voice dictation
• Click the Mic button to begin recording, then click it again to end recording & save the file
• Dictate notes in 27 languages (note some languages are in preview) & use Auto-Punctutation to automatically format your notes

Capture Content & Get Organized
• Write notes, draw & clip things from the web to add to your notebook
• Use OneNote’s flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want

Take Notes & Achieve More
• Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what’s important & custom labels
• Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
• OneNote syncs your notes across all devices & lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time
• Notepad badge hovers on screen & lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time
• Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos

Collaborate & Share Notes
• Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, & draw attention to important points
• Take notes & save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use
• Search your notes with a fast & powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
• OneNote is part of the Office family & works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more

Write notes, save ideas & keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
• Requires Android OS 9.0 or later.
• A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
• OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
• To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization’s Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft’s End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft’s privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

title: Studocu: AI Notes & Summaries
description:
Record your classes and get instant AI notes. Studocu’s lecture recorder captures every word, generates transcripts and summaries in seconds, and turns classes into quizzes and organized study notes. Use Studocu as your all-in-one summary AI note taker and lecture recorder.

New: Class Recording
- Record lectures, seminars, and study groups in the app
- Full transcripts for accurate note taking
- AI summaries that highlight key points
- One-tap study tools: quizzes and organized study notes



Why students choose Studocu
- Lecture note taker and recorder designed for classes
- AI notes and summaries that save time
- Core AI note taking tools available at no cost
- Personalized study lists to keep materials organized
- Built for college and high school coursework across subjects



More tools to boost your grades
- Ask AI Anything for step-by-step explanations in math, science, and languages
- AI Camera Solver: take a photo of a problem and get clear guidance
- AI Quiz Maker: turn any transcript or notes into practice questions
- Massive study library with notes, guides, and practice exams
- Homework helper with trusted answers from AI and fellow students



How it helps you study smarter
- Capture lectures, transcribe, and summarize for stress-free note taking
- Turn lessons into quizzes to test yourself
- Organize transcripts, notes, and quizzes by course
- Search across your notes, transcripts, and summaries


Built for student life
- Fast setup before class starts
- Works for large lecture halls and small study groups
- Reliable for in-person and online classes


From quick homework help to advanced lecture recording, Studocu is the AI note taker for students who want to study smarter, not harder.

Download now and transform lectures into notes, summaries, and quizzes.

Support and info
 Customer Support: https://www.studocu.com/en/support
 Privacy Policy: https://www.studocu.com/en/privacy-policy
 Terms of Use: https://www.studocu.com/en/terms

title: AudioNotes: Speech To Text
description:
AudioNotes app allows you to effortlessly record, transcribe, and enhance audio from anywhere using AI. Whether you're capturing thoughts, ideas, interviews, meetings, or lectures, this app has you covered.

You have the option to record your voice directly or upload an existing audio file. Moreover, you can customize the length of the written summary and select your desired language. We employ advanced technology to guarantee the production of top-notch content. AudioNotes.ai is also accessible via the web!

Use-Cases:
- Effortless Note-Taking: Quickly record and tag notes, making note-taking a breeze.
- Journaling: Seamlessly journal your thoughts anytime, anywhere, and access them from any device.
- Ideation: Capture and refine ideas, aiding creativity and communication.
- To-do Lists: Record to-do lists for easy task management.
- Capturing Offline Meetings: Summarize and generate action items from meetings, online or offline.
- Content Creation: Create blog posts, emails, tweets, and threads using voice-to-text conversion.
- Transcribing Podcasts: Transcribe, summarize, and generate content for videos and podcasts.

title: Cue - Smart AI Meeting Notes
description:
Cue – The Hands-Free AI Meeting Note Taker

Stay fully engaged in every conversation without the hassle of taking notes. Cue uses cutting-edge AI to capture discussions - in person or online - and instantly produce accurate summaries, action items, and key information. Whether you’re in a business meeting, attending a class, catching up with friends, or brainstorming on an afternoon walk, Cue ensures you never miss a crucial detail. No distractions—only the information you care about. 

Why Cue?
Advanced AI Accuracy
Cue uses state-of-the-art speech recognition and natural language processing to handle multiple speakers and even the most technical jargon —so you always have reliable, high-quality notes.

Automatic Summaries & Action Points
No more wading through endless transcripts. Cue condenses lengthy discussions into concise, easy-to-digest summaries, complete with actionable to-do lists and clear next steps.

Privacy & Security First
Your data remains yours alone. Cue never sells or grants third parties access to your recordings or transcripts. Export, share, or delete your files any time, with total peace of mind.

Hands-Free & Distraction-Free
Focus on the conversation and let Cue do the work. Once you tap to record, it quietly transcribes in the background, ensuring you stay present and engaged.

Search & Ask Questions
Quickly retrieve vital moments or details by searching for keywords in your transcripts. Go deeper with AI-driven queries like, “Which deadlines were decided in Monday’s meeting?” to pinpoint answers without leafing through reams of text.

Flexible Use Cases
Meetings & Conferences: Transform real-time audio into polished meeting notes, complete with speaker labels.
Lectures & Study Sessions: Let Cue be your personal study companion, transcribing and summarising lessons for faster revision.
Creative Brainstorms: Capture every idea and seamlessly compile them into shareable insights.
Professional Interviews & Research: Keep track of critical data when interviewing clients, stakeholders, or subjects for qualitative studies.
Personal Productivity: Record daily thoughts, reminders, or journaling, and let Cue organise it all for you.

Multilingual Support
Need Spanish transcripts with English summaries? Cue supports multiple languages for transcription and summarisation, so you can collaborate across diverse teams or practise your language skills with ease.

Calendar Integration
Never miss a moment with Cue's smart calendar sync. Connect your Google, iCloud, or Microsoft calendars to receive timely reminders before each event—ensuring you’re always ready to capture key insights. Whether it’s a meeting, class, or personal check-in, Cue helps you stay on top of your schedule and start recording right on time.

—

How It Works
1. Open Cue
Launch the app just before your meeting, class, or brainstorming session begins.

2. Start Recording
Cue listens discreetly in the background, automatically transcribing every word without interrupting the conversation.

3. Receive Summaries & Action Items
When you’re done, Cue compiles all key points, tasks, and next steps into a concise summary, ready for immediate review.

4. Review & Share
Edit if needed, then export your transcripts or summaries as PDFs, emails, or URLs. Perfect for collaborating with teams or classmates.

Have a question for us? Email us at: cue-support@44pixels.ai
Privacy Policy: https://44pixels.ai/privacy
Terms of Use: https://44pixels.ai/cue-terms

title: Meeting.ai: AI Visual Notes
description:
Meeting.ai records, transcribes, and creates visual meeting minutes automatically. Just tap start and focus on the conversation while AI captures everything.

After each meeting, you get hand-drawn diagrams and visual summaries that help you remember 65% more information than text-only notes. Our AI creates visual meeting minutes that actually make sense—turning complex discussions into clear, memorable diagrams you can share with your team.

The app recognizes who's speaking and labels them automatically. Tag someone once, and Meeting.ai remembers them forever. Search by speaker name to find what specific people said in any meeting. No more wondering who said what or when important decisions were made.

During your meeting, chat with AI in real-time. Instantly fact-check statements, define technical terms, or ask clarifying questions without interrupting the flow. It's like having a smart assistant sitting beside you, ready to explain acronyms, verify data, or provide context when you need it.

Meeting.ai works everywhere you meet—conference rooms, coffee shops, Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet. It transcribes in 30+ languages instantly, even when speakers switch mid-sentence. Perfect for sales calls, client meetings, team standups, lectures, interviews, medical consultations, and personal voice notes.

Every meeting becomes searchable. Find any discussion, decision, or detail from your entire meeting history in seconds. Export meeting minutes and transcripts to your favorite tools. Share with a link or protect with a PIN.

Download Meeting.ai—the AI note-taker built for real, in-person conversations.

Instantly fact-check statements, define technical terms, or ask clarifying questions without interrupting the flow. It's like having a smart assistant sitting beside you, ready to explain acronyms, verify data, or provide context when you need it.Meeting.ai works everywhere you meet—conference rooms, coffee shops, Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet. It transcribes in 30+ languages instantly, even when speakers switch mid-sentence. Perfect for sales calls, client meetings, team standups, lectures, interviews, medical consultations, and personal voice notes.Every meeting becomes searchable. Find any discussion, decision, or detail from your entire meeting history in seconds. Export meeting minutes and transcripts to your favorite tools. Share with a link or protect with a PIN.Download Meeting.ai—the AI note-taker built for real, in-person conversations.

title: Freenotes - Notes Taking & PDF
description:
Freenotes: The Ultimate Digital Note-Taking Solution for Study and Work
Freenotes lets you experience true paperless learning, combining the pleasure of realistic handwriting with features that boost your study and work efficiency. Whether you're a college student needing PDF annotation or a professional seeking a high-efficiency meeting note tool, Freenotes is the best GoodNotes alternative for a seamless, productive experience across all your devices.

AI Integration: Your Smart Study Assistant
A handwriting app with built-in AI to summarize long notes or check grammar/spelling in handwritten text？
Freenotes is equipped with a powerful AI Assistant designed to optimize your learning and reviewing process:
- Instant Summaries & Answers: Take a screenshot or upload a document (PDF or photo) to instantly get answers to questions and AI-generated summaries of content. Perfect for quickly understanding long documents or creating study outlines for exams.
- AI Study Companion: Use the assistant to clarify concepts, define terms, and check your handwritten notes for accuracy, turning passive review into active recall.
  
  High-Efficiency Note-Taking & Organization
What's a high-quality app to handwrite meeting notes and convert them into searchable text?
We focus on helping you solve the pain point of messy, unsearchable notes:
- Organized and Neat: The folder feature allows you to categorize and organize your notes by projects, courses, or topics, automating the organization of your note library.
- Quick Search via OCR: No more wasting time searching! Our advanced handwriting OCR (Optical Character Recognition) means you can easily find the specific note or keyword you need, even if it was handwritten.
  
  Academic Powerhouse: PDF Annotation & Learning Tools
Best Pad note-taking app for college students？ Recommend an aesthetic digital planner app for tablets that works with hyperlinked PDFs？
Freenotes offers features essential for college students and professionals working with documents:
- Interactive PDF Annotation: Annotate, mark up, and highlight large PDF files. Select text to translate and look up words directly for more convenient and engaging learning.
- Hyperlink Support: Create hyperlinked digital planners or study guides that jump to different pages within your notes or to external web pages for easy access to related information.
  
Multitasking & Focus: Master Video Learning
"Take notes while watching videos," "Split-screen for courses."
Maximize productivity by taking notes while consuming content:
- Seamless Video Learning: Use Picture-in-Picture (PiP) to take notes while watching online videos (YouTube, lecture recordings), and instantly capture relevant screenshots directly into your notes.
- Dedicated Course Learning View: Display your handwritten notes or mind maps alongside course content in a specialized split-screen setup for deeper understanding and quick review.
  
Review & Memorization for Active Recall
"Helps with active recall," "Exam preparation tool."
We provide specific tools proven to aid memory:
- Active Recall Tape Tool: Use the tape tool to mark key information for memorization and quickly test yourself by toggling visibility—a powerful technique for active recall and exam preparation.
- Exam Prep Center: Access built-in exam materials, timers, and use in-app layers and split-screen to practice and simulate exams without re-importing files.
  
  A True Paper Feel: Natural & Customizable Writing
What app has the most natural and lowest-latency writing feel on a tablet?
- Realistic Pen Strokes: Experience lifelike, low-latency pen strokes on electronic devices by combining handwriting pens, providing the most natural feel for writing on digital platforms.
- Customization: Create and save custom brushes for quick access. Freenotes now supports the latest features of  Pencil.

title: HyNote: AI Notebook LLM Notes
description:
HyNote (AI Notebook) offers a seamless and intuitive experience for capturing and organizing your thoughts, ideas, and information. With its ability to handle multiple types of inputs including text, images, and audio, this app is designed to cater to all your note-taking needs, ensuring no detail is missed.

Features:

- Multi-Type Inputs: Whether you're typing out notes, snapping a picture of a whiteboard, or recording an audio clip, AI Notebook effortlessly handles and organizes all forms of data. This flexibility allows you to capture information in the way that best suits your needs.

- AI-Powered Summaries: With just a tap, AI Notebook analyzes your notes to provide concise, intelligible summaries. This feature is perfect for quick reviews before exams, meetings, or presentations, ensuring you grasp the core concepts without sifting through pages of notes.

- Advanced Organization: AI Notebook uses AI to categorize and organize your notes automatically. Whether it’s by topic, date, or relevance, finding the information you need has never been easier. Customizable tags and search functionalities further enhance your ability to keep your notes neatly arranged.

- Audio Recording & Live Transcription: Capture lectures, meetings, or conversations with high-quality audio recording and receive live transcriptions in real-time. This ensures that you can focus on the discussion without missing a beat, later revisiting the transcribed text for thorough review.

- Flashcards and Quizzes: Enhance your learning and retention with customized flashcards and interactive quizzes. AI Notebook allows you to create, organize, and review flashcards based on your notes. Dive deeper by generating quizzes automatically from your content to test your understanding and reinforce learning. This feature is ideal for students, professionals, and anyone looking to solidify their knowledge through active recall and spaced repetition.

- Intuitive Interface: The app boasts a user-friendly interface designed for efficiency and ease of use. Whether you're accessing it on your smartphone, tablet, or computer, you'll find navigating and managing your notes a breeze.

AI Notebook isn’t just an app; it’s your personal note-taking assistant designed to adapt to your preferences and enhance your information capturing experience. Embrace the future of note-taking and make AI Notebook your go-to app for organizing your thoughts, notes, and life.

title: Plaud: AI Notetaker
description:
[Product Introduction]

Plaud is building the world's most trusted AI work companion for professionals to elevate productivity and performance through note-taking solutions, trusted by over 1,500,000 users worldwide. With a mission to amplify human intelligence, Plaud is building the next-generation intelligence infrastructure and interfaces to capture, extract, and utilize what you say, hear, see, and think.

Plaud offers a range of AI note-taking devices and solution, each designed to fit different work and life scenarios.
- Plaud Note: The world’s No.1 AI note taker
- Plaud Note Pro: The world’s most advanced AI note taker
- Plaud NotePin / Plaud NotePin S: The world’s most wearable AI note taker
- Plaud Desktop: Capture online meetings natively from the Plaud Desktop App, without a meeting bot.

Whether it’s an in-person meeting, a phone call, an on-the-go conversation, or an online meeting, Plaud keeps you fully present while it handles the notes.


[Plaud Intelligence]

From capturing ideas on Plaud devices to retrieving and applying insights across Plaud App, web, and desktop — Plaud Intelligence is the AI engine behind every experience in the Plaud ecosystem.
- Capture with multimodal input
  - Capture or import audio
  - Press or tap to highlight
  - Input text to add context
  - Enrich context with images
- Extract AI transcripts & contextual summaries
  - AI transcription in 112 languages with speaker labels and custom vocabulary
  - Generate multiple summaries from one conversation automatically, empowered by 10,000+ expert templates
  - Developed on the best LLMs: GPT-5.2, Claude Sonnet 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, and more
- Utilize intelligence across your workflow
  - Ask Plaud: Get reference-based answers, generate insights, and save as notes
  - AutoFlow: Automate transcription, summaries, and delivery with set rules
  - Cross-platform sync with unlimited cloud storage.
  - Export, share, and integrate into your workflow
  - Plaud App and Plaud Web: Manage all your notes, summaries, and insights in one place.


[Privacy & Compliance]

Plaud is built with enterprise-grade security and global compliance standards, so your data stays safe, private, and under your control.
- ISO 27001 Compliant: Global standard for information security, keeping your data confidential, intact, and available.
- ISO 27701 Compliant: Global privacy standard, ensures personal data is managed responsibly and transparently.
- GDPR Compliant: Aligns with Europe's strictest privacy regulations
- SOC 2 Compliant: Independently audited systems for security and confidentiality
- HIPAA Compliant: Protects medical and personal health data
- EN 18031 Compliant: Meets European standards for secure wireless communication


[AI Plans]

Starter Plan: Included with any Plaud AI note taker purchase. Enjoy 300 minutes of transcription every month. Comes with access to all Plaud Intelligence features—multimodal input, multidimensional summaries, Ask Plaud, and more.

Pro Plan & Unlimited Plan: Designed for high-demanding or professional use. Pro offers 1,200 minutes per month, while Unlimited removes all time limits.

title: AI Transcribe Speech to Text
description:
AI - Transcribe Speech to Text: Revolutionize Your Audio Transcription and Summarization Experience!
Effortlessly capture, transcribe, and summarize all your audio recordings with AI - Transcribe Speech to Text, your go-to app for seamless audio transcription and summarization. Whether you're attending business meetings, consulting with professionals, or in a learning environment, this AI Assistant helps you stay organized and productive!

Perfect for Any Scenario:
● Business Meetings: Never miss a single detail from your important meetings! AI Transcribe turns your meeting audio into accurate text summaries. It captures key points, action items, and decisions instantly, allowing you to focus on what matters without the hassle of note-taking.
● Medical Consultations: Focus on the conversation with your patient, and let AI Transcribe do the rest! AI Transcribe transcribes your medical consultations with precision, capturing every important instruction or diagnosis clearly and making it easily accessible later.
● Legal Consultations: Simplify your legal consultations by having every word transcribed. Whether it's a contract discussion, legal advice, or courtroom recordings, AI Transcribe ensures you have a reliable written record to reference at any time.
● Financial Consultations: Manage your financial discussions with ease. Whether you're talking to your clients or reviewing investment strategies, AI Transcribe captures every key detail and organizes it for you.
● Classroom Lectures: Educators can effortlessly capture and transcribe lectures, ensuring they don’t miss any important details and maintain a complete record of their lessons. This makes it easy for them to revisit and share key points or resources. Students, in turn, can focus on learning without the distraction of note-taking, knowing that AI Transcribe will create accurate transcriptions and concise summaries for later review.
● Interviews: Conduct interviews with confidence, knowing that AI Transcribe is capturing every question and answer in real time. No matter the purpose—research, journalism, or hiring—you’ll get detailed transcripts and summaries with just one tap.
● Minutes: Automatically generate accurate meeting minutes. AI ensures you capture every important detail without manual effort. 
● Notes: Keep your thoughts organized and accessible. Whether you're brainstorming, drafting ideas, or jotting down quick notes, Notes AI generated helps you capture and structure your information efficiently.

Why Use AI - Transcribe Speech to Text?
● Lightning-fast and accurate transcription of all types of audio, including meetings, lectures, and interviews.
● State-of-the-art AI tools to summarize, organize, and improve your transcriptions, making your content actionable and clear.
● An ad-free experience for uninterrupted productivity.
● Import your own audio for easy transcription and summarization.

Download AI - Transcribe Speech to Text today and experience a faster, smarter way to handle your audio recordings—whether you're a business executive, doctor, lawyer, financial advisor, teacher, student, journalist, or any other professional in need of precise and trustworthy transcription services! Unlock the power of AI to transcribe, summarize, and save time. Don't be an Otter. AI Transcribe can save you countless hours by delivering fast and accurate transcriptions.

Visit our privacy policy and terms of use:
https://www.appgeneration.com/terms/ai-transcribe.html
https://www.appgeneration.com/privacy-policy/ai-transcribe.html

Whether you're attending business meetings, consulting with professionals, or in a learning environment, this AI Assistant helps you stay organized and productive!Perfect for Any Scenario:● Business Meetings: Never miss a single detail from your important meetings! AI Transcribe turns your meeting audio into accurate text summaries. It captures key points, action items, and decisions instantly, allowing you to focus on what matters without the hassle of note-taking.● Medical Consultations: Focus on the conversation with your patient, and let AI Transcribe do the rest! AI Transcribe transcribes your medical consultations with precision, capturing every important instruction or diagnosis clearly and making it easily accessible later.● Legal Consultations: Simplify your legal consultations by having every word transcribed. Whether it's a contract discussion, legal advice, or courtroom recordings, AI Transcribe ensures you have a reliable written record to reference at any time.● Financial Consultations: Manage your financial discussions with ease. Whether you're talking to your clients or reviewing investment strategies, AI Transcribe captures every key detail and organizes it for you.● Classroom Lectures: Educators can effortlessly capture and transcribe lectures, ensuring they don’t miss any important details and maintain a complete record of their lessons. This makes it easy for them to revisit and share key points or resources. Students, in turn, can focus on learning without the distraction of note-taking, knowing that AI Transcribe will create accurate transcriptions and concise summaries for later review.● Interviews: Conduct interviews with confidence, knowing that AI Transcribe is capturing every question and answer in real time. No matter the purpose—research, journalism, or hiring—you’ll get detailed transcripts and summaries with just one tap.● Minutes: Automatically generate accurate meeting minutes. AI ensures you capture every important detail without manual effort. ● Notes: Keep your thoughts organized and accessible. Whether you're brainstorming, drafting ideas, or jotting down quick notes, Notes AI generated helps you capture and structure your information efficiently.Why Use AI - Transcribe Speech to Text?● Lightning-fast and accurate transcription of all types of audio, including meetings, lectures, and interviews.● State-of-the-art AI tools to summarize, organize, and improve your transcriptions, making your content actionable and clear.● An ad-free experience for uninterrupted productivity.● Import your own audio for easy transcription and summarization.Download AI - Transcribe Speech to Text today and experience a faster, smarter way to handle your audio recordings—whether you're a business executive, doctor, lawyer, financial advisor, teacher, student, journalist, or any other professional in need of precise and trustworthy transcription services! Unlock the power of AI to transcribe, summarize, and save time. Don't be an Otter. AI Transcribe can save you countless hours by delivering fast and accurate transcriptions.Visit our privacy policy and terms of use:https://www.appgeneration.com/terms/ai-transcribe.htmlhttps://www.appgeneration.com/privacy-policy/ai-transcribe.html

title: VoiceToNotes AI: Voice to Text
description:
VoiceToNotes AI – Fast, Accurate Voice to Text & Speech to Text Transcription

VoiceToNotes AI is an advanced voice to text and speech to text app that converts your voice, audio, meetings, and recordings into clean, structured text instantly. Powered by AI, it delivers accurate real-time transcription with auto-punctuation, smart formatting, and support for 20+ languages. Perfect for anyone who wants to convert speech to text quickly and effortlessly.

Fast & Accurate Real-Time Transcription
Speak naturally and see your words appear instantly. Ideal for:
• Meetings & calls
• Lectures & study notes
• Brainstorming & journaling
• Voice memos & dictation
• Long recordings

Enjoy smooth, lag-free transcription with excellent accuracy across accents and speaking styles.
Auto-Punctuation & Grammar

VoiceToNotes AI automatically fixes punctuation, capitalization, spacing, and sentence flow. Your notes are clean, readable, and ready to use for reports, assignments, scripts, and documentation.

Smart Note Formatting
Your spoken content becomes:
• Headings
• Bullet points
• Numbered lists
• Clean paragraphs
• Markdown formatting

Ideal for students, professionals, creators, and teams who need structured notes from voice input.
AI Rephrase

Rewrite text instantly in different tones such as Professional, Concise, Friendly, Formal, or Creative. Perfect for emails, summaries, presentations, video scripts, and content creation.

Transcribe in 20+ Languages
Supports English, Hindi, Spanish, Arabic, French, Indonesian, Portuguese, Turkish, Tamil, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Russian, and more. Great for multilingual users, international students, and global teams.

Convert Audio & Voice Memos to Text
Convert:
• Recorded audio
• Voice memos
• Idea notes
• Lecture recordings
• Podcast snippets

into clear, organized text.

Export & Share Instantly
Export notes as PDF or TXT, or share to WhatsApp, Gmail, Google Drive, Telegram, email apps, and cloud storage.

Local Storage + Privacy
Your data stays on your device unless you choose to share it.
• No forced cloud uploads
• No background syncing
• No hidden transfers

Your voice and notes remain private and secure.

Built for Every Type of User
Students: Transcribe lectures and study notes.
Professionals: Turn meetings into summaries and action points.
Journalists: Convert interviews into clean text.
Creators: Dictate scripts, ideas, outlines.
Therapists & Doctors: Capture session notes.
Remote teams: Document discussions and meeting highlights.

Productivity Features
• Tap-to-edit
• Auto-save
• Works for long sessions
• Clean modern UI
• Light & Dark Mode
• Hands-free typing
• Voice memo to text
• Offline access

Privacy You Can Trust
VoiceToNotes AI never uploads your recordings without permission.
Privacy Policy: https://voicetonotes.ai/privacy-policy
Terms: https://voicetonotes.ai/terms
Support: info@voicetonotes.ai

Download VoiceToNotes AI Today
Convert your speech, ideas, and recordings into well-structured, beautifully formatted notes—quickly, accurately, and effortlessly with AI.

title: WPS Office-PDF, Word, Sheet
description: ★WPS Office-Free Office suite for Word, PDF, Sheet, is an all-in-one office suite integrates Word docs, PDF, Sheet spreadsheets, PowerPoint slides, WPS AI, Forms, Cloud Storage, Online Editing, Template library and Sharing. Access various WPS Office functions through mobile devices, such as scan PDF files, edit slides, convert spreadsheets, or view documents anytime, anywhere. WPS AI revolutionizes your workflow by offering functions like AI-Powered document scanner, AI-generated content, rewriting, ChatPDFs, and more. 「Features of WPS AI 」 1. AI-Powered Document Scanner • Digitize paper documents, extract & erase elements rapidly and accurately! 2. WPS AI-generated content (AIGC) • Get instant and high-quality content like meeting summaries, event planning, resumes, etc, all with a prompt! 3. AI-powered rewriting • WPS AI is here to offer professional rewriting and polishing work. • WPS AI is committed to be a powerful writing assistant and revolutionize the writing process. 4. ChatPDFs • Free from tedious PDF-reading workload! • WPS AI is able to effortlessly process long PDFs and provides summaries, outlines or translations as you like. • Engage in conversations with WPS AI and get instant answers about the PDFs. 5. AI-powered OCR • Revolutionized OCR technology helps to deal with the data entry work. • Ready to provide insights for any scanned document. ★As a professional word processor, WPS Office is compatible with various office softwares in core functions, more intelligent and easier. 「 Typical Features of WPS Office 」 1. Powerful Office Suite on your Android device • Using templates to start editing your budget, Word, Presentations, sheet, resumes, documents and other files. •Using tools to convert and process Document, PDF and images. •Easy to create, edit, share files and collaborated on with others in real-time. 2. Scan, view, edit, convert PDF on your Android device • Free PDF viewer that can open, view, share and comment on PDFs anywhere and on any device. • Convert all Office documents (Word, Text, Sheet, PowerPoint, Docs, Images) to PDF. • Scan paper documents to PDF. • Support PDF annotation, PDF signature, PDF extraction/split, PDF merge. • Easily add and delete watermarks in PDF. 3. Powerful cloud storage function, you are not afraid of losing documents • Use WPS Cloud to manage all documents, synchronize in real time on mobile phones and computers, and easily and directly access and edit office documents • Save documents to third-party clouds: Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, Evernote and Microsoft OneDrive. 4. Solutions for working remotely on Android devices • 1G free cloud storage, support online editing and sharing of files, easy to build and join the cloud team. • Easy to share office documents via WIFI, NFC, DLNA, email, instant messaging, WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook and Twitter. Now available PC and Mac for free , please visit the following link: https://www.wps.com/download/ Support page: https://www.wps.com/support/

2. WPS AI-generated content (AIGC)

• WPS AI is here to offer professional rewriting and polishing work.

• Revolutionized OCR technology helps to deal with the data entry work.
• Ready to provide insights for any scanned document.

★As a professional word processor, WPS Office is compatible with various office softwares in core functions, more intelligent and easier.

「 Typical Features of WPS Office 」
1. Powerful Office Suite on your Android device
• Using templates to start editing your budget, Word, Presentations, sheet, resumes, documents and other files.
•Using tools to convert and process Document, PDF and images.
•Easy to create, edit, share files and collaborated on with others in real-time.

2. Scan, view, edit, convert PDF on your Android device
• Free PDF viewer that can open, view, share and comment on PDFs anywhere and on any device.
• Convert all Office documents (Word, Text, Sheet, PowerPoint, Docs, Images) to PDF.
• Scan paper documents to PDF.
• Support PDF annotation, PDF signature, PDF extraction/split, PDF merge.
• Easily add and delete watermarks in PDF.

3. Powerful cloud storage function, you are not afraid of losing documents
• Use WPS Cloud to manage all documents, synchronize in real time on mobile phones and computers, and easily and directly access and edit office documents
• Save documents to third-party clouds: Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, Evernote and Microsoft OneDrive.

4. Solutions for working remotely on Android devices
• 1G free cloud storage, support online editing and sharing of files, easy to build and join the cloud team.
• Easy to share office documents via WIFI, NFC, DLNA, email, instant messaging, WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook and Twitter.


Now available PC and Mac for free , please visit the following link: https://www.wps.com/download/
Support page: https://www.wps.com/support/

title: Speechnotes - Speech To Text
description:
Trusted by millions, continuous non-stop and unlimited dictation. Battle tested for years.
For thinkers, bloggers, writers, drivers, joggers, busy people and anyone who prefers fast & easy typing. 

Makes life easy - no more struggling to write down short or long texts. Unlike other voice-typing apps, Speechnotes does not stop listening when you take a break to breath or think. Incorporates a built-in keyboard so you can enjoy the ease of dictation for words and ease of tapping for punctuation & symbols. Designed to make writing fast and easy.

Featured on Gizmo's, GeekTime & more.

The following features make Speechnotes a powerful speech-enabled notepad, designed to empower your ideas and creativity:   
- Optional backup to Google Drive - so you never lose a note!
- Quick timestamps, use the following codes for the f1-f10 keys, to have a one-tap stamping of current date and or time:
- Write short or long texts easily. Dictate hands free for hours! Unlike other apps, Speechnotes will not stop even when you take longer breaks between sentences.
- Accurate. Most accurate. Incorporates Google's speech recognition service.
- Fast, simple & light. Great for regular text notes too, as it's a super simple & reliable notepad. Battle-tested for years.
- Supports offline (though better performance when connected)
- Reduces typos & spelling errors
- Share, export & print in one tap
- Auto capitalization & spacing
- Auto saves on every change + drive backup - never lose your work
- Edit text ,while still in dictation mode - no need to stop and restart
- Simultaneous voice-typing for words with keyboard for punctuation, symbols & emojis
- FUN EMOJIS!
- Light weight. App is only ±4MB. Notes are saved as plain txt files.
- Widget for one-click to transcribe. No need to open the app when you have a thought you need to write down.
- Keeps phone awake when transcribing so you can focus on your thoughts
- Recognizes many verbal commands for punctuation, new line, etc.
- 10 editable cheat keys that 'stamp' (insert) any text you want. Great for standard texts, phrases, address, email, greetings, professional hard terms, that you use a lot. Instead of re-typing them every time - one tap - and its there.


- Free for unlimited speech with just a small-non disturbing ad banner. Premium is a 100% satisfaction guaranteed. If you upgraded and would like a refund within the first month please send us the order ID (you get it in an email after purchase, usually starts with 'GPA.33...') with 'refund' title to 'admin@speechlogger.com' and we'll refund immediately without questions.
- 


A Free Alternative to Dragon Naturally Speaking. If you need to dictate texts, you will find Speechnotes not only cheaper, but perhaps even a better speech to text solution for you.


Multilingual. 


Voice commands in numerous languages: 
Period; comma; question mark; colon; semicolon; exclamation mark; exclamation point; new line; new paragraph; open parentheses; close parentheses; hyphen; smiley; smiley face; sad face; dash; open quotation; close quotation; quotation

Privacy in short: we value your privacy, your data is only sent to Google's speech recognition service via your built-in Android's Speech Recognizer.

Terms in short: even though we do our best to give you a great experience {our livelihood is based on it :)  } and even though it was tested by millions over the years, the product is as-is, licensed for usage - not sold, you cannot sue us for anything, use it at your own risk.
 

For Speechnotes for PCs, iOS (on Chrome), desktops, laptops, go to https://speechnotes.co


Looking for a voice-typing keyboard instead? Find our 'Speechkeys' app on the Play Store.

Enjoy notes talking!
----

{Smartphone image credit: based on image by GadgetsGuy and GalaxyOptimus collage, CC BY-SA 3.0, https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=47968311}

Battle-tested for years.- Supports offline (though better performance when connected)- Reduces typos & spelling errors- Share, export & print in one tap- Auto capitalization & spacing- Auto saves on every change + drive backup - never lose your work- Edit text ,while still in dictation mode - no need to stop and restart- Simultaneous voice-typing for words with keyboard for punctuation, symbols & emojis- FUN EMOJIS!- Light weight. App is only ±4MB. Notes are saved as plain txt files.- Widget for one-click to transcribe. No need to open the app when you have a thought you need to write down.- Keeps phone awake when transcribing so you can focus on your thoughts- Recognizes many verbal commands for punctuation, new line, etc.- 10 editable cheat keys that 'stamp' (insert) any text you want. Great for standard texts, phrases, address, email, greetings, professional hard terms, that you use a lot. Instead of re-typing them every time - one tap - and its there.- Free for unlimited speech with just a small-non disturbing ad banner. Premium is a 100% satisfaction guaranteed. If you upgraded and would like a refund within the first month please send us the order ID (you get it in an email after purchase, usually starts with 'GPA.33...') with 'refund' title to 'admin@speechlogger.com' and we'll refund immediately without questions.- A Free Alternative to Dragon Naturally Speaking. If you need to dictate texts, you will find Speechnotes not only cheaper, but perhaps even a better speech to text solution for you.Multilingual. Voice commands in numerous languages: Period; comma; question mark; colon; semicolon; exclamation mark; exclamation point; new line; new paragraph; open parentheses; close parentheses; hyphen; smiley; smiley face; sad face; dash; open quotation; close quotation; quotationPrivacy in short: we value your privacy, your data is only sent to Google's speech recognition service via your built-in Android's Speech Recognizer.Terms in short: even though we do our best to give you a great experience {our livelihood is based on it :) } and even though it was tested by millions over the years, the product is as-is, licensed for usage - not sold, you cannot sue us for anything, use it at your own risk. For Speechnotes for PCs, iOS (on Chrome), desktops, laptops, go to https://speechnotes.coLooking for a voice-typing keyboard instead? Find our 'Speechkeys' app on the Play Store.Enjoy notes talking!----{Smartphone image credit: based on image by GadgetsGuy and GalaxyOptimus collage, CC BY-SA 3.0, https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=47968311}

title: Writease - Smart Notebook
description:
Writease: From Page to Power — Smarter Notes. Sharper Learning.

Writease is a next-generation note-taking app that transforms your handwritten notes into powerful digital content using AI. Designed for students, educators, and professionals, Writease connects your physical notebook to the digital world through a unique QR code — giving you the freedom to write naturally, while unlocking modern tools that help you learn faster and smarter.

Download the app and pair it with your Writease Notebook to experience AI-powered enhancements built for real-world productivity.

What You Can Do with Writease:
✍️ Extract Handwritten Text: Digitise your handwritten notes with a tap.
📌 Summarise & Bullet Points: Convert long paragraphs into concise study notes.
🔊 Transcribe Audio: Record voice and lectures, convert them into editable text.
🌍 Translate Handwriting & Speech: Translate notes into multiple languages.
🧠 Make Flashcards & MCQs: Automatically generate revision tools from notes.
🧮 Solve Math Problems: Scan equations and get step-by-step solutions.
📊 Generate Charts, Flowcharts, & Mind Maps: Visualize content with ease.
📤 Export as PDF: Share your enhanced content with teachers or classmates.
☁️ Cloud Sync: Save your notebooks and pages securely on our server.

How It Works:
1. Purchase a Writease Notebook (available online & offline)
2. Scan the QR code inside the notebook using the app
3. Start scanning your pages and using AI features instantly!

🛡️ Privacy & Security
All user data is encrypted in transit using Firebase’s secure infrastructure. Your content is yours — safe, accessible, and exportable anytime.

Learning begins on paper — Writease takes it further.
🖋️ Write it. 📲 Scan it. 🤖 Enhance it.

📍 Developed in India | 💡 Powered by Aashi Industries
📧 Contact: info@writease.in | 🌐 Website: https://writease.in

title: AI Notes - Voice & Notepad
description:
Are you looking for a seamless way to organize your thoughts, ideas, and tasks? Unlock the ultimate productivity with our all-in-one Notes, Voice Memos, and Notepad app! 

Do you want to add voice recordings, images, or even create AI-powered notes effortlessly? 

Feature Highlights for Your AI Notes Organizer, Voice Memo & To-Do List App:

📓 Smart AI Notes Creation: Effortlessly generate notes from text with AI assistance.
📌 Pin Notes & Daily Reminders: Pin important notes or set reminders to stay on top of your day.
📝 To-Do List Management: Organize tasks, set priorities, and never miss a deadline.
🌈 Make beautiful notes with different background colors.
📋 Oraganize notes by categories - Personal, Work.
🎨 Draw and handwrite in notes with pens.
🎙️ Voice Memo Recording: Record and save important thoughts, meetings, or lectures on the go.
📥 Automatically save notes when taking notes.
☁️ Backup and sync notes via Drive.
🔒 Lock notes app and keep notes safe and private.
📅 Set Reminder for your important Notes so that you don't miss it.
⭐  Add your Notes to Favorites.
📤 Easy Sharing Options: Share notes as Text, Images or as a PDF effortlessly with friends or colleagues.

Capture ideas when inspiration strikes. Bring your notes, to-dos, and schedules together so that life’s distractions and accomplish more at work, at home, and everywhere in-between.

Syncs all your devices, so you can stay productive on the go. Tackle your to-do list with Tasks, Reminders and Archive your Notes.

Whether you're a student, teacher, artist, designer, engineer, or someone else, AI Notes Organizer app offers powerful tools designed to spark your imagination and creativity. You can draw on the notepad and whiteboard with your finger.

Write, plan, organize. 

Your notes, docs, tasks, and projects — all in one place. 

✍️ Quick Notes Anytime, Anywhere.

title: Text Summary: AI Summarizer
description:
🧠 Why waste time reading long texts? Meet Smart AI Summarizer TLDR — the ultimate AI-powered summarization tool built to help you quickly summarize text, retain the core information, and boost your productivity. Whether you're a student, researcher, blogger, or busy professional, this summary app transforms lengthy documents into digestible summaries in seconds.

Why you need this summary generator

• Turn long text into a short and simple summary in seconds — perfect for busy students, professionals or anyone faced with heavy reading.
• Stop spending time on condensing lengthy texts manually — let this AI-powered summarizer tool do it for you.
• Get quick and accurate summaries every time, retaining the core information of your text while transforming the content into digestible summaries.
• Export your results as PDF or DOC, share or copy them — you’re always in control of how you use them.

✨ Key Features
🔹 AI Summary Generator
● Generate summaries using Abstractive, Extractive, or Key Points styles
● Customize your summary format: paragraphs, bullet points, numbered lists
● Set target word count for precise summaries
● Summarize in multiple languages
🔹 Paraphraser Tool
● Rewrite and rephrase text with adjustable tone and complexity
● Ideal for academic writing, blog editing, or creative tweaks
🔹 Summariser (Quickreads)
● Quickly summarize articles, blogs, emails, or research papers
● Perfect for daily summaries and efficient TL;DR extracts
🔹 Essay Outline Generator
● Create structured outlines for essays, reports, and scholarly writing
● Choose your topic, tone, and format — get organized fast
🔹 Export & Share
● Save, copy, and share your summaries in PDF, DOC, or plain text
● Access summaries anytime, anywhere

🌟 What makes this our leading app?
✓ A true all-in-one AI Summarizer & paraphraser & essay writer app.
✓ Process any long document, blog, article or scholarly essay easily — this summarization tool supports multilingual input and summarization in multiple languages.
✓ Create comprehensive & concise summaries that retain the core information of your text while turning it into an efficient format you can digest, understand and share.
✓ Fast, accurate, intelligent — designed for summarizing today and boosting your productivity.

This app is your go-to summary generator for:

● Summarize Articles and Blog Summaries
● Generate Research Summaries and Study Summaries
● Summarize Text from emails, reports, or books
● Summarize information in dialogue style or bullet format
● Summarize automatically with AI precision
● Create time-saving summaries for any textual content
● Access summaries instantly and share with ease
● Think of Summary — think smarter, faster, better

Whether you’re processing lengthy documents, writing scholarly essays, or just need a quick summary, this summarizer tool delivers accurate summaries every time.

📲 Ready to Summarize Smarter?
Don’t just read — summarize your text the smart way. Get Comprehensive & Concise Summaries in seconds. Start using the most efficient TLDR assistant today.

👉 Download Smart AI Summarizer TLDR now & start summarizing smarter today!

title: AI Book Summaries Generator
description:
Are you struggling to keep up with your reading list? 

Do you wish you could absorb the essence of books without spending hours flipping through pages? 

Look no further than AI Book Summaries Generator – your ultimate companion in the quest for knowledge and efficiency.

**Unlock the Power of Speed Reading:**

Gone are the days of laboriously plowing through dense texts. 

With AI Book Summaries Generator, you can now unlock the power of speed reading. 

Our cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology condenses lengthy books into concise summaries, allowing you to grasp key concepts and insights in a fraction of the time. 
Whether you're a busy professional, a student with a heavy workload, or simply an avid reader looking to maximize efficiency, this app is tailor-made for you.

**Comprehensive Coverage Across Genres:**

From self-help and business to fiction and biographies, AI Book Summaries Generator covers a wide range of genres and topics. Whether you're delving into the latest bestseller or exploring a classic literary work, our app ensures that you gain a comprehensive understanding of the book's core themes, ideas, and arguments. 

With summaries crafted by AI algorithms trained on vast libraries of texts, you can trust that you're getting high-quality insights every time.

**Personalized Recommendations & Templates:**

With our personalized recommendation engine, discovering your next read has never been easier. Simply input your interests, preferences, and reading goals, and let AI Book Summaries Generator curate a list of tailored recommendations for you. Whether you're looking to expand your knowledge in a specific field or explore new genres, our app helps you find the perfect books to add to your reading list.

**Save Time, Read More:**

Time is a precious commodity, and AI Book Summaries Generator is here to help you make the most of it. By streamlining the reading process and distilling complex information into digestible summaries, our app empowers you to consume more content in less time. title: Writecream - AI Content Writer
description:
Whether you are a wannabe writer or a professional one, Writecream can help you save hours by using AI to generate any form of written content in minutes.

Here are the main features of the app:

💥 It's FREE! 💥
⭐️ AI will automatically write content for you that is unique and free of plagiarism
⭐️ Generate intro/opening paragraphs, conclusion/ending paragraphs and outline (outline is a
list of sections and sub-sections in an article/book)
⭐️ Automatically generate written content for all sections and sub-sections
⭐️ Put together all the generated outputs to complete your book/article/script.
💭 Skip writer's block with automated content ideas for scripts, blog articles, and more.
⭐️ Expand on existing piece of written content
⭐️ Create custom A.I tools for your own use case
⭐️ Step by step tutorials available for all use cases, including creative writing, novel writing,
book writing, screen writing, script writing and more
⭐️ Useful for writers, authors, freelancers, SEO copywriters, marketing agencies, startups and
enterprises
⭐️ 30+ other tools to generate social media content, voice-overs, emails and ad copies

🥊Generate written content in over 75 languages


Writecream is available online, which means it can be used from any device including Mac, PC, Android, iPhone, iPad, Chromebook. 

Please refer to the Writecream YouTube channel and website for detailed tutorials. If you have any queries, please feel free to reach out to our 24x7 support team via chat option on the website and in the app, or drop us an email. 

What are you waiting for? Start writing and take your writing to the next level today ✍️

title: AI Note Taking, Memo: NoteHive
description:
NoteHive AI – The Smarter AI Note Taker
Capture every word, idea, and insight with the ultimate AI note taking app. Whether you need an AI note taker for meetings, classes, or personal thoughts, NoteHive AI turns speech into smart, searchable, and organised notes — instantly.

Your AI-Powered Note Taker

Forget messy notebooks and endless scrolling through recordings. NoteHive AI combines the accuracy of AI notes with advanced organization features, so your ideas are always clear, accessible, and ready to use.

Features Designed for Smarter Note Taking

✅ AI Note Taker – Speech to Text in Real Time
Record and transcribe audio instantly with cutting-edge AI. Whether you’re in a meeting, lecture, or brainstorming session, your AI note is created with exceptional accuracy.

✅ AI Meeting Notes – Instant Summaries
Turn long discussions into concise summaries and bullet points with our AI meeting note taker feature. Review important details without replaying hours of audio.

✅ Smart Note Taking AI
Create highlights, organise key points, and tag your notes for quick retrieval. NoteHive AI makes note taking faster and smarter than ever.

✅ Flashcards & Quizzes from Your Notes
Go beyond transcription. Transform any AI notes into flashcards and quizzes to boost learning and retention. Perfect for students and lifelong learners.

✅ Multi-Language Note Taking
Transcribe and take notes in multiple languages. Ideal for global teams, students, and travelers.

✅ Export & Share
Send your AI notes as TXT or PDF to colleagues, classmates, or your own cloud storage.

Why Choose NoteHive AI?

More than just a note taking app — it’s an AI-powered knowledge companion.

Works for meeting notes, lectures, interviews, and personal reminders.

Ideal for professionals, students, and anyone who needs reliable, intelligent note taking apps.

With NoteHive AI, every idea is captured, every meeting is documented, and every important moment is remembered.
Whether you need an AI note taker, a note taking AI for work, or the perfect note taking app for study, NoteHive AI delivers precision, organization, and insight in one place.

Download NoteHive AI today — your smarter way to take notes.
