title: NotterAI - AI Note Taker
description:
Capture anything, anytime and convert into intelligent notes with AI.
Audio, Videos, Photos, YouTube, PDFs, Web Links, and more, NotterAI handles it all.

Your All-in-One Offline AI Note-Taking App

NotterAI is your intelligent assistant that turns meetings, lectures, videos, and documents into organized, searchable notes instantly. With custom note templates, you decide how your notes are structured using headings, bullets, checklists, or summaries.

Whether you’re recording a meeting, analyzing a PDF, or summarizing a YouTube video, NotterAI lets you focus on learning, creating, or leading while AI handles your notes.

Record anywhere, even without internet. Your files are saved locally and summarized automatically once you reconnect.

KEY FEATURES
• Real-Time Notes from Anything
• Automatic speaker identification
• Instant meeting summaries with action items
• Record meetings, lectures, and voice notes offline

Custom Note Templates
• Create your own note templates
• Control how sections are structured
• Use summaries, bullets, or checklists
• Start with 8+ preset styles or design your own

Multi-Format Input Support
• Audio recordings & voice memos (offline supported)
• YouTube videos (paste URL, get notes)
• PDF documents & research papers
• Images with text (OCR + AI insights)
• Web articles & blog posts
• Text documents & emails

AI-Powered Intelligence
• Smart summarization that captures key points
• Automatic topic extraction & organization
• Searchable note database
• Custom summary lengths & styles
• Export to multiple formats

PERFECT FOR EVERY NEED
• Students: Record lectures Offline, summarize textbooks, and turn YouTube tutorials into study guides.
• Professionals: Capture client calls, document meetings, and get instant action items.
• Researchers: Analyze academic papers, transcribe interviews, and organize findings 10x faster.
• Content Creators: Summarize trending videos, research competitors, and collect insights.
• Journalists: Transcribe interviews, document sources, and speed up story research.

WHY CHOOSE NotterAI
• Offline ready, record and save notes without internet
• Fully personalized with custom note templates
• Lightning fast processing for long content
• High accuracy AI transcription and summarization
• Private by design with encrypted data
• Cross platform support with cloud sync
• Constant improvements with regular updates
• Unlike many transcription apps such as Otter, Wave, Minutes, Notta, or Transcribe, NotterAI supports offline recording, AI summaries, and custom note templates.

SUBSCRIPTION INFO
- All features work on a credit system. Pro plans include monthly credits, with the option to purchase extra credits if needed.
- Your subscription will be charged to your Google Play Store account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Google Play Account Settings after purchase.

EXPERIENCE THE FUTURE OF NOTE TAKING
Download NotterAI today and simplify how you capture ideas.
Record offline. Summarize instantly. Customize your notes.

Your recordings and transcripts remain private.
Files are stored securely on your device until you choose to sync or summarize.

Privacy Policy: https://notterai.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://notterai.com/terms-conditions

title: Instant AI Notes & Transcript
description:
Instant AI Notes And Transcripts – Effortless, Smart Note-Taking!

Capture meetings, lectures, or brainstorms without breaking a sweat. With Instant AI Notes And Transcripts, you’ll never miss a detail. Our intelligent AI turns spoken words into organized, easy-to-skim notes and summaries right away. Whether you’re there live or replaying later, it works like your personal digital assistant. Whether you’re a busy pro or a dedicated student, this tool is your secret weapon. Built for speed and rock-solid accuracy, it helps you snag every important point, so you stay a step ahead in every conversation. 📄What makes Instant AI Notes And Transcripts shine:📄 📝 One-Tap Start: Hit record, and notes start flowing—no setup fuss; 📝 Live Transcription: Text appears on your screen as each word is spoken; 📝 AI-Powered Summaries: Get to-the-point overviews that cut the clutter; 📝 Language Flex: Transcribe in one language, then summarize in another; 📝 Ready to Share: Export to PDF, text files, full transcripts, or audio files; 📝 Instant Search: Type a question about your notes, and get quick answers.

Conquer Every Meeting with Minutes AI: Meeting Notes!

With Minutes AI: Meeting Notes, getting Meeting Minutes: AI Notes And Transcripts into your inbox has never been this fast. Just hit record, and the app does the heavy lifting. It transcribes, summarizes, and sorts every important detail automatically. Simple Notes, Big Results with Meeting Minutes: AI Notes and Transcript:📝 Meeting Minutes: AI Notes and Transcript gives you complete transcripts and smart summaries so you can listen instead of type. Every word spoken gets turned into tidy, easy-to-read notes that you can review or share in seconds. You say it, AI writes it, and it’s already sorted in your notes. Use AI Note Taker: AI Transcribe to keep your mind on the discussion while the notes get handled for you. It’s like having a personal assistant—fast and never misses a beat. Organize Smarter with Notes AI: Note Taking AI Tool:📓 Notes AI: Note Taking AI Tool makes note-taking simple and smart. Forget messy pages and lost thoughts. This tool captures your ideas in a clean, organized way, so you can keep your mind on what really matters. With Notes AI: Note Taking AI Tool, you get structured notes, quick action lists, and instant access to anything you’ve written before—all easy to search, easy to share, and completely safe. Stay Ahead with AI Meeting Note Taker:📒 AI Meeting Note Taker turns every meeting into a neat, clear record. You don’t have to rely on memory alone; this AI listens, writes, and summarizes what matters. When you use AI Meeting Note Taker, you walk out of every meeting with organized notes and a clear next step, ready to get things done.

Level Up Your Productivity with Instant AI Notes And Transcripts!

Whether you’re in a meeting, in class, or brainstorming, Instant AI Notes And Transcripts keeps every detail safe. This tool combines Minutes AI: Meeting Notes, and AI Note Taker to ensure you never miss anything important. Supercharge your flow with AI Meeting Note Taker—your smarter note-taking future is here.

description:
Smart Notes - Capture Your Ideas Smartly!

Smart Notes is a free notepad app that combines memo, notes, to-do list, and diary features in one place. From simple memos to multilingual translation, voice input, and text-to-speech, we offer everything you need.

Looking for a notepad? Need a notes app? Want to manage your to-do list? Smart Notes has you covered!


[NOTEPAD FEATURES]

- Quickly create simple memos
- Voice input for hands-free note-taking (voice memo)
- Assign colors to notes for instant visual recognition
- Batch change colors for multiple notes at once
- 8 sorting options including color, date created, date modified, and title
- Share memos with other apps
- Listen to memos with text-to-speech (TTS)
- Lock, protect, and mark notes as complete
- 5-level font size adjustment
- Note search function


[TRANSLATION]

Translate your memos into over 30 languages. Save translations as new notes or overwrite existing ones. Perfect multilingual notepad for travel, study abroad, and business.

Supported languages: Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Persian, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Filipino, Thai, Polish, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Czech, Slovak, Hungarian, Romanian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Serbian, Slovenian, Greek, Ukrainian, Lithuanian, Latvian


[CALENDAR INTEGRATION]

- View notes by month or day based on creation or modification date
- View Google Calendar events and copy them as notes
- Manage schedule and memos together


[BACKUP AND RESTORE]

- Full database backup and restore
- Automatic backup support
- Export and import individual memos as text files
- Keep your precious memos safe


[TRASH]

- Restore deleted memos from trash or permanently delete them
- Never worry about accidental deletion


[HOME SCREEN WIDGETS]

- Display 3 or 6 notes directly on your home screen
- Create new notes instantly from the widget
- Quick access to your memos


[PERFECT FOR]

- Anyone looking for a simple notepad
- Those who want to record ideas with a notes app
- People who want to manage to-do lists by color
- Those who want to write a diary or journal
- Travelers and students needing translation
- Those who prefer voice-to-text for quick memos
- Users who want to check memos via home screen widget


[INFORMATION]

To use the text-to-speech (TTS) feature, install voice data in your device TTS settings. You can also tap the voice data installation button within the app. After installation, ensure your device media volume is set appropriately.

To use voice input, the Google Voice Search app must be installed.

title: Jnotes: Note-Taking, AI, PDF
description:
Jnotes is the professional AI-powered PDF annotator and handwriting app. Seamlessly write on PDF, organize study notes, and use our digital planner to elevate your paperless productivity on tablets.

✨ Why Jnotes? The best Goodnotes alternative for Android users!

Looking for the ultimate note-taking app for your Android tablet? 📝 Jnotes offers smooth stylus writing, AI-powered notes, PDF annotation and editing tools, handwriting recognition (OCR), and rich note formats. Start creating smart, organized, and beautiful digital notes today!

✏️ Smooth Digital Handwriting
• Customizable pen colors and thickness.
• Advanced digital ink technology ensures lag-free handwriting with stylus support.
• Draw mind maps, write naturally, and enjoy refined stylus compatibility.
• Handwriting Recognition (OCR): Search, edit, and export handwritten content effortlessly.

🤖 AI-Powered Notes & Summary
• AI Summary: Quickly generate accurate summaries of your notes.
• AI Flashcards: Turn notes into interactive quizzes with AI highlighting key terms.
• AI Quizzes & Tests: Generate comprehensive quizzes (incl. single-select, multiple-choice, true/false, open-ended questions, case studies) for quick knowledge verification and gap identification.
• Multimodal AI Notes: Generate intelligent notes from documents (PDF, DOCX, PPTX, MD), media files (MP3, MP4, MOV), and images.

📄 PDF Annotation & Editing
• Import PDFs and annotate with a full toolkit.
• Add handwritten notes, comments, and highlights directly on PDFs.
• Multi-Window Support: Use multi-window reading and annotating.
• Convert, translate, copy-paste, and export PDFs easily.

🎨 Extensive Customization Options
• Switch between Dark Mode and Eye-Comfort Mode.
• Choose from various interface themes and styles for notebook personalization.
• Import custom fonts for unique, aesthetic notes.

📚 Rich Note Formats
• Vast Library: Tons of templates, covers, and stickers to make your notes pop.
• Powerful editing tools: stroke modification, auto-shape drawing, image insertion.
• Sync audio recordings with drawings and text for multimedia notes.

🗂️ Efficient Note Management
• Organize notes in multi-level folders.
• Quick search for typed or recognized handwritten content.
• Backup your notes locally for extra security.

Core Uses of Jnotes
 🎓 For Students
• Use Cornell Notes templates for structured study notes, college work, and test prep.
• Turn long notes into easy-to-review summaries with AI Summary.
• Automatically create interactive flashcards using AI.
• Annotate, highlight, and write directly on PDFs with ease.

💼 For Professionals
• Grab templates for meeting notes, business reports, and project management.
• Record voice notes during meetings and sync them with handwritten or typed text.
• OCR instantly converts handwriting into searchable, editable text.

🖊️ For Journaling & Planning
• Use Jnotes as a daily planner, personal journal, or creative notebook.
• Enjoy realistic, lag-free handwriting with stylus input.
• Plan everything—from meals to workouts—or sketch your next big idea.

📌 How to Get Help / Stay Connected
📥 Email: Jnotes_offer@jideos.com (Include your Jnotes version, tablet model, screenshot/video, and issue description)
💬 Social Media:
- Instagram: @jnotesapp
- X: @Jnotes_official
- YouTube: @jnotes5711

🚀 Download Jnotes now and transform your Android tablet into the most powerful digital notebook today!
⭐ Loving Jnotes? We'd be thrilled if you left us a 5-star review on the Play Store! Your feedback helps us keep improving!

title: CraftNote – AI Note Taker
description:
Craftnote Smart AI Note Taker helps you capture voice notes, transcribe online meetings, organize school notes, and create smart ai summaries. AI Note Taker makes your notes smarter and easier to manage. Your all-in-one AI notes app.

Effortless AI note-taking for meetings, lectures, and voice memos.
CraftNote records, transcribes, and summarizes conversations—so you can stay present, not distracted.

CraftNote is your smart voice recorder and ai notes assistant. It captures every word in real-time and turns long conversations into structured, searchable ai notes: ideal for online meetings, brainstorming sessions, interviews, lectures, schools, or personal thoughts. Never miss a detail: AI Note Taker transcribes voice notes in real-time and highlights key points.

🔑 AI Note Taker Key Features:
• AI Note Taker: Capture and organize your ai notes with AI assistance
•  AI Notes & Audio Notes – Record lectures, meetings, or personal memos effortlessly
• AI-powered summaries – Instant highlights, follow-ups, and action items
• Transcribe Voice Notes – Live recording with multi-speaker detection
• Smart organization – Notes are tagged, sorted, and always searchable
• Voice-to-text – Convert audio files or live speech to clean transcripts
• Cross-platform sync – Access your notes from any device
• Secure & private – Your recordings stay encrypted and under your control

CraftNote is built for professionals, managers, consultants, students, and remote teams; who need clear, sharable ai notes without typing. Whether you're in the office, in class, or on the move, CraftNote helps you focus on what matters.

📥 Transform your audio into structured, actionable ai notes with AI Note Taker’s smart transcription. Download AI Note Taker now and experience the future of voice-first productivity.
—

For support: support+craftnote@joyolabs.com
Privacy Policy: https://www.joyolabs.com/craftnote/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.joyolabs.com/en/craftnote/terms

Subscription details:
CraftNote Pro features are available via Google Play subscription. You can manage or cancel anytime via Play Store > Payments & subscriptions.

title: Voice Notes : Speech to Text
description:
Voice notes will convert speech to text to create simple notes for you, without having to take trouble typing everything. Just talk to your phone and it type all you speak. It works like as if you have your personal assistant to type notes for you.


Main features of Voice Notes:
1) Create note using voice. 
2) Save note for later use and you can also save it as a draft.
3) Save notes in various formats like PDF or text format.
4) Apply different properties to your voice notes and make it attractive.
5) Share your notes using other applications.




#Permission :
1. Microphone : Permission required for write note using voice

title: Knowt: AI Flashcards & Notes
description: Discover a new way to study with Knowt, the all-in-one study app trusted by 3,000,000+ students. On top of being the #1 Flashcard App with Free Learn mode, Knowt also has unique AI features designed to save you time when studying. With one click, turn your notes into flashcards, or ask our AI to summarize your lecture videos and whip up flashcards on the key info for you. Knowt creates practice tests from any note, pdf, or video to help you prepare for exams. We offer a more efficient way to study, join us and take your learning to the next level with Knowt. What can you do on Knowt? 🧠 Make flashcards sets: Use our AI flashcard maker to create your own set or grab some from popular sites like Quizlet. ✍️ Turn your notes into flashcards and practice : Upload your notes and let our AI makes flashcards and practice tests to help you learn the material better. 🚀 Study with Free Learn Mode : Master your flashcards with unlimited rounds of learn mode or one of our other study modes (Practice Test, Match, Spaced Repetition) 📜 Efficient note-taking: Use our AI note-taking feature to take notes faster 📚Spaced Repetition : Nail your tests with our scientifically proven algorithm that helps you remember your flashcards longer 📌 Free AP Study Guides : Check out the Exams Tab for free AP exam study guides, flashcards, and practice tests. (We're adding more exams soon!) 🦉 Explore Free Learning Resources: Choose from millions of digital flashcard sets, class notes, study guides, and pdfs on a wide range of subjects, all created by fellow students. 💻 Seamless Sync: All your stuff syncs between the mobile app and website, making it easy to pick up where you left off, regardless of the device you're using. … Download the new Knowt App today and take your notes & flashcards wherever you go. Improve your grades and unleash the power of AI to learn better & faster. Terms of Service : knowt.com/terms Privacy Policy : knowt.com/privacy ………………………………… Join the Knowt Community! 👉 Discord: https://knowt.com/discord TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@getknowt Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/getknowt ………………………………… We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about our practices with regard to your personal information, please contact us at contact@knowt.com

title: Notes - Simple notepad, memo
description: Note taking app - simple, free, easy to use! Take quick notes on the fly, make a to do list for the day and write down things you need to remember. Keep notes always at hand with our simple note organizer! Our memo pad is a modern substitute to sticky notes as well as to a common diary, journal or daily checklist. No more unnecessary functions! With our free notepad you can write a quick memo and save it one tap! Make notes and lists, sort them and add color to your taste. MAIN FEATURES * Widgets * Widgets are scrollable. Can display long texts. * Multiple widgets can be placed, each with different notes set. * Autosave * Delete * Sort * Color notes (6 colors) * Dark Mode Q&A * How to delete? Swipe left on the note list. * How to mark daily notes with 6 colors? Swipe right on the note list. * What if I’d forget to tap “save”? No worries, our note app will ‘autosave’ what you’ve written. * Can I share notes? Yes, you can type notes and send them via messaging apps. * What is the cost? None, you can write memos and notes free. Memo organizer Write notes and keep them organized. You can add all sorts of info: make a to do checklist, shopping list, add work tasks, keep a daily journal and write down your thoughts. You can delete your quick memo anytime. As this a simple notepad with a clean interface, you won’t be lost in filters and tabs. It takes one tap to save and sort everything written. Easy notepad with color notes Try different colors to make note writing even more organized. For instance, you can use a certain color for shopping lists, work tasks or journaling notes. Thanks to color coding it’ll take seconds to identify any written piece in the memo app. Take advantage of our simple note writing app: make notes and lists on the go, highlight them in color and never miss a thing anymore! Daily routine, work or school, private diary or mood journaling - our simple notes are suitable for everything. Try a new simple way to capture and highlight your ideas, to do lists, projects and daily thoughts without fuss. Open the memo notepad, write down your plans and tap “save”. Keeping notes is that easy! Make sure all your ideas are kept safe. Forget about old-school sticky notes or a paper notebook that can be easily lost or forgotten. Opt for a truly modern note keeper that will save, sort and organize all things you need to keep in mind. It doesn’t matter if you’re making a simple to do list and writing a private memo , you can do everything in the all-in-one quick notes app for android. 100% free. Whenever anything is in your mind, you can capture it without a pencil and a piece of paper. Take notes in the memo maker that is always in your pocket! Online or offline, everything will be saved and stored. Share ideas with anyone! Even when you’re in a hurry, you can keep taking notes and then share with your friends, family or colleagues. Make and send your husband a shopping list, write down a short paragraph for your blog, track your mood, keep a gratitude journal - our note taker app will be a perfect companion for you! Easy notes for easy life! Enjoy!

title: Smart Notebook
description:
Combination of the notebook and the intelligent device is made so that the contents in the notebook can be shared, classified, searched and stored in the cloud.
• Backup - Storage in the cloud can be made according to volumes and page numbers.
• Synchronization – The schedule synchronizes with the Google calendar.
• Editing - More multimedia and more forms of annotation are added.
• Connection - Connection between paper and virtual contents is made through AR.
- Sharing – It’s convenient to share with others on social media.
• Organization - Contents in the book can be in more organizational ways.
• Portable – Access to notes at any time at any place.
• Lookup - Quickly look up for notes by date and content.

title: Notta-Transcribe Audio to Text
description:
Notta: Your AI-Powered Notetaker for Smarter Workflows
Notta is an intelligent AI notetaking assistant that seamlessly transforms speech into text with outstanding precision and speed. Say goodbye to manual transcription—Notta simplifies the process, helping you effortlessly capture meeting minutes, interview insights, and important AI notes in real time.
Focus on the Conversation, Not the Notes—Let Notta Handle the Rest!

Key Features
- 98.86% transcription accuracy
- AI-powered summarization feature for instant insight
- Supports transcription in 58 languages
- Translate text into 42 languages
- Compatible with various file formats
- AI removes noise and delivers clear, high-quality audio
- Auto-sync across multiple devices
Who is Notta for?
- Salespeople and consultants managing frequent meetings or negotiations
- Remote workers, telecommuters, and those working from home
- Media professionals like journalists, writers, interviewers, and bloggers
- Multilingual speakers or students learning new languages

-Security Certifications

Notta obtained the SOC 2 Type II certification, and received ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certification for its information security management system, reinforcing the reliability and security of our services.

-Real-Time Transcription and Summarization

Start transcription with a single click on your PC, smartphone, or tablet. Notta converts spoken words into text in real-time, letting you focus on the conversation instead of taking notes. The AI summarization feature quickly extracts key points from meetings, lectures, and interviews.

- Integration with Hardware

By pairing with devices like Notta Memo or Zenchord, you can save and summarize audio recordings from various scenarios such as business meetings, interviews, and lectures directly to Notta. Notta Memo can also record audio independently, and once connected to the Notta app later, the recordings are automatically transferred.

-Multiple Transcription Options

Notta supports both live transcription and automatic transcription of pre-recorded files. Import audio or video files, and get a one-hour recording transcribed in about five minutes.

-Streamlined Editing Experience

Add bookmarks during transcription to mark important statements, making post-meeting edits faster and more efficient. Searching through recordings is effortless—simply enter keywords to locate specific segments.

-Easily Share Transcription Data

Save transcribed text in formats such as txt, docx, excel, pdf, or srt (subtitles). Export transcriptions with recorded timestamps and timelines, or share them via a link with colleagues and friends.

-Automatic Translation for Global Meetings

Notta supports 58 languages for transcription and can translate text into 42 languages instantly. This feature is ideal for international meetings, helping users understand unfamiliar terms and even improve language skills.

Plans and Pricing
Free Plan
- Real-time transcription: 3 minutes per recording
- Auto-transcription of web meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex): 3 minutes per session
- Import audio files and view the first 3 minutes of transcription for free
- Dictionary: Add up to 3 custom terms
Premium Plan
- 1,800 minutes of transcription per month
- Real-time transcription
- Import audio and video files
- Auto-transcription for web meetings (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Webex)
- Export transcription data
- Dictionary: Add up to 200 custom terms
- Translate transcription into 42 languages
- Auto-proofreading
- Hide time markers
- Speed up audio playback
- Edit speaker names
- Unlock advanced features and enjoy extensive transcription capabilities.
With Notta, streamline your workflow and elevate your productivity!
Notta Terms of Service:https://www.notta.ai/en/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.notta.ai/en/privacy
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at support@notta.ai.

title: WriteNow Pro: Smart notebooks
description: Notebooks, memos and more! WriteNow is a feature-rich notebook app that gives you extensive control over your notes and lets you focus on writing in a distraction-free text editor, with many built-in options (such as ready-to-use templates that are perfect for diary and journal entries or quick memos). Organize your notes and writing into an unlimited number of smart notebooks. Each notebook can be customized with a distinct icon to personalize it and make it easy to recognize visually. You can also add your own tags and metadata to each note, which is a powerful and easy way to make your notes even more detailed and informative. The search feature is customizable by title, content, and tags or metadata, so you can quickly find whatever you need across all your notes. We believe in privacy: your notes and data belong to you. Only you have access to your notebooks, password, and backup code. You can export your notebooks and database, and share your notes to collaborate with others, but only you are responsible for how that happens. No data is collected, shared, or accessed by us, and even the free version has no ads. Text editor: Efficient and focused • Never lose your progress! Automatically save your writing whenever you close a note. • Built-in templates: Use date, time, and formatting templates that are perfect for diaries, journals, and note-taking. • Customize the editor with a quick-action bar, allowing you to update your note, add tags or metadata, insert templates, and share the note with someone else - all without having to navigate menus. The quick-action bar can be toggled at any time, and even set to follow your preferred state. • Copy, share and export your note. • Adjust the font size to suit your eyes. • Multiple options for clearing a note's text and data: either just delete the main text, or clear the note's tags and metadata at the same time to start fresh. • Move your notes, with all their metadata, from one notebook to another. Password protection • Lock and hide your notebooks with a password! • You can lock your notebooks whenever you want or set them to always lock by default for extra security. • Your password is encrypted, and only you know what it is. We value your privacy and have no access to your password or data. • As an extra security option, you can use your password to generate a backup code. This code can only be viewed once, so write it down somewhere safe outside the app. If you forget your password, you can use this backup code to unlock your notebooks and update your security options. Easy navigation • Your notebooks and notes are organized in a clean design for easy navigation. • Search your notes and manage your tags and metadata quickly and easily. • Sort your notebooks and notes alphabetically or by date. Backup and export • Export and import your entire database, so you can store a backup wherever you like to keep your notebooks safe! • There are multiple options to handle your notebooks and data, with confirmations to prevent you from accidentally deleting or overwriting something important. • All your notebooks can be exported into one text file, or you can export your notes individually. • When you export your notes, the notebook title, content, and tags and metadata are all clearly labeled. Pro features • Free & Pro: No ads or invasive permissions 💜 • Pro: Unlimited notebooks • Pro: Notebook icons • Pro: Password protection • Pro: Generate a security backup code • Pro: Hide your notebooks • Pro: Search by title, content, and tags • Pro: Save your notebooks and notes to text files • Pro: Export and import your notebook database • Pro: Share your notes straight from the text editor • Pro: Extra quality-of-life options Technical support If you run into any problems while using WriteNow, you can send a message to lumityapps@gmail.com. We'll do our best to address the issue as swiftly as possible.
descriptionHTML:
Notebooks, memos and more!
WriteNow is a feature-rich notebook app that gives you extensive control over your notes and lets you focus on writing in a distraction-free text editor, with many built-in options (such as ready-to-use templates that are perfect for diary and journal entries or quick memos).

Organize your notes and writing into an unlimited number of smart notebooks. Each notebook can be customized with a distinct icon to personalize it and make it easy to recognize visually. You can also add your own tags and metadata to each note, which is a powerful and easy way to make your notes even more detailed and informative. The search feature is customizable by title, content, and tags or metadata, so you can quickly find whatever you need across all your notes.

We believe in privacy: your notes and data belong to you. Only you have access to your notebooks, password, and backup code. You can export your notebooks and database, and share your notes to collaborate with others, but only you are responsible for how that happens. No data is collected, shared, or accessed by us, and even the free version has no ads.

Text editor: Efficient and focused
• Never lose your progress! Automatically save your writing whenever you close a note.
• Built-in templates: Use date, time, and formatting templates that are perfect for diaries, journals, and note-taking.
• Customize the editor with a quick-action bar, allowing you to update your note, add tags or metadata, insert templates, and share the note with someone else - all without having to navigate menus. The quick-action bar can be toggled at any time, and even set to follow your preferred state.
• Copy, share and export your note.
• Adjust the font size to suit your eyes.
• Multiple options for clearing a note's text and data: either just delete the main text, or clear the note's tags and metadata at the same time to start fresh.
• Move your notes, with all their metadata, from one notebook to another.

Password protection
• Lock and hide your notebooks with a password!
• You can lock your notebooks whenever you want or set them to always lock by default for extra security.
• Your password is encrypted, and only you know what it is. We value your privacy and have no access to your password or data.
• As an extra security option, you can use your password to generate a backup code. This code can only be viewed once, so write it down somewhere safe outside the app. If you forget your password, you can use this backup code to unlock your notebooks and update your security options.

Easy navigation
• Your notebooks and notes are organized in a clean design for easy navigation.
• Search your notes and manage your tags and metadata quickly and easily.
• Sort your notebooks and notes alphabetically or by date.

Backup and export
• Export and import your entire database, so you can store a backup wherever you like to keep your notebooks safe!
• There are multiple options to handle your notebooks and data, with confirmations to prevent you from accidentally deleting or overwriting something important.
• All your notebooks can be exported into one text file, or you can export your notes individually.
• When you export your notes, the notebook title, content, and tags and metadata are all clearly labeled.

Pro features
• Free & Pro: No ads or invasive permissions 💜
• Pro: Unlimited notebooks
• Pro: Notebook icons
• Pro: Password protection
• Pro: Generate a security backup code
• Pro: Hide your notebooks
• Pro: Search by title, content, and tags
• Pro: Save your notebooks and notes to text files
• Pro: Export and import your notebook database
• Pro: Share your notes straight from the text editor
• Pro: Extra quality-of-life options

Technical support
If you run into any problems while using WriteNow, you can send a message to lumityapps@gmail.com. We'll do our best to address the issue as swiftly as possible.
summary: Smart notebooks with password protection, tags and a feature-rich text editor!

Automatically save your writing whenever you close a note.• Built-in templates: Use date, time, and formatting templates that are perfect for diaries, journals, and note-taking.• Customize the editor with a quick-action bar, allowing you to update your note, add tags or metadata, insert templates, and share the note with someone else - all without having to navigate menus. The quick-action bar can be toggled at any time, and even set to follow your preferred state.• Copy, share and export your note.• Adjust the font size to suit your eyes.• Multiple options for clearing a note's text and data: either just delete the main text, or clear the note's tags and metadata at the same time to start fresh.• Move your notes, with all their metadata, from one notebook to another.Password protection• Lock and hide your notebooks with a password!• You can lock your notebooks whenever you want or set them to always lock by default for extra security.• Your password is encrypted, and only you know what it is. We value your privacy and have no access to your password or data.• As an extra security option, you can use your password to generate a backup code. This code can only be viewed once, so write it down somewhere safe outside the app. If you forget your password, you can use this backup code to unlock your notebooks and update your security options.Easy navigation• Your notebooks and notes are organized in a clean design for easy navigation.• Search your notes and manage your tags and metadata quickly and easily.• Sort your notebooks and notes alphabetically or by date.Backup and export• Export and import your entire database, so you can store a backup wherever you like to keep your notebooks safe!• There are multiple options to handle your notebooks and data, with confirmations to prevent you from accidentally deleting or overwriting something important.• All your notebooks can be exported into one text file, or you can export your notes individually.• When you export your notes, the notebook title, content, and tags and metadata are all clearly labeled.Pro features• Free & Pro: No ads or invasive permissions 💜• Pro: Unlimited notebooks• Pro: Notebook icons• Pro: Password protection• Pro: Generate a security backup code• Pro: Hide your notebooks• Pro: Search by title, content, and tags• Pro: Save your notebooks and notes to text files• Pro: Export and import your notebook database• Pro: Share your notes straight from the text editor• Pro: Extra quality-of-life optionsTechnical supportIf you run into any problems while using WriteNow, you can send a message to lumityapps@gmail.com. We'll do our best to address the issue as swiftly as possible.

title: AI Transcribe. Speech to Text
description: MeetGeek is the AI-powered voice recorder app & AI Note Taker that allows you to transcribe speech to text and record audio in over 50 languages for: ✓ face-to-face conversations ✓ online meetings ✓ training courses ✓ interviews & more From today onward, your meetings can end with an accurate transcript & an AI-generated summary in your inbox that includes key highlights, decisions, and action items discussed. Supported languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Burmese, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Georgian, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Kazakh, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Maltese, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Zulu. MeetGeek Works With the Major Video Calling Apps MeetGeek is a versatile notetaking app for meeting automation that you can use on multiple platforms to help you record audio & get AI-generated summaries. You can easily transcribe speech to text, take notes & summarize meetings conducted on: ✓ Zoom, ✓ Google Meet ✓ Microsoft Teams Record face-to-face conversations MeetGeek is a speech-to-text app that allows you to record audio with just one touch of a button, get voice transcription & a summary of the chat shortly afterward inside the app and via email. This is especially useful if you need to keep records of your business meetings, talks from conferences, or offline meetings with clients. Record & Transcribe speech to text ✓ Record audio & transcribe speech to text for meetings with just one click. ✓ Automatically take meeting notes so you can focus on the conversation. ✓ Have speakers labeled with tags for easy navigation. ✓ Simply invite MeetGeek to meetings on your calendar & you are ready to go Get a Smart AI Summary of Your Meetings ✓ Get a 5-min summary out of a 1-hour meeting. ✓ MeetGeek detects action items, important moments, facts from your meetings & automatically tags them. ✓ Use AI Highlights to quickly review the transcripts of your past conversations. ✓ Send an AI summary over email to other participants of the offline meeting or video call. Why Choose MeetGeek? MeetGeek isn't just a voice recorder or a notes app; it's an all-in-one solution designed to enhance your productivity. With MeetGeek, you can effortlessly record audio during any video call & get comprehensive AI summaries, making it easier than ever to keep track of key information & action items. This voice to text app supports over 50 languages & provides 300 minutes of free transcription. Using MeetGeek during your Zoom, Google Meet, or Microsoft Teams video calls is straightforward. Similarly to Otter AI, Fireflies, Sembly AI, Fathom, Minutes, Transcribe, or Notta, the app provides automatic transcription & note-taking, ensuring you can focus on the discussion rather than worrying about missing important points. The notes app functionality means you can easily organize & review your meeting notes anytime. In addition to its core features, MeetGeek offers detailed & descriptive summaries highlighting key points from your meetings. The app can also transcribe descript face-to-face conversations, making it a versatile tool for various settings. With the MeetGeek AI notetaker, your offline meetings & online video calls become more productive & efficient.

With the MeetGeek AI notetaker, your offline meetings & online video calls become more productive & efficient.

title: Auto Minutes: AI Meeting Note
description:
Your Intelligent Recording & Meeting Assistant: Eliminate Manual Minutes Writing Forever.

【CORE FEATURES】
1. Real-time record OR upload MP3/M4A/… various types of audio files
2. Generate Minutes with AI-Powered Processing Engine
  a. Accurate Transcripts: Supports multi-languages content recognition with Speaker identification
  b. AI Summary: Auto-generates key conclusions and action items

1. Support auto saving of recording anytime to avoid losing data
2. Enterprise-grade data encryption
3. Absolute data ownership guarantee

【KEY BENEFITS】
1. Perfect for meetings, lectures, client calls, and creative projects
2. Cross-Device synchronization

Terms of Service: https://autominutes.ai/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://autominutes.ai/privacy.html

title: Microsoft Word: Edit Documents
description:
The document editor that you can take with you on the go – Microsoft Word.

Write and create documents on your mobile device much like you do on your PC. Edit docs, share notes, convert to PDF documents, craft a powerful cover letter, and collaborate on projects using your mobile device.

Documents are easy to create, read, edit and share with Microsoft Word. Simplify on-the-go document collaboration and editing with our easy-to-use Word app features. Convert to PDF from Word and vice versa. From doc editing to collaboration and beyond, Microsoft Word is one of the best free writing apps for writing on the go.

Access files, documents and make edits with ease using the Word app. Read documents and open attachments with built-in docs viewer. Edit a PDF using Word’s PDF converter feature easily. Share files, documents and notes in the format you’d like. Create documents on the go with Word’s expert editing tools anytime, anywhere.

Read, edit docs and create a document for any need. Resume templates, newsletters, brochures and more are accessible in the template gallery. Select the documents you would like and get started.

Blogger, writer, journalist, columnist or project manager: the Microsoft Word writing app moves with you.

Easy document editing, at your fingertips. Write a letter, create templates, read Word documents, edit docs and collaborate with your team anywhere! Get the docs and PDF app that can do it all.

Create Documents
• Use Microsoft Word as a cover letter creator by leveraging our beautiful templates
• Document editor keeps formats & layouts looking great.
• Docs app with templates for resumes, cover letters, forms & more.
• Documents are easily created for any writing task.
• Editing with rich formatting & layout.

Read, Write and Edit Documents
• Read docs, letters, PDFs & scripts on your device in Reading View.
• Document & PDF App: Edit documents from PDFs by converting to & from Word documents.
• PDF Converter: Save as PDF after editing & share the PDF easily.

Collaborate and Share With Anyone, Anywhere
• Document comments can be left right next to the text using for seamless collaboration.
• View documents using the built-in docs viewer.
• Edit documents as a team and stay on top of changes to the text, layout & formatting.
• Edit docs and view editor history: easily revert to view earlier drafts when you need to.

Microsoft Word for Anything
• Documents for your needs: Letters, blogs, scripts, notes, resumes, & more can be created beautifully designed modern templates.
• Write a letter easily using Word’s templates.
• Share documents as a link, email or attachment.
• Proofread, check spelling & review any document.

File Sharing Simplified
• Share files & collaborate with a few taps.
• File & document permission management: see who is working on what.
• Copy files into the body of an email message with its format intact or attach PDFs & docs to the email.

Document, PDf and writing app free of restrictions, hassle and workarounds. Download Microsoft Word  to edit documents anywhere, seamlessly.

REQUIREMENTS
1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size smaller than 10.1 inches.

title: MobiOffice: Word, Sheets, PDF
description: MobiOffice is the smart choice for office productivity. With this powerful office pack, you can create, edit, comment, format, convert, and protect documents, spreadsheets and presentations - as well as the ability to view and sign PDF files. Compatible with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Google Docs, Google Sheets, Google Slides, OpenOffice, LibreOffice, WPS Office, Polaris Office, Adobe PDF, and more. Everything you need to get your work done Work on-the-go and take your productivity to the next level with our mobile office app. Easily link your Google Drive, OneDrive for Business, Box, or Dropbox accounts to access your projects from any device, anywhere, anytime. Collaborate seamlessly with your team and stay efficient, even when you're away from your desk. Features include: • Powerful applications packed with helpful tools to handle any task with any file format – Microsoft Office365 docs, Google docs, OpenOffice, and more. • All the advanced features you need – format painter, track changes, conditional formatting, formulas, presentation mode, and much more. • Export Documents, Sheets, and presentations Slides to PDF with our PDF converter. • Advanced security options. • Save all your files on your Google Drive account, OneDrive for Business, Box, or Dropbox accounts. Advanced PDF management • PDF docs reader. • PDF files editor. • PDF documents filler. • Work with fillable forms. • Digitally sign PDF documents. • Enhanced security and permissions management. • PDF converter to Word, Excel or ePub. Mobile office - Designed for work on the go • Integrated cloud storage for easy access to files – get 5GB free on our MobiDrive cloud or link your existing Google Drive, OneDrive for Business, Box, or Dropbox accounts. • Cross-platform capabilities linking your Windows PC with all your Android and iOS mobile devices with our office mobile pack. • Compatibility with popular file formats – Microsoft docs, Google docs, OpenOffice, Apple's iWork, and hundreds more. • Practical and a user-friendly interface optimized for the latest Android version. • PDF editor that you can use to create and fill PDF files, or as a PDF converter to office documents. Create and edit files and documents with ease Take your office with you wherever you go and stay productive on-the-go with our mobile document editor. Our app enables you to edit Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, and PowerPoint slides, and easily convert them to PDF files. No matter what type of document you need to work on, you can access it from anywhere and make changes whenever you need to. Give it a go and see for yourself Experience the complete set of features and tools available in MobiOffice with our free 7-day trial, giving you access to our advanced document editor, as well as all other premium features and tools. Our flexible pricing plans, which include monthly and annual options, allow you to choose the package that perfectly meets your needs. Whether you need a powerful documents editor, a spreadsheet app for budgeting, or a comprehensive suite of productivity tools, MobiOffice has got you covered. Mobile documents editor for Word docs, Excel Sheets & PowerPoint slides and PDF files at your fingertips. Link your mobile office to your Google Drive account or OneDrive for Business, Box, or Dropbox accounts to save all your files, compatible with many file formats including Google Docs, OpenOffice, Microsoft Office 365, and many more. Premium benefits include: • 5GB storage on MobiDrive • Unlimited usage of the PDF converter • Unlock 20+ advanced features • Use Premium on 2 mobile devices & 1 Windows PC. • No ads • Priority support

title: Paper: Smart Notes & Memos
description:
Paper - Smart Notes & Organization

Paper transforms note-taking into a seamless experience that adapts to your workflow. Capture ideas, organize information, and enhance productivity with our thoughtfully designed digital notebook.

Enhance your productivity

From quick thoughts to comprehensive notes, Paper keeps your ideas organized and accessible anywhere. Our intuitive design helps you focus on what matters.

Features

• Rich Content - Create notes with formatting, images, and multimedia elements  
• Multiple Notebooks - Separate work, study, and personal projects with ease  
• Quick Capture Widget - Record thoughts instantly without opening the app  
• Powerful Organization - Utilize tags, folders, and smart filters for efficient management  
• Search Functionality - Find any note within seconds  
• End-to-End Encryption - Your thoughts remain private and secure  
• AI Assistance - Summarize and refine notes with intelligent tools  
• Device Synchronization - Access notes across all your devices  
• Offline Capability - Create and edit without an internet connection

Why Paper stands out

* Start immediately without account creation
* One-time purchase with no subscription fees
* Clean interface that eliminates distractions
* Seamless experience across mobile and desktop platforms

Ideal For

* Students documenting lectures and research
* Professionals managing meeting notes and projects
* Writers collecting ideas and developing drafts
* Individuals seeking to organize thoughts effectively

Join the community of professionals, students, and creatives who rely on Paper daily.

Download now to experience thoughtful note-taking.

[Minimum supported app version: 3.0.1]

title: Notely Voice: AI Voice to Text
description:
🎙️ Take Smart Notes with Your Voice
Notely Voice is the all-in-one app to record, transcribe, and organize your voice notes — completely hands-free. Whether you’re brainstorming, journaling, working, or studying, Notely Voice turns your thoughts into structured, editable notes instantly.

🔑 Key Features
🎤 Record Voice Notes
•⁠  ⁠Capture ideas instantly with one tap
•⁠  ⁠Hands-free recording — perfect while walking, driving, or multitasking
🌐 Transcribe Audio in 50+ Languages
•⁠  ⁠Convert voice to text in real time
•⁠  ⁠Supports English, Spanish, French, Arabic, Mandarin, and more
•⁠  ⁠Transcribe unlimited audio — no hidden limits
📝 Rich Text Editing
•⁠  ⁠Add titles, bold, italic, underline
•⁠  ⁠Align text left, center, or right
•⁠  ⁠Clean, intuitive note formatting
🔍 Instant Search & Smart Filtering
•⁠  ⁠Find any note with full-text search
•⁠  ⁠Filter notes by: Starred, Voice, Recent
•⁠  ⁠Organize your thoughts faster
📥 Import and Export as Audio
•⁠  ⁠Import audio files from your device
•⁠  ⁠Import video files from your device and convert to audio
•⁠  ⁠Export recordings for backup or collaboration
•⁠  ⁠Integrates easily into any workflow
🎨 Customize Themes
•⁠  ⁠Choose Light, Dark, or System mode
•⁠  ⁠Designed for focus and readability
🔗 Share Notes & Recordings
•⁠  ⁠Send audio or text via email, apps, or cloud
•⁠  ⁠Great for teams, creators, and collaborators

🚀 Why Notely Voice?
•⁠  ⁠✅ Unlimited transcription
•⁠  ⁠✅ High-accuracy voice recognition
•⁠  ⁠✅ Supports over 50 global languages
•⁠  ⁠✅ Fast, reliable, and easy to use
•⁠  ⁠✅ Data stays private on your device
•⁠  ⁠✅ No ads, no distractions
Whether you're a student taking class notes, a journalist recording interviews, a creator capturing inspiration, or anyone needing a fast and reliable voice-to-text tool — Notely Voice is built for you.

🔐 100% Private & Offline Friendly
Your recordings and notes stay on your device unless you choose to share them. No cloud required. No subscriptions needed.

📲 Download Notely Voice today
Experience the fastest way to turn your voice into perfectly organized notes.

title: Moleskine Notes
description:
Moleskine Notes works with the Moleskine Smart Pen and Smart Notebooks to empower your handwritten notes and sketches by bringing them into the digital realm. Take notes by hand, transcribe them inside Moleskine Notes, and then share them with friends and collaborators. Go offline with your Moleskine Smartpen, and all of your work will be transferred upon reconnecting with the app. This means you write and draw anywhere and still create a shareable digital copy of your pages.

The notes you take in meetings or classes can be instantly converted to text, then exported as Microsoft Word, RTF, or TXT files. Draw diagrams and import them into your PowerPoint presentations. You can export your sketches to vector art and continue to refine work.

We all love screens and devices. However, when it comes to capturing your thoughts, nothing beats paper’s immediacy and open-ended possibility. The Moleskine Smart Writing set offers you the best of paper and digital to amplify your productivity and creativity.

title: MyScript Notes (Nebo)
description:
Create stunning notes and professional documents effortlessly by hand, brainstorm ideas on an infinite canvas, and annotate PDFs seamlessly. Powered by the world's leading AI handwriting recognition technology, MyScript Notes offers a dynamic platform where handwriting, text, drawings, diagrams, and images seamlessly coexist on an expandable canvas. Enhance your note-taking experience with intuitive pen gestures, effortlessly converting handwriting and shapes into typed text and precise forms.

MyScript Notes understands every word you write in your choice of 66 languages, and works on mobile platforms — so you can access and search your notes from any compatible device.

Enjoy 4 powerful experiences in one app:

◼︎ Create unlimited notebooks and fixed-size pages for your daily notes.
◼︎ Take freeform notes on boards — the world's most advanced endless canvas.
◼︎ Handwrite responsive documents, adding math calculations and diagrams.
◼︎ Import existing files as PDFs, ready to annotate.

————————

DIGITAL HANDWRITING
• Write¹, type or dictate in the same page, sentence or even word.
• Accurately convert handwriting and math to typed text, and drawn diagrams to perfect shapes. Diagrams stay editable when pasted into PowerPoint!
• Write emoji and symbols with your pen.

EDIT WITH YOUR PEN
• Use intuitive gestures to edit and format content without breaking your flow.
• Use the marker to highlight or color, the lasso to select, and the eraser to delete entire strokes or precisely defined content.

WRITE, TYPE AND DRAW FREELY ON A BOARD
• Enjoy an infinite canvas, ideal for brainstorming, mind mapping and freeform note-taking.
• Pan around and zoom in or out for a fresh perspective.
• Use the lasso to select, move, copy, delete or resize content — and to convert handwriting to typed text.

SWITCH TO A DOCUMENT FOR A RESPONSIVE EXPERIENCE
• Create and edit structured notes — your handwriting will automatically reflow as needed.
• Make edits, adjust layout, rotate your device or split your screen without worrying about readability.

ENRICH YOUR NOTES
• Personalize content using a range of pen types and page backgrounds.
• Add photos, sketches and smart objects like math and diagrams.
• Handwrite math equations and matrices across several lines, solve simple calculations and copy math as LaTeX or image.

————————

MyScript Notes respects your privacy and never stores content on our servers without your explicit consent.

For help or feature requests, create a ticket at https://myscri.pt/support
Check out MyScript Notes' webpage for more information about cross-platform: https://www.myscript.com/notes

————————

¹You can use any compatible active or passive pen, including Apple Pencil, to write in MyScript Notes. Check minimum and recommended requirements for MyScript Notes: https://myscri.pt/notes-devices

title: Summary: Text Summarizer
description:
Looking for a convenient way to summarize texts effortlessly? Look no further than Summary: Text Summarizer. 

Our summarize app is the perfect solution for condensing lengthy texts, articles, or URLs into concise summaries with just a tap.

Summary: Text Summarizer utilizes advanced AI technology to provide quick and accurate summaries. Whether you're a student, a professional, or simply someone who wants to save time, our summarize app is your go-to summarization tool.

With our intuitive interface, summarizing texts in multiple languages has never been easier.

Key Features:

Generate summaries 
Preserve main points and key information
Summarize in multiple languages
Share summaries with ease
Summarizer for articles, documents, and reports

Our AI-powered summarizer is capable of processing lengthy documents, scholarly essays, and web pages, distilling them into precise summaries. Simply copy and paste your text, and let our AI do the work for you.
Retain the core information of your text with our summarizer, ensuring you gain a full understanding without the need to read every single line. Think of Summary: Text Summarizer as your always-on TLDR assistant for all forms of textual content.

Import text directly from other apps to Summary: Text Summarizer. Press the button, and voila – your summary is ready!

With Summary: Text Summarizer, you'll have an easy time understanding long content. Quickly condense lengthy texts into a more manageable and easy-to-read format, saving time and staying informed with our unique summarization technology.

Don't waste time reading long texts – let Summary: Text Summarizer do the work for you. Download the summarize app now and start summarizing today!

Questions? Suggestions? Speak to a real person at Summary: Text Summarizer! Our trusty customer support team is just an email away—simply write to email hello.textsummary@gmail.com

title: Smart Notes: Notepad & Tasks
description: Smart Notes is a clean, powerful and modern notes app designed for fast writing, organizing and securing your ideas. Create notes, add images, make checklists, draw sketches, lock private notes and organize everything with custom folders. Perfect for daily tasks, study notes, personal reminders and work planning. ⭐ FEATURES 📝 Fast & Simple Note Writing • Write unlimited notes smoothly • Format text with bold, italic, underline, headings & alignment • Create to-do lists, checklists and bullet-style notes • Pin important notes at the top 🖼️ Add Images Inside Notes • Insert photos inside any note • Useful for study, work, travel, receipts & reminders ✏️ Drawing Pad (Handwriting Notes) • Draw, sketch or doodle directly inside notes • Perfect for diagrams, creative ideas and handwritten planning 🔒 Secure Your Notes • Lock any note with PIN/password • Keep private notes safe and hidden • Deleted notes move to Trash for recovery 📂 Organize With Custom Folders • Create custom folders for different categories • Organize notes by Work, Personal, Study, Ideas & more • Smooth left-to-right swipe navigation 🌙 Light & Dark Mode • Switch between Light and Dark themes • Clean, minimal and easy-to-read design 🚀 WHY SMART NOTES? • Fast, lightweight and simple • Professional and clean UI • Works offline • Ideal for students, professionals, writers & daily users • Strong privacy with secure locking 🧠 PERFECT FOR • Study notes • Work notes • To-do lists & checklists • Personal diary & planning • Ideas & reminders • Drawings, sketches & handwritten notes
descriptionHTML:
Smart Notes is a clean, powerful and modern notes app designed for fast writing, organizing and securing your ideas. Create notes, add images, make checklists, draw sketches, lock private notes and organize everything with custom folders. Perfect for daily tasks, study notes, personal reminders and work planning.

⭐ FEATURES

📝 Fast & Simple Note Writing
• Write unlimited notes smoothly
• Format text with bold, italic, underline, headings & alignment

• Pin important notes at the top

🖼️ Add Images Inside Notes
• Insert photos inside any note
• Useful for study, work, travel, receipts & reminders

✏️ Drawing Pad (Handwriting Notes)
• Draw, sketch or doodle directly inside notes
• Perfect for diagrams, creative ideas and handwritten planning

• Lock any note with PIN/password
• Keep private notes safe and hidden
• Deleted notes move to Trash for recovery

• Create custom folders for different categories
• Organize notes by Work, Personal, Study, Ideas & more
• Smooth left-to-right swipe navigation

🌙 Light & Dark Mode
• Switch between Light and Dark themes
• Clean, minimal and easy-to-read design

🚀 WHY SMART NOTES?
• Fast, lightweight and simple
• Professional and clean UI
• Works offline
• Ideal for students, professionals, writers & daily users
• Strong privacy with secure locking

🧠 PERFECT FOR
• Study notes
• Work notes
• To-do lists & checklists
• Personal diary & planning
• Ideas & reminders
• Drawings, sketches & handwritten notes

title: Smart Notebook - Cute Notes
description:
Smart Notebook - Cute Notes is a digital notebook designed to help you note taking for your thoughts, ideas, and tasks in a fun and easy way. With its cute notebook design and user-friendly interface, you can stay organized while enjoying the process. Whether you're making to-do lists, taking school notes, or planning your day, this app provides all the tools you need to stay productive and creative.

Key Features of the cute note - note taking apps:

📒 The app offers an easy-to-use interface, making note-taking and organizing your thoughts quick and simple. You can create, view, and manage your notes without any hassle.

📝 Choose from a variety of templates that are perfect for different needs, such as scheduling, list-making, or journaling. Each template is customizable to suit your preferences, helping you organize your notes better.

📚 You can create multiple notebooks for different topics or projects, allowing you to keep your notes organized. Customize each notebook with a cover, title, and design that fits your style.

🎨 Add fun stickers and decorations to your notes. The app provides a collection of cute designs, so you can personalize your pages and make note-taking more enjoyable.

🖍️ Use the drawing feature to sketch and make your notes more creative. Whether you're doodling or adding handwritten notes, this tool allows you to express your ideas visually.

🌄 Add beautiful backgrounds to your notes, giving them a unique look. You can choose from various designs that fit your mood or style, making each note visually appealing.

📷 Easily add photos to your notes to complement your thoughts. You can upload images from your gallery to add context and make your notes more informative.

Smart Notebook - Cute Notes is designed to make your note-taking experience more enjoyable and organized. With its simple interface and customizable options, you can easily manage your notes while adding a personal touch.

If you're looking for an app to help you stay organized with a bit of fun, Smart Notebook is the perfect choice. It combines practicality with creativity to help you keep your thoughts in order while enjoying the process.

title: Notes, Notepad, To-Do Launcher
description:
Jot down thoughts, ideas and important information with Notes Launcher. Swipe right from your home screen to create quick notes or to-do lists, share them with friends and family, add locks to secure sensitive information, and more.

Please note: As a launcher app, the layout of your home screen may change after install. Don’t worry, all your apps are still on your phone - they just may be in a different location. To learn more, please visit our FAQ section: https://notepadhome.app/#faq  

With a launcher app, you get the added benefits of: 
🚀 One-swipe access 
Create notes & to-do lists instantly by simply swiping right from your home screen!

📱Home screen widget
See the time, weather, and more, conveniently on your home screen with our customized widget.

🖼️ Wallpaper
Personalize your home or lock screen with a wide selection of beautiful themed wallpapers. 

🏠 Home screen shortcut
Use the Notes Launcher shortcut on your home screen to get quick access to your to-do lists. 

🔍 Multi-touchpoint search 
Apps and web search has never been easier. Search for installed apps or the web (powered by Yahoo) from multiple access points.

Key features:
✓ Note-taking
✓ Text formatting tools
✓ Color-code notes
✓ Lock notes
✓ Categorize
✓ Sort
✓ Find
✓ Share

📝Create notes & checklists: Quickly jot down ideas and important information on the go. Make a grocery list, a wish list, or a to-do list, then check off items as you accomplish them.

✨Text formatting tools: Enhance your notes with the rich-text editor. Change font sizes, italicize or underline text, and create bulleted or numbered lists.

🎨 Color-code notes: Choose a note color to easily categorize and prioritize information. Whether it’s managing work tasks or weekend plans, color-coding makes organizing your notes easier.

🔐 Lock notes: Secure sensitive information like passwords, bank account details, medical prescriptions and more in a locked note.

🗂️ Categorize: Save notes under custom categories like vacation checklists or emergency contacts. Group related notes together to instantly access them at any time.

🚦 Sort: Use the sorting filter to arrange notes by the date they were modified or in ascending/descending order of creation to easily find what you need.

🕵️ Find: Quickly find what you’re looking for with Notes Launcher’s intuitive search feature. Enter a keyword or phrase in the app’s search bar to quickly locate relevant notes.

🤝 Share: Planning a travel itinerary? Working on a group project? Share your notes with family and friends through email, social media and other messaging apps.
It’s simple, effective, and free to use, helping you stay organized every day. Get started with the Notes Launcher today!
Please write to us should you have any queries or comments about the app, including recommendations for new features. Also, please note that you can uninstall it at any time.

You give your consent to install Notes Launcher from the Google Play™ Store by clicking the button above. You also agree to this app's Terms and Conditions & Privacy Policy.

Google Play is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of it here does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by Google LLC.

Explore our FAQ section to find helpful information: https://notepadhome.app/#faq
For questions or feedback, reach out to us through our contact form: https://notepadhome.app/contact-us

Terms of Service - https://notepadhome.app/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy - https://notepadhome.app/privacy-policy

title: Smart Notebook
description:
Smart Notebook is useful Notebook application which is powered with OCR(Optical Character Recognition). Ocr is one of the efficient way to detect image text and extract it for us. This way we can get image text then store it in the Notebook quickly.

For instance, while reading a book you come across with important information and you want to save it. In this section you can take a photo. But photos require much more storage in your device unnecessarily. Smart Notebook capture only text with OCR. By the way Smart Notebook usage is as simple as taking photo. Smart Notebook provides user friendly features.

Finally, Taking note and Capturing image text to Notebook quickly these features will be provided by Smart Notebook. Smart Notebook can be used by everyone, especially by student.

title: StarNote: Handwriting & PDF
description:
StarNote: Your Next-Gen Digital Note-Taking App
Tired of slow, limited note-taking apps that demand expensive monthly fees? StarNote Notebook is engineered for students and professionals. We deliver unparalleled, low-latency handwriting that truly mimics paper on Android tablets. The best part? StarNote offers a simple one-time purchase for lifetime access—NO expensive subscriptions ever!
⭐ Stop searching for a Goodnotes alternative, Notability alternative, or Notewise alternative. StarNote is the feature-rich digital notebook built to be the industry leader on Google Play!
---
We prioritize efficiency and powerful tools for serious note takers. StarNote’s features are designed to significantly boost your productivity:

🚀 Ultimate Handwriting & Infinite Canvas
- True Pen Feel: Proprietary Ink Engine delivers highly responsive, low-lag handwriting for your stylus pen. Experience the best digital writing on your tablet.
- Infinite Scroll: Say goodbye to page boundaries! Our infinite canvas provides limitless space for mind maps, detailed sketches, and extensive project notes.
- Versatile Toolkit: Multiple pen types (fountain, ballpoint, highlighter) with customizable colors and thickness to perfect your digital journaling.

✨ Pro-Level Creation & Page Management (Unmatched Features)
- Layered Design: Advanced note layers let you separate annotations, images, and text onto distinct layers, simplifying complex digital planning and design projects.
- Seamless Expansion: Revolutionary page extension lets you instantly expand your handwritten notes in any direction—ideal for long meeting notes or spontaneous ideas.
- Pro Layout: Use layers and infinite page space to easily create sophisticated electronic planners or complex academic papers.

📘 PDF Annotation & Study Toolkit
- Deep PDF Annotation: Import PDF documents, textbooks, or work reports. Easily highlight, markup, and add your handwritten notes and text boxes directly onto the file.
- Smart Organizer: Robust file management system: folders, tags, and powerful search to keep study notes and work documents perfectly sorted.
- Quick Capture: Instantly import content (web pages, images) for immediate annotation on your digital notepad.

💡 Smart Backup & Data Security
- Intelligent Layout: Automatic beautification of handwriting and correction of shapes makes your final notebook look polished and professional.
- Cloud Sync & Backup: Seamlessly sync all your handwritten notes across multiple devices with cloud backup (Google Drive integration). Your data is always safe.
- Export Ready: Export your digital notes in various formats like PDF, PNG, and JPEGs for easy sharing and printing.

💎 Value & Creativity Hub (Unbeatable Price & Assets)
- Lifetime Access: No Subscription Fees! Get lifetime access to all Pro features with a single, affordable payment, unlike expensive subscription apps.
- Rich Asset Center: Access a massive, ever-growing library of FREE templates, professional stickers, and digital paper to customize your electronic planners without limits.
---
StarNote is the digital organizer for every user:
- Students: Ideal for lecture notes, creating flashcards, and comprehensive PDF study annotations.
- Professionals: Essential for swift meeting minutes, project management, and rapid handwriting ideation.
- Creators: The perfect digital journal, sketchbook, and planner tool.

【Important Feedback Channel】
We value every user's suggestion. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for StarNote, please contact our dedicated team directly via the App: Settings ➡️ Help & Feedback. Your input drives us to be the best note-taking app on Android!
StarNote is the premier Goodnotes alternative, Notability alternative, and Notewise alternative on Google Play. It provides the professional features you need, without the expensive subscription model. Download now to experience the ultimate handwriting app designed for your success.

title: AI Note Taker
description: AI Note Taker is a powerful smart note app that uses AI to help you record, transcribe, summarize, and organize information effortlessly. Just hit record — and let the AI convert your voice into text , generate transcripts, summaries, action items, and highlights in seconds. Perfect for meetings, lectures, interviews, podcasts, brainstorming sessions, team discussions, creators, students, and professionals who need fast and accurate notes. 🔥 Key Features AI Voice to Text: Ultra-accurate AI transcription. AI Auto Summary: Generate summaries, bullet points, action items, and highlights. Record & Transcribe: High-quality audio recording with instant text output. Upload Files: Import audio, video, PDF, DOCX, video links and get transcripts & summaries. You can get document transcript, document summary, record summary in a seconds Multi-Language Support: Transcribe and summarize in 100+ languages. Easy Export: Export notes to PDF or share with one tap. 🎯 Perfect for Every Use Case Meeting Notes AI – Record meetings, get instant summaries & action items. Lecture Notes – Students can convert classes into searchable text. Voice Memos – Capture ideas quickly with AI organization. Podcast & Interview Transcription. Video Transcript Generator. Document AI Summary – Summarize PDF, DOCX, online articles, and long documents. 📌 Why Choose AI Note Taker? Save hours of manual note-taking Accurate AI transcription even in noisy environments Clean, minimal interface with fast performance Advanced AI engine updated continuously Ideal for productivity, studying, and work

title: AI Note Taker – Smart Notes
description:
AI Note Taker: The Smarter Way to Capture Ideas

Turn audio, video, YouTube, podcasts, and text into instant AI-powered notes. 

You’re in class, at a meeting, or studying from videos, AI Note Taker 
automatically records, transcribes, and summarizes everything so you never miss a detail.

Key Features
- Voice & Audio Notes: Record conversations, lectures, and meetings with instant AI transcripts.  
- Video & YouTube Notes: Import videos or links and get clear, structured summaries.  
- Podcast & File Support: Upload MP3s, PDFs, or documents and generate smart notes.  
- AI Summaries & Action Points: Get highlights, tasks, and key takeaways in seconds.  
- Search & Ask Your Notes: Interact with your notes to extract insights instantly.  
- Multi-Language Support: Works with 50+ languages for global learning and work.  
- Export & Share: Save notes as PDF, text, or share them with classmates and colleagues.

Perfect For
- Students & Lecturers: A powerful lecture note taker that creates study guides and flashcards.  
- Professionals: Smart meeting note taker that captures action items and follow-ups.  
- Content Creators: Summarize YouTube videos, podcasts, and interviews in seconds.  
- Everyone: Keep organized notes, synced across devices, searchable, and secure.

Why Consider AI Note Taker?
- Most searched keywords covered: AI note taker, note taking, lecture note taker, voice note taker  
- Accurate AI transcription & summarization  
- Easy to use with multiple input sources  
- Private & secure storage of your notes

Stop writing notes manually, let AI work for you. 
Download AI Note Taker today and experience the future of smart note taking.

title: PandaDoc: eSign & Track Docs
description:
PandaDoc’s mobile app offers easy access to your documents - anywhere, anytime. Not at your desk? Not a problem. Just open the mobile app to create, edit, send, and eSign documents right from the palm of your hand.  PandaDoc gives you the power to start and complete contracts, proposals, quotes, and more in a flash. Start working more efficiently today with PandaDoc’s mobile app. 

Key Features

• Complete and eSign documents for free

title: pdfFiller Edit, fill, sign PDF
description:
pdfFiller is your go-to Android app for all things PDF! Complete, edit, and create PDF documents even while on the go. pdfFiller is more than just a PDF reader – it's a PDF editor, document scanner, PDF maker, form builder, and eSignature solution all rolled into one.

Easy Document Editing and Creation 📝✨

Use pdfFiller’s mobile app to edit PDFs, fill out forms, sign documents, and even make your own forms to collect data and signatures online. Simply tap your screen to type anywhere on your document, highlight or blackout text, add an image, erase content, and more. You can also create forms from anywhere using our offline form builder.

Built-in PDF Scanner 📲🔍

Forget about hassling with traditional scanners. Simply scan PDF files with your phone. With pdfFiller's scan to PDF feature, you can quickly scan documents using your mobile camera. Transform any paper document into a clean PDF scan that you can edit or sign in seconds.

Full-featured eSignature Solution ✒️✅

Need to sign a document on the fly or collect a few signatures? pdfFiller lets you quickly fill and sign your documents while ensuring their legal validity. No more print-sign-scan routines! You can also send a document for signature in a role-based order or instantly share a form via URL.

Convenient Document Access and Export Options 💾➡️

Accessing and exporting your documents is a breeze with pdfFiller. Upload documents from various sources, including your device, email, or cloud storage services. Once you’ve finished editing, export your documents in multiple ways: print, email, fax, or send them for signature.

A Library of Forms at Your Fingertips 📄👀

Looking for tax forms or industry-specific document samples? pdfFiller has you covered! The app features an online library of over 35 million forms, allowing you to find templates and fillable forms in seconds. You can then fill and sign forms directly in the PDF editor – no need to print!

Secure Cloud Storage 🔒☁️

The security of your documents is paramount. pdfFiller offers secure, unlimited cloud storage for your documents with data encryption, password protection, and signer authentication. Access your documents from any device and rest assured your work is always within reach.

Offline Editing 🌐💼

Even without an internet connection, you can edit PDFs regardless of location. Your work is automatically synced once you’re back online.

Try pdfFiller Today – Edit PDF Free! 👍💰

Experience the ease and convenience of pdfFiller by starting your free 30-day trial. Enjoy access to our PDF editor and doc scanner app and discover how simple it is to write on PDF, edit documents, sign documents, and more!

*The free PDF editor is only available to new accounts within the stipulated trial period.

**Please note that you can only export your edited documents after registering an account with pdfFiller.

Terms of use: https://www.pdfFiller.com/en/terms_of_services.htm

Your feedback is important to us. Please email your comments to support@pdfFiller.com.
