title: Transcriber - Speech to Text
description: Transcriber is the Speech to Text app that can transcribe from audio. It can be used in a variety of situations because it can transcribe with the industry's highest level of accuracy. Use Transcriber to transcribe meeting minutes and interviews. Speech to Text are also useful for reviewing lectures and learning foreign languages. Transcriber Usage Scenes ・ Meeting minutes ・ Interviews ・ Review of lectures ・ Foreign language study Transcriber Permissions The following permissions are required to use this app. We will not use the permissions for any other purposes, so please use Speech to Text with confidence. ・ Microphone (Record audio) ・ Storage (Loading audio) Transcriber Security This app is released after checking that there are no safety issues with all six types of security software from different vendors with each update. Please use Speech to Text with confidence. Please use Transcriber in a variety of situations!

title: AI Transcribe Audio to Text
description:
Transcribe audio to text effortlessly with Stenote AI Notetaker, the most accurate AI note taker and speech-to-text app. Record and transcribe meetings, lectures, and conversations into AI-generated summaries, meeting minutes, and detailed notes.

An easy AI Speech To Text app for transcribing speech of any length, from just a few seconds to many hours long. Using the latest speech to text AI models, Stenote will transcribe speech and create a summary, smart chapters, meeting minutes and meeting notes automatically in a few seconds.

Transcribe audio, video and YouTube to text in realtime or upload an audio file with AI. Transcribe podcasts, lectures, work meetings, school events or virtual meetings. Dial in to Google Meet, Teams or Zoom with Stenote.

Listen back to your recorded audio and follow the audio transcript word for word as it highlights each section with human levels of accuracy.

Download your transcript or summary in PDF, Plain Text, SRT, VTT or JSON. Allowing you to import it into most applications or share the recorded audio as an MP3.

Super simple user interface. Just hit the big record button and watch it transcribe audio. Then save your recordings to your library to review later, with no annoying pop ups, ads or interruptions.

I’m an indie app developer, so listen to all your feedback. Email me and I will respond to any queries and or add any features upon request!

Turn your audio into something useful with Stenote, and stop focusing on capturing notes and free your mind up so you can be part of the conversation.

Concise, well written summaries of your meetings, identify who’s speaking and generate actionable insights and takeaways automatically and share them with your colleagues.

Stenote is great for business meetings, school, university lectures, doctors appointments or anything where you need to stay engaged but still capture what happened.

For students

Record and transcribe classes and lectures with clear quality, even when the teacher is not right in front of you. Listen and follow along to these recordings as many times as you want to help you study for that next exam. Speed up or slow down playback to listen at a comfortable pace.

With no time limits and the option to choose a compressed format, it's easy to record the longest classes and lectures.

For business

Capture interviews and meetings from your phone or tablet, generate notes and an audio transcript then share them with your colleagues through email or your favorite messaging app.

No ads and no subscription required.

title: AI Smart Note Taker - Notedy
description:
NOTEDY - AI NOTE TAKER: YOUR SMART SECOND BRAIN

Notedy is your all-in-one AI tool to capture, summarize, and organize information from meetings, lectures, recordings, videos, websites, and PDFs. Powered by AI, it transcribes speech, summarizes content, and helps you learn faster — your ultimate second brain for study, work, and life.

► CAPTURE & TRANSCRIBE INSTANTLY
- Record meetings, lectures, or spontaneous voice notes and let Notedy automatically transcribe audio to text.
- Our advanced AI recorder turns your voice or video content into accurate, structured notes. Say goodbye to manual typing - capture ideas as they happen.


► SMART MEETING NOTES
- Notedy is your AI Meeting Note taker that listens, records, and generates meeting summaries automatically.
- From audio recording voice notes to turning full conversations into searchable transcripts and summaries, you'll always have key decisions and action items at hand.

► LECTURE CAPTURE MADE SIMPLE
- Use Notedy as your AI Lecture Note Taker to turn educational videos or class recordings into concise notes, flashcards, or quizzes.
- Just paste a YouTube URL or upload an audio file to instantly generate structured summaries - perfect for students who want to learn visually.

► TURN ANY CONTENT INTO NOTES
- Upload a video, paste a website URL, import a PDF, or simply record your voice - Notedy transforms it all into written notes.
- Our AI Note Taker creates flashcards, mind maps, and quizzes automatically from what you input.

► LEARN VISUALLY & REVIEW SMARTER
- Boost your learning experience through auto-generated flashcards, AI quizzes, and colorful mind maps.
- Whether it's lecture summaries or meeting transcripts, Notedy helps you engage and retain knowledge with visual tools that reinforce memory.

► SUMMARY & HIGHLIGHTS POWERED BY AI
- Use smart summary features to digest long texts or videos quickly.
- Notedy automatically extracts key points and generates highlights, which is perfect for reviewing content or sharing insights with your team. It combines note recorder power with AI summarization.

► SUPPORTS 100+ LANGUAGES
Notedy supports over 100 languages for transcription, AI note taking, and video summarization - ideal for global teams and international students.

► NEVER TAKE NOTE AGAIN
- Study smarter, work faster, live better.
- Download Notedy and let AI be your second brain!

title: AI Writer - Write Better
description:
What is AI Writer?
AI Writer is an advanced artificial intelligence tool that can write various types of content, including articles, emails, product reviews, and descriptions. It can also generate social media captions, YouTube video topics, and Quora answers. With features like AI ads writing, grammar correction, translation, and creative writing prompts, AI Writer makes content creation easy and efficient.

If you're looking for a writing tool that can help you produce engaging and unique content with ease, look no further than AI Writer by ChatGPT. Our innovative app harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to give you the tools you need to create high-quality writing, no matter your skill level.

With AI Writer, you can generate ideas and brainstorm new topics, all while benefiting from advanced natural language processing algorithms that analyze your writing style and suggest improvements. Whether you're writing fiction, non-fiction, or blog posts, our app provides a range of writing prompts and templates to help you get started.

In addition to its writing assistance features, AI Writer also includes  sentence restructuring, and keyword suggestions to ensure your content is polished and optimized for search engines. This powerful combination of features saves you time and effort, making it easier than ever to create compelling content that resonates with your audience.

AI Writer by ChatGPT is the perfect tool to take your writing to the next level. Download the app today and start creating your best work yet!

Article writer: Generates unique and high-quality articles on various topics using AI technology.
Email writer: Helps users create professional and effective emails for different purposes, such as business communication, marketing campaigns, and personal correspondence.
Product review writer: Generates persuasive and informative product reviews for e-commerce sites, social media, and other platforms.
Product description writer: Helps users create compelling and accurate product descriptions that can increase sales and engagement.
AI ads writer: Generates catchy and effective ads for different platforms, such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and Instagram Ads, using machine learning and natural language processing.
Social media caption writer: Generates engaging and creative captions for social media posts, such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
YouTube video topic generator: Provides users with topic ideas for their YouTube videos based on different criteria, such as keywords, trending topics, and user preferences.

Grammar solver: Helps users improve their writing by identifying and correcting grammatical errors, spelling mistakes, and other issues.
AI translator: Translates text from one language to another using advanced machine learning models and natural language processing.
QA: Provides users with answers to different questions on various topics using AI-powered algorithms.
Creative writer: Helps users find inspiration and generate new ideas for their creative writing projects, such as poetry, fiction, and non-fiction.

AI Writer: Your AI-powered chat companion! Enhance your writing with our intelligent chatbot AI. Get personalized suggestions, prompts, and corrections from our AI talker. AI Chat: Engage in AI-driven conversations to brainstorm ideas, seek writing advice, and get instant feedback.

descriptionHTML:
What is AI Writer?
AI Writer is an advanced artificial intelligence tool that can write various types of content, including articles, emails, product reviews, and descriptions. It can also generate social media captions, YouTube video topics, and Quora answers. With features like AI ads writing, grammar correction, translation, and creative writing prompts, AI Writer makes content creation easy and efficient.

If you're looking for a writing tool that can help you produce engaging and unique content with ease, look no further than AI Writer by ChatGPT. Our innovative app harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to give you the tools you need to create high-quality writing, no matter your skill level.

With AI Writer, you can generate ideas and brainstorm new topics, all while benefiting from advanced natural language processing algorithms that analyze your writing style and suggest improvements. Whether you're writing fiction, non-fiction, or blog posts, our app provides a range of writing prompts and templates to help you get started.

In addition to its writing assistance features, AI Writer also includes sentence restructuring, and keyword suggestions to ensure your content is polished and optimized for search engines. This powerful combination of features saves you time and effort, making it easier than ever to create compelling content that resonates with your audience.

AI Writer by ChatGPT is the perfect tool to take your writing to the next level. Download the app today and start creating your best work yet!

Article writer: Generates unique and high-quality articles on various topics using AI technology.
Email writer: Helps users create professional and effective emails for different purposes, such as business communication, marketing campaigns, and personal correspondence.
Product review writer: Generates persuasive and informative product reviews for e-commerce sites, social media, and other platforms.
Product description writer: Helps users create compelling and accurate product descriptions that can increase sales and engagement.
AI ads writer: Generates catchy and effective ads for different platforms, such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and Instagram Ads, using machine learning and natural language processing.
Social media caption writer: Generates engaging and creative captions for social media posts, such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
YouTube video topic generator: Provides users with topic ideas for their YouTube videos based on different criteria, such as keywords, trending topics, and user preferences.

Grammar solver: Helps users improve their writing by identifying and correcting grammatical errors, spelling mistakes, and other issues.
AI translator: Translates text from one language to another using advanced machine learning models and natural language processing.
QA: Provides users with answers to different questions on various topics using AI-powered algorithms.
Creative writer: Helps users find inspiration and generate new ideas for their creative writing projects, such as poetry, fiction, and non-fiction.

Boost your productivity and skills with our chat feature. Experience the power of AI-driven conversation and elevate your writing with AI Writer. Download now and unleash your creativity!

AI Chat: Engage in AI-driven conversations to brainstorm ideas, seek writing advice, and get instant feedback.

descriptionHTML:
Write without limits with QuillBot. Your all-in-one AI assistant for Android.

QuillBot makes writing, editing, and communicating effortless. Our free AI app combines a Paraphraser, Grammar Checker, Translator, and AI Detector with generative AI features—and now document management—so you can write and save your work anywhere, never losing progress.

Paraphrase, fix mistakes instantly, detect AI content, translate in seconds, generate ideas, and more—all in one workspace.

With tools to manage documents and create on the go, QuillBot is your complete AI writing assistant—helping ensure your content is clear, correct, and compelling.

🚀Key Features:
Paraphraser, Grammar Checker, Translator, and AI Detector.

AI Paraphrasing Tool
Rephrase sentences in 2 free modes and 8 Premium modes to enhance clarity, adjust tone, and more

AI Grammar Checker
The free Grammar Checker eliminates mistakes, using AI to ensure suggestions are accurate.

AI Content Detector
The AI checker scans your writing and quickly reports which parts of your text may be flagged as AI-generated.

Translator
Instantly translate text in 40+ languages, including Spanish, French, German, and English.


Paraphrasing Tool Modes Include:

Free
Standard: Rephrase text with new vocabulary and word order
Fluency: Improve the clarity and readability of text

Premium
Natural: Rephrase text in a more human, authentic way
Formal: Rephrase text in a more sophisticated way
Academic: Express text in a more technical and scholarly way
Simple: Present text in a way that’s easy to understand
Creative: Rephrase text in an original and innovative way
Expand: Increase the length of text
Shorten: Convey the meaning of text concisely
Custom mode: Rewrite text to match the unique description provided

How the Keyboard App Works:

Download from the Play Store, create an account, and allow keyboard access to improve your writing everywhere.

How the AI Writing Assistant Works:

The AI writing assistant is a floating widget that works across all your apps, helping you write error-free, paraphrase, translate, and generate text instantly. Best of all: you can keep your preferred keyboard and still get QuillBot support anywhere you write.

✨QuillBot Premium: Ready to take your writing to the next level?

Premium unlocks unlimited words, advanced sentence recommendations, 10+ modes, and more. Learn more at quillbot.com/premium.


Why Choose QuillBot?

We’re the best paraphrase tool, AI checker, language translator, and grammar-checking app on the market.

✅Comprehensive: Go beyond autocorrect and strengthen the impact of your writing
✅Customizable: Make your sentences stand out with 10+ rewriting modes
✅Flexible: Create unlimited different paraphrasing styles with Custom mode
✅Accurate: Improve your writing with a rephraser trained by expert linguists
✅High quality: Feel confident your rewrites are clear and grammatically correct
✅Multilingual: App, assistant, and keyboard support English, German, French, and Spanish.
✅Detailed: Receive in-depth feedback on your content with AI Detector
✅Fast: Get instant results from our sentence checker, AI Detector, Translator, and Paraphraser
✅Free: Get a grammar check, 2 paraphrasing modes, Translator, and AI Detector at no cost

App Privacy and Data Safety: The security of your personal data is one of QuillBot’s top priorities. To learn more about our privacy policy, visit quillbot.com/privacy. Read our full Terms and Conditions at https://quillbot.com/terms.

Accessibility permission is used to process text written in apps and provide you with tailored writing assistance. We also use this permission to turn QuillBot on when you’re typing in apps.

Communicate with confidence. Download QuillBot today to paraphrase, fix typos, and write flawlessly anywhere.

title: Quizlet: More than Flashcards
description:
Quizlet gives you study tools that teach you — not just tell you the answer — so you can walk into every test with confidence.

Your personalized feed recommends exactly what to study next, powered by your courses, your school and what students like you are studying now. Jump in faster with Study Bites: bite‑sized suggestions, progress updates and content tailored to your learning goals.

Turn your notes into study materials
* Turn class notes into practice tests, study guides and flashcards so you can review your material in the way that works best for you
 * Create flashcards from scratch or let AI generate a deck from your study materials

Flashcards that fit your routine
* Discover millions of flashcard sets created by students and teachers
* Sort cards into Know and Still learning to track progress
* Save decks for offline access and study anywhere

Practice that adapts to you
* Turn any flashcard set into practice questions to reinforce knowledge
* Study with multiple choice, true/false and written questions
* Quizlet adapts based on what you know and what needs more work
* Seamlessly pick up where you left off across all your devices

Exam‑ready tests
* Simulate test day with a personalized practice test generated from any flashcard set
* Customize the number of questions and formats to challenge yourself in different ways
* Get instant scoring and feedback to spot gaps and build confidence

Homework help when you need it
* Expert‑authored, step‑by‑step solutions to tough homework problems
* Check your work in challenging subjects like Calculus, Chemistry and Electrical Engineering
* Use AI‑powered support to unpack each step or explore alternative approaches

Study together
* Collaborate with classmates by matching strengths and weaknesses
* Share decks, get help on tough topics and master material faster

Quizlet is the all-in-one study tool for language learning, vocabulary and test prep.

Quizlet Plus subscriptions will be charged to your Google account. Your monthly or annual subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in your Account Settings after purchase. Some features may not be available in your country or region.

Terms of Service: https://quizlet.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://quizlet.com/privacy

title: Read AI: Meeting Notes
description: The Read AI mobile app puts the power of Read’s AI assistant right in your pocket, so you can capture audio—whether you’re in a meeting, on the move, or catching up after hours—and easily chat with all of your workplace data. Record all the details from your Android device and turn conversations into actionable insights. Meeting in person? Open Read AI, hit record, and skip manual note-taking. When your conversation ends, you’ll get a comprehensive report and be able to ask your entire knowledge graph questions about all of your work. Live Transcription & Summaries Get accurate, concise summaries and transcripts, so you always know what was discussed. Stay focused on what matters and never wonder, “What did we talk about?” Unique Speaker Detection Read AI identifies each speaker, making it easy to distinguish who said what in every conversation. Generate AI Insights Use Search Copilot to instantly search across your meetings, projects, emails, and messages. Find decisions, action items, and key topics in seconds—no more digging through notes or inboxes. Seamless Integration Connect Gmail, Outlook, Slack, Microsoft Teams, and more to generate even richer insights and make Read AI your single source of truth. Notifications Never miss a meeting or report. Get Android notifications for upcoming meetings, new reports, and recaps before recurring meetings. Read AI is the fastest-growing independent work AI platform designed to help everyone work smarter and get more done. With features including world-class meeting notes and coaching, connected enterprise search, summaries of emails and messages, and proactive recommendations, our AI Copilot makes it easier to keep track of the details and move faster towards success. Trusted by millions worldwide, Read AI transforms daily work into insights and actions that propel you forward, faster.

title: HiNoter - AI Note Taker
description:
HiNoter helps you capture every idea — automatically recording, transcribing, and summarizing meetings, lectures, and interviews so you can stay focused on what truly matters.
With one tap, HiNoter records crystal-clear audio, generates accurate transcripts with speaker labels, and creates concise summaries and AI-powered mind maps. Ask questions like “What were the main takeaways from today’s team meeting?” and get instant, intelligent answers.

Why HiNoter?
●Stay focused — Be present in the moment while HiNoter takes perfect notes for you.
●Save hours — Get AI-generated summaries and mind maps that help you see the big picture instantly.
●Search smarter — Type a keyword to jump straight to that moment in your audio.
●Collaborate easily — Share recordings and notes with your team whenever you want.
●Your data, your control — HiNoter protects your recordings with enterprise-grade security, and sharing is always your choice.

Who Uses HiNoter?
●Professionals: Capture meetings, action items, and client discussions.
●Students: Record and review lectures and study sessions.
●Researchers & Journalists: Transcribe and organize interviews.
●Everyone: From brainstorming to voice memos, HiNoter handles it all.

Key Features
●One-tap recording and AI transcription
●HiNoter automatically joins your calendar meetings to record and summarize
●Upload audio files or YouTube links for instant transcription
●Speaker identification with high accuracy
●AI-generated summaries and mind maps
●Ask AI anything about your recordings
●All your recordings and notes are securely encrypted

Subscription Plans:
Description: This is a continuous subscription service (Weekly / Yearly). During the subscription period, users can access all features of the app without limitation.
Payment: Once the purchase is confirmed, the corresponding fee will be charged from the user's iTunes account.
Auto-Renewal: 24 hours before the current subscription period ends, Apple will automatically charge the corresponding fee from your iTunes account to renew the plan (weekly or yearly). Once the renewal is successful, your membership will be extended for the next billing cycle.
Cancellation: To avoid being charged for the next cycle, please cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the current period expires. After cancellation, no further charges will be made.

Terms of Service: https://recorder.nieruo.com/agreement/terms-of-service.html
Privacy Policy: https://recorder.nieruo.com/agreement/privacy-policy.html

Payment: Once the purchase is confirmed, the corresponding fee will be charged from the user's iTunes account.
Auto-Renewal: 24 hours before the current subscription period ends, Apple will automatically charge the corresponding fee from your iTunes account to renew the plan (weekly or yearly). Once the renewal is successful, your membership will be extended for the next billing cycle.
Cancellation: To avoid being charged for the next cycle, please cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the current period expires. After cancellation, no further charges will be made.

Terms of Service: https://recorder.nieruo.com/agreement/terms-of-service.html
Privacy Policy: https://recorder.nieruo.com/agreement/privacy-policy.html

title: Samsung Notes
description:
Samsung Notes can create and edit documents on mobile, tablet, or PC and collaborate with others.
User can add annotations to the PDF using S Pen and create documents with images or voices.
It can also be used by connecting documents with various apps such as PDF, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, etc.

Try creating a new note. 
You can create a new note by tapping + in the bottom right corner of the main screen. 
Newly created notes will have the “sdocx” extension. 

Protect your notes. 
1. On the main screen, tap More Options in the upper right corner, select Settings, then select Lock Note. 
Then select a note locking method and password. 
2. Lock the notes you want to protect by tapping More Options on the screen of the note you want to protect and selecting Lock Note. 

Create handwritten notes. 
Tap the Handwriting icon while writing a note. Your handwriting will be displayed directly on the note. 

Add photos. 
Tap the photo icon in the note you are working on to take a photo. You may also load, add tags to and edit an existing photo. 

Add a voice recording. 
By tapping the Voice Recording icon while writing a note, you can record sound and create a note with sound. 

Try using various writing tools. 
By tapping the Pen icon while writing a note, you can select a variety of writing tools such as pens, fountain pens, pencils, highlighters, etc., as well as various colors and thicknesses. 
By tapping the Eraser icon, you can select and erase content that you want to remove. 

You can import notes and memos created in Notes and Memo. 
By using the Smart Switch feature, you can import data created in S Note and Memo saved on other devices. 
You can also import previously created notes and memos with your Samsung account. 


* Notice regarding app access permissions:

The following access permissions are required to provide you with this service.
Basic features of the service can be used even if Optional permissions are not granted.

[Optional permissions]
• Camera : Used to add pictures and scanned documents to notes
• Files and media : Used to save or load document files (Android 12)
• Microphone : Used to add voice recordings to notes 
• Music and audio : Used to add audio to notes (Android 13)
• Notifications : Used to notify you about invitations to shared notes, note syncing issues, and more (from Android 13)
• Photos and videos : Used to add pictures and videos to notes (Android 13)
• Storage : Used to save or load document files (Android 9~11)

You can still use the app's basic functions without allowing the optional permissions.

title: Typi AI - Writing Assistant
description: Get instant AI help anywhere you type. Just add @typi, @fix, @emoji, or @translate at the end of any text, and let Typi do the rest. WHY TYPI? • Works in ANY app (WhatsApp, Gmail, Twitter, Instagram, messaging apps) • No keyboard switching—stay in your flow • Multiple commands: @fix (grammar), @emoji (suggestions), @typi (AI reply), @translate (language) • Fast and lightweight • Free to use PERFECT FOR: ✓ Writing better emails ✓ Fixing typos instantly ✓ Adding personality with emojis ✓ Getting quick AI responses ✓ Translating texts on the fly HOW IT WORKS: 1. Install Typi 2. Grant accessibility permission (required to observe your typing) 3. Type in any app → add command → get results instantly Privacy first: Your data is your business. Typi processes requests securely. Your privacy matters. Typi uses accessibility services to help you write better. Learn more in our privacy policy.

title: Notebooks Pro
description:
***Now backup/restore to Google Drive/Dropbox***

Take notes and even attach your free hand drawing, everything in style and completely without papers!
Create multiple notebooks for every subject and avoid messing up your notes.
Notebooks is the only application you will ever need for all your note making needs. 
Designed with flexibility and ease of use in mind, taking notes is now at it simplest with our application. With multiple colors and custom title for each notebook cover, you will enjoy creating a notebook for every subject you want.
Notebooks is a must have application for students, business men and for anyone using their phones and tablets for taking notes.


*The permissions GET_ACCOUNTS and INTERNET is to communicate with the Google Drive to backup the data. We do not store your account details in the app.

Features:
1. Create multiple notebooks.
2. Customizable cover, title, number of pages and page style for every notebook.
3. Password protection along with Fingerprint unlocking.
4. Set a title for every page.
5. Instant search within each notebook. 
6. Attach image files.
7. Bookmark a page.
8. Create your own free hand drawing.
9. Easily find your entries.
10. Custom fonts for each notebooks.
11. Set theme for each notebook.
12. Export the entire book or a page to a PDF with attachments. (Currently supports English only)
13. Apply text styles such as Bold, Italics and Colored-Highlights.
14. Backup/Restore. (option available in the menu of the Notebooks screen)
15. Backup data to Google Drive (Works on devices with OS higher than  version 2.2)
16. Fingerprint unlock with password protection. 

FAQs: http://www.droidveda.com/faq/faq_notebooks.html

How to use?
1. Use '+' mark in the home screen to create new books.
2. Long tap on any book to edit/delete the book.
3. Use 'Password' option to set/reset the password.
4. On the Page tap on Page Header to set the Title for the page.
5. Make use of different editing options provided at the bottom of the page.

title: Smart Writer: AI Writer
description:
Smart Writer Ai can help you be more productive and write smarter. Whether crafting the perfect tweet or writing an email or blog post, Smart Writer can assist you in every aspect of content creation. Powered by artificial intelligence, Smart Writer provides support with spelling, grammar, and word choice, offering valuable insights into your writing assignments' structure and phrasing. Additionally, it helps create intelligent social media posts, attention-grabbing headlines, and convincing arguments.

Discover the amazing Smart Chat+ feature in Smart Writer AI, an incredible chatbot that's as good as or even better than ChatGPT Plus! Smart Chat+ is designed to make chatting a breeze, giving you lifelike conversations, understanding context, and offering natural, flowing responses. You can ask anything from trivia and general knowledge questions to advice on various topics. Get ready to level up your communication game with Smart Chat+ and enjoy exciting new possibilities in your professional and personal life!

The fastest, easiest way to craft top-quality content. Smart Writer will write for you! It can help you write a eulogy, write an article, write a book report, compose a sales pitch, or compose a text message.
Benefits:
- Craft social media posts 10X faster.
- Write blogs, articles, emails, ad copies, etc. within minutes.
- Produce content that is more engaging and on-brand.
- Get help with ideas, structure, and tone.
- Communicate your ideas more effectively than ever before.
- Impress your audience with high-quality writing.
- Strengthen your writing confidence with expert-level guidance.
- Customize the writing tone to suit various platforms and audiences.
- Multi-language support to help you write in various languages.
- Stay focused on your ideas while the app handles grammar and punctuation.
- Optimize content for search engines (SEO) to increase visibility and traffic.

Whether you're working on an essay, a novel, or even a social media post, Smart Writer AI has the tools you need to succeed. Download it now and start writing like a pro with the power of Artificial Intelligence!

title: ColorNote Notepad Notes
description:
ColorNote® is a simple and awesome notepad app. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and to-do lists. Taking notes with ColorNote® Notepad is easier than any other notepad or memo pad app.

* Notice *
- If you cannot find the widget, then please read the FAQ below.
- When you're finished using the notepad, an automatic save command preserves your individual note.

* Product Description *
ColorNote® features two basic note taking formats, a lined-paper styled text option, and a checklist option. Add as many as you want to your master list, which appears on the app's home screen each time the program opens. This list may be viewed in traditional ascending order, in grid format, or by note color.

- Taking a Note -
Serving as a simple word processing program, the text option allows for as many characters as you're willing to type. Once saved, you can edit, share, set a reminder, or check off or delete the note through your device's menu button. When checking off a text note, the app places a slash through the list's title, and this will be displayed on the main menu.

- Making To-do List or Shopping List -
In the checklist mode, you can add as many items as you'd like and arrange their order with drag buttons activated in the edit mode. After the list is finished and saved, you may check or uncheck each line on your list with a quick tap, which will toggle a line slash. If all items have been checked, then the list's title is slashed as well.


* Features *
- Organize notes by color (color notebook)
- Sticky note memo widget (Put your notes on your home screen)
- Checklist notes for To do list & Shopping list. (Quick and simple list maker)
- Checklist notes to get things done (GTD)
- Organize your schedule by note in calendar
- Write a diary and journal in calendar
- Password Lock note : Protect your notes with passcode
- Secured backup notes to SD storage
- Supports online back up and sync. You can sync notes between phone and tablet.
- Reminder notes on status bar
- List/Grid View
- Search notes
- Notepad supports ColorDict Add-on
- Powerful task reminder : Time Alarm, All day, Repetition.(lunar calendar)
- Quick memo / notes
- Wiki note link : [[Title]]
- Share notes via SMS, e-mail or Twitter

* Online backup and sync cloud service *
- Notes will be encrypted before uploading notes by using the AES standard, which is the same encryption standard used by banks to secure customer data.
- It does not send any of your notes to the server without you signing in.
- Sign-in with Google or Facebook.

* Permissions *
- Internet Access: For online backup & sync notes
- Storage :  For backup notes to the storage of the device
- Prevent phone from sleeping, control vibrator, automatically start at boot: For reminder notes

* FAQ *
Q: How do you put a sticky note widget on the home screen?
A: Go to the home screen and hold down your finger on an empty space and choose widget, Color Note will then be desplayed so you can stick on the page. 

Q: Why don't the widget, the alarm and notes remider functions work?
A: If the app is installed on the SD card, your widget, reminder, etc. will not work properly because Android doesn't support these features when installed on an SD card! If you have already moved the app to an SD card, but want those features, then you have to move the app back on the device and reboot your phone.

Settings - Applications - Manage Applications - Color Note - Move to Device

Q: Where are backed up notes data on the SD card?
A: '/data/colornote' or '/Android/data/com.socialnmobile.dictapps.notepad.color.note/files' on SD card 

Q: I forgot my master password. How can I change it?
A: Menu → Settings → Master Password → Menu Button → Clear Password. You will lose your current locked notes when you clear the password!

Q: How can I create todo list note?
A: New - Select checklist note - Put items - Save. Tap an item to strikethrough.

title: SummarizeX: AI Note Taker
description:
SummarizeX is your smart AI partner for real-time transcription and actionable summaries. Whether you’re in a meeting, class, or brainstorming session, SummarizeX helps you capture what matters and turn it into organized insights—fast and effortlessly.

• Record conversations, lectures, and discussions
• Instantly get clear, accurate summaries and transcripts
• Easily organize and access your recordings anytime

KEY FEATURES
One-Tap Recording
• Start recording with a single tap
• Pause, resume, rename, and multitask while recording—even in the background

Real-Time Transcription
• Get fast and accurate speech-to-text results using AI
• Supports multiple accents and languages

AI-Powered Summaries
Automatically generate short and meaningful summaries using three unique AI actions:
• Overview and Key Points – Gives a quick high-level recap and bullet points summarizing the most important takeaways.
• Lecture Mode: Summarizes long content into structured, readable notes
• Detailed Summary: Captures in-depth context and key takeaways
• Action Items Only: Extracts tasks, decisions, and follow-ups

Smart Organization
• Group and manage notes with folders and custom titles
• Quickly find what you need using in-app search

Multi-Format Export
• Export your summaries as PDF or plain text
• Share instantly via email, WhatsApp, Slack, and more

Privacy & Control
• Your data is encrypted and secure
• You can delete your summaries or your account at any time

Perfect For
• Students & Educators – Convert lectures into ready-to-use study material
• Professionals & Teams – Capture meeting insights without missing details
• Coaches & Consultants – Turn conversations into polished action points

Why SummarizeX?
• Save hours of manual note-taking
• Stay focused while SummarizeX captures everything
• Turn long discussions into clear summaries in seconds
• Clean, secure, and built for productive work

Try SummarizeX now — it’s fast and easy.

Privacy Policy: https://summarizex.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://summarizex.ai/terms

title: NoteX: AI Note Taker, Notebook
description:
NoteX is a revolutionary AI-driven notebook and note-taking app designed to make your note-taking smarter, faster, and more organized. Whether you’re a professional looking to capture meeting notes, a student in need of study notes, or a creator transforming ideas into content, NoteX has you covered. With features like real-time voice-to-text transcription, AI Notebook, and meeting minutes generation, this app ensures that no important detail is ever missed.

AI Note Taker, AI Notebook, and Voice Notes AI

Key Features and Benefits AI Note Taker & AI Notebook NoteX offers a comprehensive range of features to streamline your note-taking and boost productivity. Here’s what you can expect:  Voice Notes AI - Audio Note Taker Record, transcribe, and create meeting minutes with 99% accuracy. Say goodbye to missed details during meetings or lectures and effortlessly capture everything with Voice Notes AI.  Meeting Notes & Minutes & Summaries Automatically generate comprehensive meeting minutes and actionable items with the help of AI. This saves you time and ensures you never miss important details during meetings.  AI Notebook - Organized Knowledge in One Hub  Organize all your knowledge in one intelligent, searchable hub, making it simple to find and revisit past notes. The AI Notebook keeps your information neatly categorized and easily accessible. Visual Insights - Visualize Your Meeting Notes & Study Notes Turn your notes into mind maps, enabling you to visualize complex ideas and concepts for a deeper understanding.  AI Shorts - Video AI Note Taker Convert your notes into engaging audio and video summaries, perfect for sharing with colleagues or fellow learners.  Study Notes - Make it easy with audio note taker Create flashcards and quizzes directly from your notes, boosting learning and retention while making study sessions more interactive and efficient.  AI Note Taker Translation Break language barriers by translating your notes into multiple languages, sharing your insights globally.  Cross-Platform Sync - Acces Your AI Notebook Anywhere Access your voice notes AI anywhere, on all your devices, ensuring productivity wherever you go. NoteX - AI Note Taker is designed for a wide range of users: * Professionals: Capture accurate meeting minutes, action items, and key discussions with ease. NoteX automatically organizes all your meeting data and ensures nothing gets lost. * Students: Create study notes by turning lectures into easily accessible notes. The AI note taker organizes and links your notes for efficient studying, while flashcards and quizzes enhance exam prep. * Creators: Transcribe interviews, brainstorm ideas, and organize your research into actionable content. NoteX helps you create scripts for podcasts, videos, or articles. Why Choose NoteX - AI Notebook? Unlike traditional note-taking apps, NoteX leverages AI to enhance your productivity. It’s not just about capturing text — it learns your patterns, organizes information, and offers valuable insights. Whether you’re recording meeting notes, transcribing lectures, or managing research, NoteX turns your notes into a powerful tool for learning and growth. It’s the smarter way to take notes, collaborate, and track your ideas. Make your note-taking process faster and more efficient with AI Notebook, AI Note Taker, and Voice Notes AI. With study notes and meeting notes perfectly integrated, NoteX is all you need to organize your knowledge. Our Privacy Policy: https://notexapp.com/privacy Our TOS: https://notexapp.com/tos Got ideas or feedback? We're eager to listen at hello@notexapp.com

title: Speech To Note - Voice To Text
description:
Speech To Note – Transform Your Voice into Perfect Notes

Turn your voice into organized, professional notes with AI-powered precision!

Ever wish you could capture your thoughts, ideas, or reminders effortlessly, without needing to type? Meet Speech To Note, the ultimate AI-powered speech-to-text converter that transforms your spoken words into accurate, well-organized notes with remarkable precision!

🎯 Why Choose Speech To Note?
Speech To Note provides a seamless experience for transforming speech into professional-quality text. With advanced AI speech recognition technology, this app ensures your words are captured perfectly and converted into organized notes instantly.

⭐ Key Features
🎤 Instant Speech-to-Text Conversion - Say goodbye to typing! Just speak, and let our advanced AI do the work.

📝 30+ Professional Formats - Transform your speech into emails, meeting notes, blog posts, social media content, newsletters, and more.

🌍 60+ Languages Supported - Enjoy smooth speech-to-text conversion in various languages, perfect for multilingual users.

🎯 AI-Powered Accuracy - Cutting-edge AI speech recognition technology ensures your notes reflect exactly what you said.

📱 Works Everywhere - Offline recording capability means you never miss an important thought. Import audio from any messaging app or audio file.

✏️ Easy Editing and Organization - Quickly edit, categorize, and organize your notes. Add keywords, set categories, and make notes searchable.

🎨 Custom Formats (Pro+) - Create your own personalized formats tailored to your specific needs and workflow.

🗣️ Format on the Go (Pro+) - Generate new formats instantly using just your voice - no typing required!

💼 Perfect for Various Uses
👨‍🎓 For Students - Record lectures, capture study notes, or transcribe research interviews.

🏢 For Professionals - Ideal for meeting notes, brainstorming sessions, client feedback, or creating professional emails on-the-go.

✍️ For Creatives - Writers, journalists, and content creators can quickly capture ideas, storylines, or creative thoughts.

📋 For Everyday Life - Perfect for grocery lists, reminders, personal journaling, or capturing ideas on the move.

🚀 Proven Success & User Love
⭐ 4.5 Rating on Play Store with 33+ reviews  
🏆 2x Top 5 Product of the Day on ProductHunt  
👥 7000+ Users and growing  
🎤 1000+ Hours of voice transcribed daily  
📈 20-25 New Users joining daily

💬 What Users Are Saying
"This is a new must have tool! Now I can speak my thoughts and Speech to Note automatically organizes my thoughts and writes a professional email or other format." - Jacek

"Speech To Note revealed its value by offering a range of unique utilities. This app is more than just an AI tool; it's a versatile asset that I'm now excited to have in my toolkit." - Steve

📱 How to Get Started
- Open the App: Launch Speech To Note and tap the record button
- Start Speaking: Share your thoughts, ideas, or instructions aloud
- Choose Format: Select from 30+ professional formats
- Edit and Save: Review, customize, and organize your perfectly formatted notes
- Share or Export: Save locally or share with others instantly

🎉 Ready to Revolutionize Your Note-Taking?
Join thousands of users who've discovered the power of voice-to-text innovation. Download Speech To Note today and experience the future of productivity.

Transform your voice. Organize your thoughts. Amplify your productivity.

Speech To Note – Your Essential Speech-to-Text Companion

Speech To Note – Transform Your Voice into Perfect Notes

Turn your voice into organized, professional notes with AI-powered precision!

Ever wish you could capture your thoughts, ideas, or reminders effortlessly, without needing to type? Meet Speech To Note, the ultimate AI-powered speech-to-text converter that transforms your spoken words into accurate, well-organized notes with remarkable precision!

🎯 Why Choose Speech To Note?
Speech To Note provides a seamless experience for transforming speech into professional-quality text. With advanced AI speech recognition technology, this app ensures your words are captured perfectly and converted into organized notes instantly.

⭐ Key Features
🎤 Instant Speech-to-Text Conversion - Say goodbye to typing! Just speak, and let our advanced AI do the work.

📝 30+ Professional Formats - Transform your speech into emails, meeting notes, blog posts, social media content, newsletters, and more.

🌍 60+ Languages Supported - Enjoy smooth speech-to-text conversion in various languages, perfect for multilingual users.

🎯 AI-Powered Accuracy - Cutting-edge AI speech recognition technology ensures your notes reflect exactly what you said.

📱 Works Everywhere - Offline recording capability means you never miss an important thought. Import audio from any messaging app or audio file.

✏️ Easy Editing and Organization - Quickly edit, categorize, and organize your notes. Add keywords, set categories, and make notes searchable.

🎨 Custom Formats (Pro+) - Create your own personalized formats tailored to your specific needs and workflow.

🗣️ Format on the Go (Pro+) - Generate new formats instantly using just your voice - no typing required!

💼 Perfect for Various Uses
👨‍🎓 For Students - Record lectures, capture study notes, or transcribe research interviews.

🏢 For Professionals - Ideal for meeting notes, brainstorming sessions, client feedback, or creating professional emails on-the-go.

✍️ For Creatives - Writers, journalists, and content creators can quickly capture ideas, storylines, or creative thoughts.

📋 For Everyday Life - Perfect for grocery lists, reminders, personal journaling, or capturing ideas on the move.

🚀 Proven Success & User Love
⭐ 4.5 Rating on Play Store with 33+ reviews
🏆 2x Top 5 Product of the Day on ProductHunt
👥 7000+ Users and growing
🎤 1000+ Hours of voice transcribed daily
📈 20-25 New Users joining daily

💬 What Users Are Saying
"This is a new must have tool! Now I can speak my thoughts and Speech to Note automatically organizes my thoughts and writes a professional email or other format." - Jacek

"Speech To Note revealed its value by offering a range of unique utilities. This app is more than just an AI tool; it's a versatile asset that I'm now excited to have in my toolkit." - Steve

📱 How to Get Started
- Open the App: Launch Speech To Note and tap the record button
- Start Speaking: Share your thoughts, ideas, or instructions aloud
- Choose Format: Select from 30+ professional formats
- Edit and Save: Review, customize, and organize your perfectly formatted notes
- Share or Export: Save locally or share with others instantly

🎉 Ready to Revolutionize Your Note-Taking?
Join thousands of users who've discovered the power of voice-to-text innovation. Download Speech To Note today and experience the future of productivity.

Transform your voice. Organize your thoughts. Amplify your productivity.

title: Cute Notes Notebook & Organize
description:
The notepad must be on your phone. Cute Notes help you arrange, organize, and simplify your life, work, or homemaking. It also combines features such as a Calendar, to-do list, and weather to help you manage it all in one place.

Cute Notes is not only easy to use but also super cute to help you have a relaxing and comfortable moment when using the application. It also helps form good habits of taking notes on things and organizing your life better. 

This app comes with an aftercall feature, giving you the ability to, among other things, access your calendar, create a note, a todo item, a voice note etc. after each phone call, so you never forget to schedule an appointment or forget anything while your memory is still fresh. It also gives you an overview of your upcoming events and tasks.

Cute Notes has almost a whole range of features from basic to advanced. You can use it in any situation such as: 
- Work notes : Take work or meeting notes with file attachment (everything), meeting recording and interpreting it
- Housewife or childcare chores or weekly meal planning: the calendar, to-do list, and shopping list feature makes it easy to check and execute. 
- Study notes with handwriting, drawing, and stickers like a real study notebook

Detailed features will be listed below:

1. Notes
- Write or handwrite your ideas. 
- Draw and attach stickers with +500 Stickers. 
- Recording and interpretation of the recording.
- Clip your favorite article or website to save to notes quickly 
- Attach photos, documents, business cards, etc.
- Decorate your Notes with +100 Background Effect 
- Split by category, a reminder 
- Print PDF 
- Highlight, change the font

2. To-do List 
- Plan tasks by day, week, month 
- Task reminder notifications
- Statistics and reminders of unfinished tasks 
- Division of tasks with colors

3. Calendar 
- Sync with Google Calendar 
- View in multiple Modes Day, Month, Year 
- Smart reminder of events 
- Remind by Alarm of important events
- Create a Countdown of important events 
- Decorate the calendar with +10 Background Effect 
- Create your calendar with your images

4. Weather Features 
- See the weather right on the calendar to make your significant day perfect

5. Widget: more than 7 types of widgets Notes, Monthly Calendar, Calendar Day, To-do list 
6. Backup and sync with all your devices (Android)
7. Private lock helps you protect your privacy 
8. Dark mode

Your privacy comes first. All your data is saved on your machine and no need to log in to the account when using the application. When deleting the application, all data will be lost unless backed up. 

If you want to back up or sync data with multiple devices, use the backup & sync data feature through Google Driver. And this feature needs a VIP upgrade.

Leave lots of reviews to get to know you better. Thereby increasingly improving the product that serves you best.

title: Squid: Take Notes, Markup PDFs
description: Transform your note-taking experience with Squid! For over 12 years, Squid has been a trusted app with over 12 million installs, helping users replace paper, save money, and reduce waste. Write just like you would on paper on your Android tablet, phone, or Chromebook! ✨ Key Features: • ✍️ Natural Writing: Seamlessly write with a pen and erase with your finger on active pen enabled devices like Samsung devices with S Pen. Use your finger or capacitive stylus on other devices. • ⚡ Low Latency Ink: Enjoy a seamless and responsive writing experience with support for low latency ink¹. • 🔒 Private: Notes are stored on your device and are completely private. No account or sign-in required. Backup your notes to your desired location. • 📝 PDF Markup: Easily annotate PDFs, fill out forms, edit/grade papers, and sign documents. • 🧰 Versatile Tools: Use any color pen or highlighter, import images, draw shapes, and add typed text. • 📁 Organize: Select, copy/paste, and move content between pages and notes. Place notes in folders to stay organized. • 📊 Presentations: Turn your device into a virtual whiteboard and cast your notes to a TV/projector. • 📤 Export: Export notes as PDFs, images, or Squid Note format and share or store in the cloud. • 💰 Save: Reduce stationery costs and replace paper notebooks with Squid for eco-friendly note-taking! 🏆 Awards/Recognition: • 🌟 Featured App and Editors' Choice in Google Play • 📈 Category Honorable Mention for Productivity in the Samsung Galaxy Note S Pen App Challenge • 🎉 Popular Choice Award in the Dual Screen App Challenge 👑 Squid Premium: • Premium paper backgrounds: math, engineering, music, sports, planning, & more • Import and markup PDFs • Additional tools: highlighter, true eraser, shapes, text • Backup/restore and bulk export notes as PDFs to Google Drive, Dropbox, or Box 🛠️ Base Features: • Vector graphics engine keeps your notes beautiful at any zoom level and on any device • Various paper backgrounds (blank, ruled, graph) and sizes (infinite, letter, A4) • Erase entire letters or words quickly with the stroke eraser • Undo/redo, select, move, and resize • Change color and weight of selected items • Cut, copy, and paste items between notes • Two-finger scroll, pinch-to-zoom, and double tap for quick zoom • Sort and organize notes and folders • Import, crop, and resize images • Export notes to PDF, PNG, JPEG, or Squid Note format • Share notes via email, Google Drive, Evernote, etc. • Multi-Window support (take notes while watching a video) • Shortcuts to create new notes or open folders • Dark theme 🎓 Google Workspace for Education customers can purchase Squid Premium in bulk at https://squidnotes.com/edu 🐞 If you encounter any bugs, please email us at help@squid.app with a description. 💡 We would love to hear your feedback or feature requests at https://idea.squidnotes.com ¹Low latency ink is available now on Chromebooks and coming soon to Android devices. 🎯 Increase your productivity and unleash your creativity with digital handwritten notes. 👉 Try Squid for FREE today!
descriptionHTML:
Transform your note-taking experience with Squid! For over 12 years, Squid has been a trusted app with over 12 million installs, helping users replace paper, save money, and reduce waste. Write just like you would on paper on your Android tablet, phone, or Chromebook!

✨ Key Features:

• ✍️ Natural Writing: Seamlessly write with a pen and erase with your finger on active pen enabled devices like Samsung devices with S Pen. Use your finger or capacitive stylus on other devices.
• ⚡ Low Latency Ink: Enjoy a seamless and responsive writing experience with support for low latency ink¹.
• 🔒 Private: Notes are stored on your device and are completely private. No account or sign-in required. Backup your notes to your desired location.
• 📝 PDF Markup: Easily annotate PDFs, fill out forms, edit/grade papers, and sign documents.
• 🧰 Versatile Tools: Use any color pen or highlighter, import images, draw shapes, and add typed text.
• 📁 Organize: Select, copy/paste, and move content between pages and notes. Place notes in folders to stay organized.
• 📊 Presentations: Turn your device into a virtual whiteboard and cast your notes to a TV/projector.
• 📤 Export: Export notes as PDFs, images, or Squid Note format and share or store in the cloud.
• 💰 Save: Reduce stationery costs and replace paper notebooks with Squid for eco-friendly note-taking!

🏆 Awards/Recognition:

• 🌟 Featured App and Editors' Choice in Google Play
• 📈 Category Honorable Mention for Productivity in the Samsung Galaxy Note S Pen App Challenge
• 🎉 Popular Choice Award in the Dual Screen App Challenge

👑 Squid Premium:

• Premium paper backgrounds: math, engineering, music, sports, planning, & more
• Import and markup PDFs
• Additional tools: highlighter, true eraser, shapes, text
• Backup/restore and bulk export notes as PDFs to Google Drive, Dropbox, or Box

🛠️ Base Features:

• Vector graphics engine keeps your notes beautiful at any zoom level and on any device
• Various paper backgrounds (blank, ruled, graph) and sizes (infinite, letter, A4)
• Erase entire letters or words quickly with the stroke eraser
• Undo/redo, select, move, and resize
• Change color and weight of selected items
• Cut, copy, and paste items between notes
• Two-finger scroll, pinch-to-zoom, and double tap for quick zoom
• Sort and organize notes and folders
• Import, crop, and resize images
• Export notes to PDF, PNG, JPEG, or Squid Note format
• Share notes via email, Google Drive, Evernote, etc.
• Multi-Window support (take notes while watching a video)
• Shortcuts to create new notes or open folders
• Dark theme

🎓 Google Workspace for Education customers can purchase Squid Premium in bulk at https://squidnotes.com/edu

🐞 If you encounter any bugs, please email us at help@squid.app with a description.
💡 We would love to hear your feedback or feature requests at https://idea.squidnotes.com

¹Low latency ink is available now on Chromebooks and coming soon to Android devices.

🎯 Increase your productivity and unleash your creativity with digital handwritten notes. 👉 Try Squid for FREE today!

title: NoteLyn: AI Note Taker & Study
description:
Stop struggling with messy notes and endless reading. NoteLyn AI is your all-in-one AI note taker to transcribe lectures & meetings, summarize key points, and instantly create flashcards and quizzes. Turn audio, PDFs, links, images, and YouTube videos into clear, structured study notes in seconds.

Built for learning and work. Capture information fast, understand it faster, and review with a complete study loop — summaries → flashcards → quizzes → spaced repetition.

AI Note Taker · Transcribe · Summarize · Flashcards
 • All-in-One AI Note Taker 
   — Create clean, structured notes from audio, PDFs, web links, and images. A reliable study helper and homework helper.
 • Transcribe & Summarize 
   — High-quality transcription with speaker labels/diarization. Get key points, takeaways, action items, and timelines in seconds.
 • Complete Study Loop 
   — Auto-generate flashcards and quizzes; track progress with spaced repetition to remember longer.
 • Lecture & Meeting Ready 
   — Record live or import files to produce meeting minutes with decisions, tasks, and highlights.
 • Mind Maps 
   — Visualise concepts and relationships; export as an image.
 • OCR & PDF Reader 
   — Extract text from images; parse PDFs and recognise headings, tables, and figures.
 • Video & Link to Notes 
   — Paste a YouTube or article link to pull subtitles and main ideas for clean, ad-free summaries.
 • Search, Tags & Sync 
   — Full-text search, folders, and tags with cloud sync across devices.

6 Ways to Capture
 • Record & Transcribe 
   — Noise-reduced recording with live preview; pause/resume; speaker diarization.
 • Upload Audio 
   — MP3, WAV, M4A and more; batch processing supported.
 • Import PDF 
   — Intelligent structure detection with preview before import.
 • Add Links & Videos 
   — Extract subtitles and chapter summaries.
 • Image to Text (OCR) 
   — Fast, multi-language OCR; scan mode for multi-page documents.
 • Type Freely 
   — Rich text editor with lists, tables, and inline code.

Learn Smarter, Not Harder
 • AI Summaries that Teach 
   — Definitions for key terms with highlighted formulas and examples.
 • Flashcards & Quizzes 
   — Interactive cards and mixed-type questions with explanations.
 • AI Q&A on Your Notes 
   — Ask questions and get contextual answers with citations to your sources.

Perfect For
 • Students & Self-Learners 
   — Lecture notes, textbook chapters, revision and exam prep.
 • Professionals & Teams 
   — Meeting minutes, brainstorms, trainings, and action items.
 • Teachers & Researchers 
   — Faster literature reviews and shareable handouts.

Plans & Pricing
 • Free — Monthly limits for transcription and AI processing.
 • Premium — Unlimited usage, no ads; weekly, monthly, or yearly plans.

Stop just taking notes. Start understanding your information.
Download NoteLyn AI and turn information into understanding—fast.

Privacy Policy: https://notelyn.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://notelyn.com/terms-of-service
Contact us: support@notelyn.com

summary: Transcribe lectures & meetings, auto-summaries, flashcards, quizzes, mind maps.
description_text: Stop struggling with messy notes and endless reading. NoteLyn AI is your all-in-one AI note taker to transcribe lectures & meetings, summarize key points, and instantly create flashcards and quizzes. Turn audio, PDFs, links, images, and YouTube videos into clear, structured study notes in seconds.Built for learning and work. Capture information fast, understand it faster, and review with a complete study loop — summaries → flashcards → quizzes → spaced repetition.AI Note Taker · Transcribe · Summarize · Flashcards • All-in-One AI Note Taker — Create clean, structured notes from audio, PDFs, web links, and images. A reliable study helper and homework helper. • Transcribe & Summarize — High-quality transcription with speaker labels/diarization. Get key points, takeaways, action items, and timelines in seconds. • Complete Study Loop — Auto-generate flashcards and quizzes; track progress with spaced repetition to remember longer. • Lecture & Meeting Ready — Record live or import files to produce meeting minutes with decisions, tasks, and highlights. • Mind Maps — Visualise concepts and relationships; export as an image. • OCR & PDF Reader — Extract text from images; parse PDFs and recognise headings, tables, and figures. • Video & Link to Notes — Paste a YouTube or article link to pull subtitles and main ideas for clean, ad-free summaries. • Search, Tags & Sync — Full-text search, folders, and tags with cloud sync across devices.6 Ways to Capture • Record & Transcribe — Noise-reduced recording with live preview; pause/resume; speaker diarization. • Upload Audio — MP3, WAV, M4A and more; batch processing supported. • Import PDF — Intelligent structure detection with preview before import. • Add Links & Videos — Extract subtitles and chapter summaries. • Image to Text (OCR) — Fast, multi-language OCR; scan mode for multi-page documents. • Type Freely — Rich text editor with lists, tables, and inline code.Learn Smarter, Not Harder • AI Summaries that Teach — Definitions for key terms with highlighted formulas and examples. • Flashcards & Quizzes — Interactive cards and mixed-type questions with explanations. • AI Q&A on Your Notes — Ask questions and get contextual answers with citations to your sources.Perfect For • Students & Self-Learners — Lecture notes, textbook chapters, revision and exam prep. • Professionals & Teams — Meeting minutes, brainstorms, trainings, and action items. • Teachers & Researchers — Faster literature reviews and shareable handouts.Plans & Pricing • Free — Monthly limits for transcription and AI processing. • Premium — Unlimited usage, no ads; weekly, monthly, or yearly plans.Stop just taking notes. Start understanding your information.Download NoteLyn AI and turn information into understanding—fast.Privacy Policy: https://notelyn.com/privacy-policyTerms of Service: https://notelyn.com/terms-of-serviceContact us: support@notelyn.com

title: Text Summarizer: Short summary
description:
Make an effort to do better text summary. Boost your output! All of this may be done using the  text summary app, an effective tool that creates a summary of everything. It is very important to use a tool that can perform effective summarization. The quality of the summarization depends on the performance of the tool. 

What Is Text Summarizer AI or resoomer?
It is an AI-based program that summarizes large texts into shorter ones. The most important sentences in a summarized document are generally included in the summary. Text Summarizer AI may condense three or four paragraphs into one.

Why Summarizing Tool Is Important?
When reading long posts on a smartphone, it's challenging. A huge screen is commonly used to format content. Smartphone users are forced to undertake a tiresome mix of magnification and swipe motions in order to read the content on their devices. As the narrative progresses, commercials begin to appear. 

Text Summary app allows the phone user to swiftly grasp essential ideas in the information that was meant to be read on a bigger display. It provides a succinct description that is simple to read and adapted for smartphones and tablets.

What to Expect from Text Summarizer?
The summarization process is automated. Users are free to leave the tool to their own devices. This is what makes the tool different from human summarizers. It is not easy to do the job manually. 

Human summarizers are often under-qualified and lack the skill to condense lengthy texts. Text Summarizer AI, on the other hand, is an automated tool that is easy to use. It is simple to operate. It is not difficult to understand the instructions. It is also easy to understand. 

Text Summarizer AI is effective. It can condense large texts into shorter ones. It is also effective at generating text summary of long text.

Other Features

Choose the Percentage of Summarization:
This tool has an advanced summarization function. It is possible to choose the percentage of summarization and specify the number of sentences in a summary. The tool will condense the document into the specified percentage. 

Free Text Summarizer:

Text Summarizer AI is free to use. There is no cost involved. You do not need to purchase the tool in order to use it. It is easy to install and easy to use.

Quick and Safe:

The summarization process is fast and safe. It is not a risky operation. You do not have to worry about your device being damaged or your information being lost. The tool is user-friendly. 

Achieve Reliable Outcomes:

This automatic Text Summarizer has a built-in verification feature. It can identify and highlight any errors in the summary. The errors are identified using a machine learning algorithm. The tool is also able to correct the errors automatically. It is possible to identify and correct errors manually.

Use Offline:

You can use the free text summarizer app offline as well. The strong summarizer and paraphraser feature of this app make it unique. 
Summarize Links and URLs from Other Apps:
This tool can be used to summarize links and URLs from other apps. It is possible to summarize a link from a browser or from another app. The summary can be shared via email, social media, or other platforms.

So, get this app today and start summarizing the long texts on your smartphone.

description:

Always secure and private: Rest assured that your notes are protected with robust security measures. We prioritize your privacy and ensure your data remains confidential.
Beyond the basics:

Join the thriving community: Connect with fellow "AI Notes" users, share best practices, and discover new ways to harness the app's capabilities.

title: Kilonotes-Notes & Mark up PDF
description:
We sincerely invite you to join us in exploring more efficient ways of taking notes and jointly reshape the modern learning mode. As a companion exploring new ways of taking notes, Kilonotes can meet your various needs, whether it is recording class notes, annotating PDFs, doing test exercises, studying online courses, or organizing reading notes, Kilonotes will be your most reliable study partner.

[Breakthrough the limitations of paper]
- Handwriting can be moved, scaled and rotated freely
- You can undo what you entered
- The size of the eraser can be adjusted to control the erasing range
- Scale paper function to make writing more comfortable
- You can insert pictures or photos, and combine text and pictures to deepen memory
- Quick browsing function to help you quickly find what you need
- Unlimited creation of paper, providing endless memory space
- Recording function, allowing you to take notes while listening to lectures
- Card function, create an exclusive knowledge base, you can create your card through pictures, brushes, and typing
- OCR function, convenient and fast text extraction

[Optimized reading experience]
- Global PDF search, quickly find what you need in the database
- Outline function, convenient and fast positioning
- Multiple reading modes: eye protection, dark color, vision protection
- Quick jump function, enter the page number to quickly navigate
- Translation function to help foreign language literature reading
- Extraction function, easy to collect important information
- PDF extension function, make reading and writing more free

[Beyond the limits of the brush]
- Change brush color, create custom colors, or pick any color with the eyedropper
- Adjustable brush width to adapt to various scenes
- Graffiti pen function, make notes more colorful

[Custom Notebook]
- Provide many unique and beautiful covers for you to choose
- A variety of paper templates are available: blank paper, dot matrix paper, graph paper, to meet your needs
- You can import PDF and record freely in your own notebook

You are more than welcome to contact us : business@top-stack.com

Prices may vary by region. The subscription fee will be charged to the credit card attached to your Google Play account. Where applicable, paid accounts will be automatically renewed when they expire. To cancel a renewal, you can do so up to 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. Unless specified in Kilonotes Terms of Business, subscriptions cannot be cancelled or refunded. After purchase, renewals can be managed in Account Settings.

Privacy policy: https://www.top-stack.com/page/Kilonotes_Privacy_Policy_En.html
The terms of service: https://www.top-stack.com/page/Kilonotes_Terms_of_use_En.html

title: Transcribe audio to text
description:
Transcribe speech to text effortlessly with 1 Transcribe! Our advanced app for transcribing voice to text and transcribing audio transforms your voice or video files into accurately transcribed text. It's also equipped with innovative audio features and AI-powered summaries. With our standout feature of individual speaker identification, it's an ideal choice for transcribing from meetings, interviews, podcasts, and more. Supporting over 100 languages, 1 Transcribe simplifies transcription of conversations from around the globe.

1Transcribe: The Ultimate AI Powered Audio To Text Converter and Productivity Tool

Save time with 1 Transcribe, your all-in-one AI assistant for transcription and AI note-taking. Easily transcribe meetings, convert voice notes and memos to text, and transform videos into written notes. 1 Transcribe combines powerful AI features with convenience and speed for a seamless experience.

Features:
Super High Accuracy in Converting Voice to Text Transcription
With an unrivalled precision for transcribing audio to text, trained on an impressive 680000 hours of multilingual and multitask data. Experience flawless transcriptions each time you use 1 Transcribe.

Import and Transcribe
Easily upload audio and video files for transcription. 1 Transcribe supports multiple formats, catering to a variety of use cases. Whether it's uploading an audio or video file, recording within the app, or importing from YouTube, 1 Transcribe transcribes it into text for straightforward analysis.

Export in Multiple Formats
Download your transcripts in formats like PDF, DOCX, TXT, and SRT, perfect for documentation, sharing, and archiving.

Individual Speaker Recognition for Transcribing
Ideal for group meetings and interviews, 1 Transcribe identifies and tags different speakers in your audio, providing well-structured, easy-to-follow transcriptions.

Uncomplicated Long Audio Transcription
Have lengthy recordings to transcribe? No problem! 1 Transcribe handles long audio files with ease, ensuring all-inclusive and accurate transcriptions.

Engaging Transcribe Audio to Text Experience
Engage with your transcriptions in unique ways. Ask questions about your audio or video, and our AI will generate responses from the content, enhancing your transcription experience.

Translation and Language Support
1 Transcribe supports transcription in over 100+ languages, making it perfect for global users and multilingual environments.

Summarized Transcriptions
Receive the key points and highlights of your audio in a concise, understandable format with 1 Transcribe summary feature.


Broad Language Support for Transcription
With our sophisticated AI technology, transcribe in over 90 languages and dialects effortlessly, perfect for international meetings, research work, and global podcasts.

Use 1 Transcribe for transcribing spoken content from:
○ Meeting Notes
○ Negotiations
○ Interviews
○ Language Studies
○ Podcasts
○ Lectures
And more, all converted into simple-to-read text!

Why Choose 1 Transcribe?
Save Time and Enhance Efficiency: 1 Transcribe’s AI features like the AI assistant, AI chat, and voice memo transcription reduce the time spent on manual note-taking and transcription. Let our AI handle the details while you focus on what matters most.

Versatility Across Formats: Whether transcribing voice notes, converting audio to text, or converting video to text, 1 Transcribe provides a comprehensive solution for all your transcription needs in one intuitive app.


Can I 1 transcribe for free?
Yes! Transcribe unlimited audio and video up to 5 min for free. Easily transcribe audio or video files like Transkriptor, Amberscript, Otter, Temi, Notta, SoundType AI, Turboscribe, Rev.com, or HappyScribe!

descriptionHTML:
Transkriptor: The Ultimate AI-Powered Speech-to-Text App and Productivity Tool

Save time with Transkriptor, your all-in-one AI assistant for transcription and AI note-taking. Easily transcribe meetings, convert voice notes and memos to text, and transform videos into written notes. Transkriptor combines powerful AI features with convenience and speed for a seamless experience.

Key Features of Transkriptor:
★ AI Assistant: Transkriptor’s AI assistant enhances your workflow by generating AI summaries, drafting emails, and converting voice memos into text, helping you efficiently manage and interact with your transcripts.
★ AI Chat: Interact directly with your transcripts using AI chat. Ask questions, extract important details, and get summaries—all through a user-friendly chat interface that saves time and boosts productivity.
★ AI Voice Memos: Automatically transcribe voice memos with AI-powered precision. Capture every detail from your voice recordings, turning them into easy-to-read text that saves time and keeps your notes organized.
★ Convert Voice Notes to Text: Effortlessly convert voice notes to text with high accuracy, supporting various formats like MP3, WAV, and M4A. Ideal for transcribing voice memos, meetings, lectures, interviews, and more.
★ Convert Video to Text: Perfect for creating captions, transcribing video content, or generating notes from webinars and Youtube videos ensuring nothing is missed.
★ Take Notes with Voice:Use Transkriptor’s integrated audio recorder to capture lectures, personal thoughts, or any spoken content directly from your device. Easily take notes with voice, then navigate your recordings and transcripts with AI chat for quick access to key points.
★ Transcribe Voice Memos to Text: Convert voice memos into clear, organized notes with exceptional accuracy. Use our meeting assistant to capture every detail and create knowledge bases from transcriptions, ensuring all important information is documented and accessible.

Why Choose Transkriptor?
1. Save Time and Enhance Efficiency: Transkriptor’s AI features like the AI assistant, AI chat, and voice memo transcription reduce the time spent on manual note-taking and transcription. Let our AI handle the details while you focus on what matters most.
2. Versatility Across Formats: Whether transcribing voice notes, converting audio to text, or converting video to text, Transkriptor provides a comprehensive solution for all your transcription needs in one intuitive app.
3. Flexible and Affordable Plans: Start with our free plan, offering 90 minutes of transcription to explore our features, including AI chat and AI summary.
4. Secure and Private: Transkriptor ensures your data is securely stored and kept confidential, never shared with third parties.

Additional Features to Enhance Your Experience:
※ Import and Transcribe: Easily upload audio and video files for transcription. Transkriptor supports multiple formats, catering to a variety of use cases.
※ Export in Multiple Formats: Download your transcripts in formats like PDF, DOCX, TXT, and SRT, perfect for documentation, sharing, and archiving.
※ Speaker Identification: Automatically tag different speakers in your transcripts, making it easier to follow conversations with multiple voices.
※ Translation and Language Support: Transkriptor supports transcription in over 40 languages, making it perfect for global users and multilingual environments.
※ Organize with AI: Efficiently manage your transcripts with AI-powered folders, tags, and search features to quickly locate what you need.
Get Started with Transkriptor Today!

Can I transcribe for free?
Yes! Sign up to receive free transcription credits. Easily transcribe audio or video files like Amberscript, Otter, Temi, Notta, SoundType AI Rev.com, or HappyScribe!

Convert audio to text
