title: Notepad - Notes、Todo、Memo
description:
Drawings
- You can make sketches, set up ideas, map out trips, and more in your notes whenever you feel inspired. 
Chrome Extraction
- In Chrome, you can easily extract what you want by copying the text then tapping the Notes button.
Managing Tasks Effectively
- You can add To Do widgets to your Home Screen to manage pending tasks at any time.
Local Backup
Never lose your notes again!  Supports Local Backup—safely store your important notes directly on your device, no network required. Your data stays with you, protecting against accidental loss.
descriptionHTML:
Drawings
- You can make sketches, set up ideas, map out trips, and more in your notes whenever you feel inspired.
Chrome Extraction
- In Chrome, you can easily extract what you want by copying the text then tapping the Notes button.
Managing Tasks Effectively
- You can add To Do widgets to your Home Screen to manage pending tasks at any time.
Local Backup
Never lose your notes again! Supports Local Backup—safely store your important notes directly on your device, no network required. Your data stays with you, protecting against accidental loss.

title: Smart Notes AI: Study & PDF
description:
Smart Notes AI – AI Study Notes, PDF & Video Summarizer

Smart Notes AI is an AI note taker and study assistant that helps you summarize PDFs, simplify complex topics, create YouTube notes, and generate professional PDF reports. Chat with documents, build study notes, and learn faster with your personal AI tutor.

Stop wasting hours reading textbooks or watching long videos. Smart Notes AI is a powerful AI summarizer for studying and productivity that turns PDFs, YouTube videos, audio recordings, images, and web articles into clear, structured notes, flashcards, quizzes, and tailored explanations.

1. AI NOTE TAKER & STUDY SUMMARIZER

Create smart study notes automatically from any source:

AI note taker for text, PDFs, images, and web articles

PDF summarizer for textbooks, research papers, and lecture slides

YouTube notes and video summarizer for online courses

Audio notes and lecture notes from recordings and classes

Smart Notes AI extracts key concepts, definitions, formulas, and examples to help you study more effectively.

2. AI EXPLANATIONS: UNDERSTAND ANY TOPIC

Don't just memorize notes—understand them. Our AI Tutor simplifies complex concepts to match your learning style:

Generate tailored explanations for any part of your notes

5 Comprehension Levels: From "Explain like I'm 5" (Beginner) to Professional (Expert)

Simplify technical jargon into easy-to-understand language

Adapt content for Middle School, High School, or College levels

Perfect for breaking down difficult subjects and learning at your own pace.

3. YOUTUBE NOTES & VIDEO SUMMARIZER FOR LEARNING

Turn educational videos into study notes instantly:

Summarize YouTube videos with timestamps

Convert lectures and tutorials into readable notes

Generate study notes from online courses and webinars

Learn faster without rewatching videos

Ideal for students, online learning, and self-study.

4. CHAT WITH PDF, TEXTBOOKS & STUDY MATERIALS

Study smarter by chatting with your documents:

Chat with PDF textbooks, research papers, and notes

Ask AI to explain concepts in simple terms

Get summaries, key takeaways, and definitions

Works with PDFs, web pages, and images

5. PROFESSIONAL PDF EXPORT & SHARING

Turn your digital notes into professional documents:

Export notes as beautifully formatted PDF files

Create high-quality documents for printing or offline study

Share notes easily with classmates, colleagues, or teachers

Perfect for submitting assignments, archiving data, and creating reports.

6. AI TRANSCRIBER, LECTURE NOTES & MEETING NOTES

Turn spoken content into accurate notes:

Record lectures, classes, or meetings

Voice to text transcription with high accuracy

Automatically generate lecture notes and meeting summaries

Supports transcription and translation in 40+ languages

7. STUDY TOOLS: FLASHCARDS, QUIZZES & MIND MAPS

Turn notes into active learning tools:

Generate AI flashcards for spaced repetition

Create quizzes and exam practice questions

Build mind maps to understand complex topics

Improve memory, retention, and exam performance

8. OCR IMAGE TO TEXT FOR STUDY NOTES

Capture study materials anywhere:

Scan whiteboards, textbooks, handwritten notes, and slides

Extract text from images using AI OCR

Convert photos into editable, searchable study notes

9. ORGANIZE STUDY NOTES

Organize notes by subject, course, or project

Pin important study notes for quick access

Search across PDFs, videos, audio, and notes

Sync across phone, tablet, and web


WHO IS SMART NOTES AI FOR?

Students: Simplify complex textbook topics with AI explanations. Create lecture notes, flashcards, and export PDFs for assignments.

Professionals: Take meeting notes, generate summaries, and export professional PDF reports.

Researchers: Analyze papers, chat with PDFs, and break down technical terms with Expert-level explanations.

Lifelong learners: Study new topics from videos and articles with structured AI notes and adaptive learning levels.

title: Voice Notebook speech to text
description:
The speech to text application that allows you to take voice notes and save them locally or send them to cloud services. Suitable for communication with deaf people.

 Supports a customizable list of replaceable words and punctuation for voice input; continuous speech recognition; letter capitalization control; undo command for the last speech input, triggered by a button or by voice.

 Can recognize speech in online and in  offline mode (offline mode not available for some devices and languages). 

 Supports auto punctuation for major spoken languages.

 Notes can be tagged and filtered by tags.

Contains words and characters counter. Convenient for bilingual voice input. Exports notes to Documents or Download folder or sends them to any text program. Can import text files from file managers or Google drive. 

Allows you to save backup copies of notes with a customizable history depth.

When you save notes, you can automatically upload them to Google Drive.

 Has a widget for convenient start. Integrated with Google Assistant,  note recording can be started and stopped by voice.

 The notes can be read aloud by android TTS engine.  

Requirements for work:
1. The application uses default Android speech recognizer and optimized to use voice input from Google, so the device (phone or tablet) must have Google speech recognizer App installed and updated(!)
2. To improve the speech recognition it is desirable to have an Internet connection and also need to install a language pack for local voice recognition. Without a local language pack, if the Internet is lost, the application will stop and give an error. To install the package, read the  application help.


Since version 2.1.5 include Wear OS App.  Wear OS app Includes complication for easy starting.

Premium mode removes ads and unlock settings for: 
Dark Mode (gives you more time for dictation)
 "Always on Screen" mode with non stopping dictation
Setting Predefined email for sending voice notes by minimum clicks
Live word counter
Bluetooth support
Inserting date stamp  in the beginning of new note
Preferred offline mode of speech recognition
Auto punctuation

Premium settings are located at the bottom of the general settings page in the mobile version of the app. Premium mode only applies to the mobile version and does not apply to the Wear OS version.

title: Speech to Text: Transcribe STT
description:
Voiser AI is an advanced speech to text and voice to text solution designed to make transcription effortless, fast, and highly accurate. Whether you need to transcribe audio to text, convert voice memo into written notes, or use live transcribe for real-time speech recognition, Voiser AI delivers the best experience with AI-driven precision.
 
With its powerful speech to text app, Voiser AI ensures that every spoken word is captured accurately, making it an essential tool for professionals, students, and content creators. If you regularly take voice notes, Voiser AI allows you to transcribe speech to text with ease. The dictation speech to text and dictation to text functionalities provide an efficient way to take notes hands-free, ensuring seamless productivity. Whether you're using speech notes, voice transcriber, or speech recorder transcription, Voiser AI guarantees reliable results every time.
 
For those looking for a speech to text app free, Voiser AI offers a high-quality solution without compromising accuracy. Users can quickly convert voice memo to text, allowing them to organize, search, and review their notes effortlessly. Its AI-powered transcriber technology ensures flawless audio transcription, making it perfect for business meetings, academic research, and personal note-taking.
 
With Voiser AI, transcribe audio to text becomes a seamless process. Whether you're a journalist conducting interviews, a student recording lectures, or a business professional managing meetings, Voiser AI provides unmatched efficiency. The transcribe voice notes to text feature allows you to extract meaningful insights from recorded conversations without spending hours manually typing.
 
Voiser AI’s STT (speech-to-text) engine is built to handle different accents and speech patterns with remarkable accuracy. The voice transcriber talk to text feature ensures clear and structured transcription voice, even in noisy environments. Additionally, its speech to text notes feature makes note-taking faster and more organized.
 
For individuals who need an efficient voice typing app, Voiser AI brings the best of AI-driven speech to text technology. Whether you're dictating your ideas or converting spoken words into written form, Voiser AI provides an intuitive interface for maximum convenience. The speech to text app ensures you never lose an important conversation, while the transcriber continuously improves accuracy using machine learning.
 
With the rising demand for speech to text ai, Voiser AI continues to innovate with its AI-powered voice transcribe ai technology. The speech transcribe ai feature enhances the transcribe ai process, making it ideal for business professionals, educators, and content creators alike.
 
The power of speech to text technology is now at your fingertips. Whether you're using dictation to text free, dictation voice to text, or simply need a speech to text app free that meets professional standards, Voiser AI is the ultimate choice. Save time, increase productivity, and experience effortless transcription with Voiser AI.

For more information, visit our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:

Privacy Policy: https://voiser.net/privacy  
Terms of Use: https://voiser.net/terms-of-use

title: ProWrite AI: Writing Assistant
description:
Write Better. Analyze Your CV. Get Results.

"ProWrite AI" is an AI grammar checker, CV analyzer, and writing assistant for students, professionals, and job seekers. It helps you write clear, error-free, and professional content from your phone.

Use ProWrite AI to analyze your CV, fix grammar mistakes, rewrite sentences, and improve emails, essays, and LinkedIn posts in seconds.

---

What You Can Do

• Fix grammar and spelling with contextual AI
• Analyze CVs and resumes for clarity and professionalism
• Write and improve professional emails
• Rewrite resumes and cover letters
• Improve essays and academic writing
• Create LinkedIn posts and professional content

---

How It Works

• Advanced AI grammar checker
• CV and resume analysis with suggestions

• Real-time writing assistance

AI grammar checker
CV and resume analysis
Sentence rewriting
Professional email writing
LinkedIn post creation
Essay support
Tone control
Offline grammar checking

---

"ProWrite AI" is a mobile alternative to desktop grammar tools, built for everyday writing and career growth.

Download now and write clearly and confidently.

title: AI Writer: Essay, Story, Email
description: Write smarter with the help of our fast AI Writer App. It is a one-pack solution to help you write essays, emails, stories, poems, and paragraphs. What is the AI Writer App? Our AI Writer app is designed to help you automatically write various kinds of content including; Essays, Emails, Narratives, Poems, & Paragraphs. This AI Writing app uses the power of innovative LLMs. It deeply understands your content requirements (prompts) to generate tailored, unique, and high-quality content instantly. Whether you’re a professional, poet, story writer, student, or any other writer, this free AI writer app efficiently caters to your needs. With the AI writing app, you can unlock your creativity, brainstorm ideas, and learn different types of writing. Different Tools by AI Writing App Our writing AI app is a toolkit that collects multiple tools in a single place; 1. AI Essay Writer The AI Essay Writer is an innovative Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning based tool designed to write essays of different kinds. Our AI Writer app is designed to help you automatically write various kinds of content including; Essays, Emails, Narratives, Poems, & Paragraphs. title: Office App-Edit Word, PDF file
description:
Office App-Edit Word, PDF file is a swift means of reading and editing Office Word documents such as Doc, Docx, PDFs, XLS, XLSX, and PPT formats on your device. It offers comprehensive support for viewing and editing all Office document. Conveniently browse through your Word document, be it Doc, Docx, XLS, word, PPT, PDFs, or txt files, all from one intuitive platform. 
⭐ While offering the capability to read and edit any word file, the app also facilitates seamless conversion between formats such as .docx, xls, xlsx, ppt, txt, image, and others to PDF. Additionally, it enables the conversion of PDFs to Docx Word file format.📚
 ⭐ With advanced features tailored for text editing, users can easily highlight, annotate, draw, organize, and convert within the Office app. Beyond serving as a PDF reader and docx word file viewer, it encompasses features akin to an Office suite application.

MAIN FEATURES
📑 Simple Interface: Utilize a simple and elegant document reader screen to peruse Office Word document in various formats such as docx, doc, xls, xlsx, ppt, or PDF, complete with essential controls.
🎯 Easy Navigation: Seamlessly navigate through files and word document with essential features like page selection and viewing.
📚 File Management: Access all DOCX, XLS, xlsx, PDF, and PPT files on your device from a single location, streamlining file organization.
🔍 Quick Search: Effortlessly locate desired Word document using the straightforward search option.
🛠️ Essential Options: Enjoy essential options such as renaming, deleting, and sharing within the docx viewer.

📘 Word Document Handling: Read, edit, and create Word documents with ease, whether online or offline. Edit text, annotate, change font styles, sizes, and types, convert to PDF, search for text, and share via email or messaging apps. Support for various Office document formats such as docx, docs, docm, dot, and doc is included.
📕 PDF Reader: In addition to Word document, the Office App serves as a comprehensive PDF reader, facilitating easy viewing and management of PDF documents.
📗 XLSX/XLS Viewer: Access and edit spreadsheets seamlessly within a unified platform. Perform data analysis, calculations, and even convert XLS files to PDF format. Share edited XLS sheets effortlessly with Office app
📙 PPT Viewer & Editor: Utilize the Office app for PPT presentations, offering capabilities for text editing, image insertion, highlighting, drawing, and conversion to PDF. Print and share presentation slides hassle-free with Office app

⭐ Additional Features:

Detailed file information for doc/docx, pdf, xlsx, ppt files.
Sorting options for Word documents by name, date, and size.
Convenient features such as list refreshing, renaming, and a recent tab for quick word document access.
Word Document search and bookmark functionalities.
Download the Office App-Edit Word, PDF file  today to experience seamless Office Word document reader and editor.

Please note that this app is independent and not affiliated with any other brand.
The Office app is a product of Apps by A1, a venture of Rhophi Analytics LLP.

Our team continually strives to enhance your user experience. Your feedback is invaluable to us.
Contact us at rpdev92@gmail.com or p1@a1apps.helpscoutapp.com.

title: IamWriter - AI Assistant
description:
IamWriter is an app that can help you write faster and better by using artificial intelligence to improve all areas of text management and give thorough assistance to effectively manage a variety of text-related tasks, going beyond simple writing.

It ensures your content is clear, precise, and impactful whether crafting an email, creating a social media post, summarizing a YouTube video into text or preparing professional documents (for instance, a cover letter).

• Multilingual Capabilities: You can write and translate text in a variety of languages with ease, communicate without barriers all over the world and make every message matter. This multilingual support is ideal for flawless interactions across cultural divides.

• Efficient Content Creation: Speed up your writing process from quick document preparations to detailed articles, generate ready-to-use content with minimal need for edits. It simplifies creating texts that are not just quick but also consistent, freeing you to focus on core ideas rather than wording.

• Adaptable for All: No matter your expertise in writing, producing professional-quality texts is straightforward. It intuitively guides you through improving your writing style, from beginners to seasoned professionals, enhancing your skills with every use.

Simplified Daily Writing:

• Social Media: Create engaging posts for various platforms like X (former Twitter), LinkedIn, Facebook and Instagram much quicker, with the help of a built-in hashtag generator that enhances visibility with appropriate hashtags, ensuring a lively and effective social presence.

• Special Occasions: Send heartfelt, customized and sincere messages for birthdays or celebrations, all crafted with a personal touch. Additionally, IamWriter can assist with quick and thoughtful replies during challenging moments when finding the right words is tough, effectively answering questions and clearly expressing ideas.

• Work and Academic: Whether you are composing a business email, paragraph, writing an academic essay, or crafting an in-depth article, handle all professional writing with ease while maintaining clarity and proper order.

Powerful Writing Tools:

• Quick Summaries: Transform extensive documents or texts as well as YouTube videos into concise, understandable summaries, perfect for capturing the essence of any material.

• Better Grammar and Accuracy: You can be certain your writing or work is flawless and error-free with real-time grammar checking, accurate translations and capabilities to paraphrase. Refine sentence structures, modify tones, and maximize overall readability with wordtune features — all aligned to improve both the clarity and professionalism.

• Tailored Experience: Use our prompt generator to create personalized, custom prompts for tasks you do often, things like "Dinner suggestions", "Compose a workout plan", etc. This simplifies routine tasks, helping you work faster and save time.

• User-Centric and Simple: With an intuitive interface designed to reduce complexity, easily complete the activities, freeing up more time creating and less time managing tools. Plus, with version tracking, revisit and manage past revisions conveniently to polish your documents to perfection.

Join the Writing Revolution and transform how you write, making every word impactful and every sentence count. Begin today and take your writing to the next level.

title: Notewise - AI Notes, PDF, Docs
description: 🏆 Google Play’s Best of 2024 Winner Notewise is the future of note-taking on Android. Whether you’re sketching diagrams, annotating PDFs, journaling ideas, or building a second brain—Notewise gives you a freeform canvas that feels like pen and paper—supercharged by AI. With Notewise, you don’t just take notes. You create good notes —searchable, flexible, and future-proof. ✨ AI Superpowers for Your Notes Notewise AI makes your notes smarter—without compromising your privacy. • Chat with your notes: ask questions, summarize content, or review key ideas. • Auto-generate guided podcasts from your writing. • Highlight anywhere—typed or handwritten—and ask context-aware questions. • OCR handwriting, scanned documents, and images in 20+ languages. • Make messy scribbles searchable—instantly. 🚫 No data selling. 🚫 No creepy analytics. 🖊️ Handwriting That Feels Like Magic Designed for stylus-first note-takers, Notewise offers: • Ultra-low-latency writing • Reliable palm rejection • Pressure-sensitive pens and smooth highlighters • Realistic stroke stabilization and smart shape assist Whether you're taking class notes or sketching wireframes, it just works. 🛠️ Tools Built for Power Users Use the full toolbox to create your own system of thinking and learning: Pen, Highlighter, Eraser, Lasso, Tape, Shape, Textbox, Image, Audio Recorder, Table, Zoombox, Ruler, Laser Pointer. Create freely. Every tool is fast, fluid, and purpose-built. 🔍 AI OCR: Your Handwriting, Now Searchable • Extract text from handwritten notes, scans, or imported PDFs • Find formulas, quotes, or action items in seconds • Multilingual support for global users • Works across class notes, whiteboards, worksheets, and more 📂 Organize with Confidence • Unlimited folders, tags, and sorting options • Pin recent notes, merge content, reorder pages • Bulk import/export with smart file handling • Color-code and customize your library 🤝 Sync, Collaborate, Share • Real-time collaboration in shared notebooks • Seamless sync across Android, iOS, and Web • Offline-first with automatic cloud sync • Share via URL, QR code, or export to PDF/image formats 🔒 Privacy-First by Design We’re a small, independent team. We don’t sell your data. We don’t show ads. Your notes are encrypted, secure, and under your control. • Choose one-time purchase or subscription • Notewise Cloud unlocks sync, AI, OCR, and collaboration • Use core features for free—forever No paywall for basics. No lock-in. 🚀 Always Getting Better We ship fast: 20+ major updates in the last year. Recent additions include: • Redesigned UI with adaptive layout • Tape tool to hide and reveal content • Tabbed navigation, note linking, shape editing • Table support, image tools, audio export • Recycle bin, page rotation, and more And we're just getting started. ✍️ Take Good Notes Only Notewise is built for thinkers, tinkerers, students, and builders of all kinds. Whether you’re diagramming an idea, revising a lecture, or designing your own productivity system—Notewise adapts to how you think. — Skip the bloat. Keep the power. Build your notes your way—with a tool that respects your privacy. 📥 Download Notewise for free today and experience note-taking that works like code: fast, indexable, and smart.

Whether you're taking class notes or sketching wireframes, it just works.

🛠️ Tools Built for Power Users
Use the full toolbox to create your own system of thinking and learning:

Pen, Highlighter, Eraser, Lasso, Tape, Shape, Textbox, Image, Audio Recorder, Table, Zoombox, Ruler, Laser Pointer.

Create freely. Every tool is fast, fluid, and purpose-built.

🔍 AI OCR: Your Handwriting, Now Searchable
• Extract text from handwritten notes, scans, or imported PDFs
• Find formulas, quotes, or action items in seconds
• Multilingual support for global users
• Works across class notes, whiteboards, worksheets, and more

📂 Organize with Confidence
• Unlimited folders, tags, and sorting options
• Pin recent notes, merge content, reorder pages
• Bulk import/export with smart file handling
• Color-code and customize your library

🤝 Sync, Collaborate, Share
• Real-time collaboration in shared notebooks
• Seamless sync across Android, iOS, and Web
• Offline-first with automatic cloud sync
• Share via URL, QR code, or export to PDF/image formats

🔒 Privacy-First by Design
We’re a small, independent team. We don’t sell your data. We don’t show ads. Your notes are encrypted, secure, and under your control.

• Choose one-time purchase or subscription
• Notewise Cloud unlocks sync, AI, OCR, and collaboration
• Use core features for free—forever

No paywall for basics. No lock-in.

🚀 Always Getting Better
We ship fast: 20+ major updates in the last year. Recent additions include:

• Redesigned UI with adaptive layout
• Tape tool to hide and reveal content
• Tabbed navigation, note linking, shape editing
• Table support, image tools, audio export
• Recycle bin, page rotation, and more

And we're just getting started.

✍️ Take Good Notes Only
Notewise is built for thinkers, tinkerers, students, and builders of all kinds. Whether you’re diagramming an idea, revising a lecture, or designing your own productivity system—Notewise adapts to how you think.

—
Skip the bloat. Keep the power. Build your notes your way—with a tool that respects your privacy.

📥 Download Notewise for free today and experience note-taking that works like code: fast, indexable, and smart.

title: Notebook - AI Notes & Notepad
description:
Take Notes Your Way — With AI and Beyond
Stay  productive and organized with Zoho Notebook — the free note app that lets you capture, plan, and manage everything. Whether you're writing notes, creating a to-do list, setting goals, or drafting a digital diary, this smart notes app is built to match your style — now powered by Notebook AI.

"Google Play Store's Best App of 2017"

*SMART NOTE-TAKING OPTIONS*
-This is not just a simple notepad — it's your all-in-one notes app, memo app, planner, and diary app:
-Create rich text notes with checklists, images, and audio — all in one place
-Build dedicated checklists, to-do lists, and task trackers
-Use voice notes or convert speech to text notes
-Scan textbooks, handwritten notes, or documents into searchable PDFs
-Use the Photo Card to save memories and add images to daily notes
-Upload PDFs, Word files, and more — perfect for organizing ideas

*NOTEBOOK AI – BUILT-IN INTELLIGENCE*
-AI Notes Generator: Create summaries, outlines, or to-do lists from raw ideas instantly.
-AI Meeting Notes & Transcripts: Record or upload audio/video to get accurate, real-time transcriptions of meetings, lectures, or podcasts.
-AI Mind Map Generator: Convert long notes into clear mind maps to visualize ideas and structure your thoughts.
-AI Grammar Checker: Fix grammar, polish tone, and eliminate redundancy with smart suggestions.
-AI Note Translator: Translate your notes into multiple languages with ease.
-AI Shape Recognition: Perfect rough sketches and diagrams with auto-detected shapes.

*ORGANIZE YOUR NOTES, YOUR WAY*
-Group notes using Nested Collections and Custom Sort
-Lock notes app: Add a passcode or fingerprint to protect sensitive info
-Add tags to categorize and organize ideas across notebooks
-Keep your planner, checklists, and daily notes secure and searchable

*CROSS-DEVICE ACCESS & CLOUD SYNC*
-Write anywhere — your notes sync across devices:
-Android, iOS, macOS, and Web (https://notebook.zoho.com/)
-Use the Web Clipper to save articles and research instantly
-Continue your note taking on any device, anytime

*YOUR PERSONALIZED SMART NOTES APP*
-Choose covers, themes, and note colors
-Use Sketch Card for drawing or formulas
-Use the Video Card to upload recordings and add chapter markers
-Float sticky notes with Picture-in-Picture (PiP)
-View in grid or landscape, and stay distraction-free

*SHARE & COLLABORATE WITH EASE*
-Share notes as PDFs or public links
-Collaborate via email or third-party apps

*BUILT FOR ANDROID — EXCLUSIVE FEATURES*
-Widgets: Create or view notes from your home screen without opening the app.
-Home Screen Shortcuts: Pin your favorite note or notebook directly to the home screen.
-Launcher Shortcuts: Long-press the app icon to quickly create notes or checklists.
-Quick Actions: Instantly open a note or notebook via contextual menus.
-Notification Tray Access: Open or add a note straight from the notification bar.
-Quick Settings Tile: Tap once from Quick Settings to open a new notecard.
-Multi-window Support: Use Notebook alongside other apps for seamless multitasking.
-Open Note in New Window: View a note in a separate window for better focus.
-Picture-in-Picture (PiP): Keep a note floating while using other apps.
-Keyboard Shortcuts: Use Bluetooth or USB keyboards to quickly format or navigate.
-Print Notes: Print your notes using Android’s built-in print framework.

*NOTEBOOK FOR DAILY LIFE*
-Use as your planner, task manager, or goal tracker
-Organize travel plans, events, or grocery checklists
-Maintain a secure digital journal app with a private notebook
-Add reminders to keep track of tasks and ideas
-Write diary with lock — stay secure and personal

Download Zoho Notebook — the smartest way to take notes with AI, organize your thoughts, and stay productive. From sticky notes to daily planners, it's your best note taking app.

Whether it's for class, work, or personal — it's the only note taking, diary, and checklist app you’ll ever need.

title: Zoho Writer - Document Editor
description:
Simple, slick word processing app to write your heart out, bring your friends in and talk it over using comments. Sync docs across devices and access them wherever you go.
 
Writer is carefully designed to create a clean, blank paper-esque writing experience across your smartphone, tablet and computer. And it's free forever!
 
Collaboration.
- Join discussions, even when you're away from your desk. Add your thoughts to documents, reply to friends' comments, or just appreciate them by clicking "like." Work together in real-time, with instant sync across your devices.
 
Create beautiful documents.
- Format your documents. Add images, tables, and more.
 
Writer plays well with others.
- Open and edit your Microsoft Word documents. Take stories off your world by exporting it as a Microsoft Word document, PDF, ODT, HTML, or TXT.
 
Work offline.
- Access and edit your documents without an internet connection.

Automatic backup.
- Forget clicking save, and forget backing up your documents. Your changes are saved as you make them.
 
What's stopping you now? Get started. Write away!

title: Knowunity: AI Study Helper
description:
Knowunity SchoolGPT helps you learn smarter and study confidently.

Study chat with friends about classes and subjects
Scan questions to get step-by-step explanations
Free study notes from top students
Free flashcards and quizzes (including 1.2M AP-style practice questions)
Learn in a supportive, safe space 🫶🏾
Struggling with right angles in geometry or a tricky biology concept? Knowunity SchoolGPT explains topics clearly, offers short summaries, and gives you practice quizzes to check your understanding. From AP classes to everyday homework, get guided help that builds skills—not shortcuts.

Better study habits, clearer explanations, and faster learning—all in one free app. Join 16+ million students improving together.

Highlights
🧑🏼‍🎓 Free Flashcards
Browse flashcards made by students or create your own. You can also generate flashcards with AI to reinforce key concepts.

😌 Study Chat in a Safe Space
Join study groups by subject (geometry, math, study mindset, and more). Ask questions, share tips, and learn together in a positive community.

⚡ Learn Faster with SchoolGPT
Get concept explanations, worked examples, and study guidance from our AI tutor—designed to help you understand and practice.

🤯 Every Subject in Middle and High School
Math, Science, History, Geometry, Biology, and more. Explore top student notes and resources across school topics.

🤖 Guided Homework Support (AI Scanner + SchoolGPT)
Scan a question and get a breakdown with reasoning, steps, and similar practice problems. Learn how to approach and solve, not just what the answer is.

📚 Quizzes (Free)
Test yourself to find strengths and gaps. Use practice questions to prepare for class quizzes and exams.

🧘🏾 Your Study App, Your Community, Your Place

Help Others, Build Your Profile
Upload study notes, quizzes, and flashcards
Earn points, volunteer hours, merch, donations, and letters of recommendation
Lead a community and help thousands of students learn
Key Features
Study notes
Flashcards
Quizzes
Study groups
Guided homework support with AI scanner and chat
AI Features
AI Study Help (SchoolGPT) for explanations and practice
AI Chatbot (SchoolGPT) for questions and study guidance
Essay planning and feedback to improve structure, clarity, and citations
What students say
“It’s like Chegg and Anki, but offers so much more. My new favorite study app!” — Kennedy (18)
“Knowunity has made studying & learning for my classes so much easier.” — Josh (17)

We’re real people, and we care. Message us at 
support-us@knowunity.com
.

TOS: 
https://knowunity.com/legal/tos

title: Voice Notepad - Speech to Text
description:
Discover the power of speech-to-text with Voice Notepad - the fast and efficient note-taking app designed for busy lives. Voice Notepad is a user-friendly, speech-to-text app that enables you to dictate notes, memos, and to-do lists with precision and ease. Save time and effort by speaking your thoughts and ideas into your device, and watch as your words are transcribed in real-time.

Voice Notepad is the ultimate solution for students, professionals, and multitaskers who want to capture ideas and stay organized. Whether you're attending meetings, studying, or simply prefer to speak your thoughts, Voice Notepad makes it effortless to create and manage notes without typing.

Key features:

- Fast and accurate speech-to-text transcription
- Create and organize to-do lists with ease
- Sync your notes and lists across multiple devices seamlessly
- Access your notes from your smartphone, tablet, or computer
- Stay organized and boost productivity

Experience the convenience of cloud-syncing capabilities, ensuring your notes and tasks are always up-to-date across all your devices. Voice Notepad is perfect for anyone who needs to take quick notes and keep track of tasks on the go.

Don't waste time typing out your notes and to-do lists. Download Voice Notepad now and experience the convenience of voice-activated note-taking.

Save time and effort by speaking your thoughts and ideas into your device, and watch as your words are transcribed in real-time.Voice Notepad is the ultimate solution for students, professionals, and multitaskers who want to capture ideas and stay organized. Whether you're attending meetings, studying, or simply prefer to speak your thoughts, Voice Notepad makes it effortless to create and manage notes without typing.Key features:- Fast and accurate speech-to-text transcription- Create and organize to-do lists with ease- Sync your notes and lists across multiple devices seamlessly- Access your notes from your smartphone, tablet, or computer- Stay organized and boost productivityExperience the convenience of cloud-syncing capabilities, ensuring your notes and tasks are always up-to-date across all your devices. Voice Notepad is perfect for anyone who needs to take quick notes and keep track of tasks on the go.Don't waste time typing out your notes and to-do lists. Download Voice Notepad now and experience the convenience of voice-activated note-taking.

title: Summary: AI Text Summarizer
description:
The Summary App allows you to turn any long text or website into a short and simple summary. It lets you break down lengthy documents or web content into easily digestible summaries. Ideal for getting the main points without wading through a sea of words. With our accessible and user-friendly AI-powered tool, you'll turn 'tl;dr' (Too Long; Didn't Read) into 'brief but got it' in no time.

Life's fast-paced. Why spend time skimming excessive text when you can get a snapshot view? With The Summary App, you don't have to. Paste in your text or link, and a get a neat summary. It's great for everything from long-form news articles to detailed research papers.

And guess what? The app is not constrained by language. Choose from multiple languages to summarize your text. The app also lets you pick your summary style. Broken down bullet points? Check. Digestible dialogue? Yep, we got that too. Simple, straightforward paragraphs? Of course. Customize your summary the way you like it.

Key features of The Summary App:

* Powerful Text Summarizer: From elaborate articles to lengthy reports, transform any content into concise summaries.
* Efficient TL;DR Extracts: Get the essence of comprehensive texts in bite-sized 'tl;dr' summaries.
* Versatile Source Inputs: Summarize information directly from a URL or textual content.
* Multilingual Support: Access summaries in multiple languages, bridging the gap in your multilingual text comprehension needs.
* Variety of Summary Styles: Choose your preferred summary style - traditional, list format, dialogue style - you name it!

In short, The Summary App reshapes your reading experience by providing apt, easy-to-understand summaries. It's more than just a text summarizer. It's a time saver, a bridge to foreign content, and your personalized information tool.

Download The Summary App today and pave your way to easier, quicker information absorption!

title: HandyNotes - Notes, Notepad
description:
Looking for a fast, reliable, and easy-to-use note-taking app? Meet HandyNotes – your all-in-one digital notebook for writing notes, creating to-do lists, setting reminders, and organizing your thoughts. Whether you’re managing work tasks, planning personal projects, or saving ideas on the go, HandyNotes is the best notes app to help you stay productive and organized.

Top Features:
📝 Create Notes Instantly – Take quick notes, memos, checklists, or ideas with a clean and distraction-free editor.

📂 Organize Notes with Folders – Keep your notes categorized for easy access and better productivity.

🔁 Note History & Version Control – Easily view and restore previous versions of your notes. Never lose important edits.

🌐 Offline Note-Taking – Write and access your notes anytime, even without an internet connection.

🌓 Light & Dark Mode – Customize your writing experience with theme options.

🔄 Sync Across Devices (optional) – Backup and restore your notes easily for added peace of mind.

Why HandyNotes?
Fast, lightweight, and built with a focus on performance, HandyNotes is perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who needs a free note app that just works.

Download HandyNotes – The Smart Notes App today and experience the easiest way to take, manage, and organize notes!

title: AI Writing Assistant
description:
TextElevate is your comprehensive AI proofreading assistant that elevates your writing to new heights. Analyze your text for plagiarism, detect AI-generated content, correct grammar and spelling errors, and improve overall writing quality.
Key features:
• Plagiarism detection with source identification and rephrasing options
• AI content detection with humanization capabilities
• Grammar and spelling correction with one-click fixes
• Writing quality analysis for readability and style improvement
• History tracking to review past analyses
Choose which analyses to run based on your needs and usage limits. Get detailed, interactive results that highlight specific issues in your text. Premium features include AI-powered fixes like rephrasing plagiarized content or humanizing AI-written text.
Perfect for students, writers, professionals, and anyone who wants to ensure their writing is original, error-free, and polished.
Download TextElevate today and transform your writing with the power of AI!

title: Omni Notes
description:
Open-source note taking application, designed to be lightweight and simple without giving up smart behavior.

Your help in translating the app is welcome. Send me an e-mail If you want to lend a hand !

Current features:
☆ Material Design interface
☆ Basic add, modify, archive, trash and delete notes actions
☆ Share, merge and search notes
☆ Image, audio and generic file attachments
☆ Manage your notes using tags and categories
☆ To-do list
☆ Sketch-note mode
☆ Notes shortcut on home screen
☆ Export/import notes to backup
☆ Google Now integration: just tell "write a note" followed by the content
☆ Multiple widgets, DashClock extension, Android 4.2 lockscreen compatibility
☆ Multilanguage: 30 languages supported: https://crowdin.com/project/omni-notes

Please check https://github.com/federicoiosue/Omni-Notes/issues for all your sent e-mail messages to the support.

title: Journal: Notes, Planner, PDFs
description:
Welcome to Journal: Notes, Planner, Diary - an application designed to help you capture the essential moments of your daily life and manage your activities effectively. With Journal: Notes, Planner, Diary app, you can create and organize your personal journal, notes, notepad and schedule effortlessly. Use it as your daily notebook, where you can record thoughts, emotions, and future plans, seamlessly integrating the convenience of a digital notepad with the structured organization of a traditional notebook.

Why should you choose our application? The application seamlessly blending the functionalities of a journal, diary, and note-taking app, it goes beyond the conventional to offer a personalized planner tailored for your daily needs. Whether you prefer the structure of a traditional physical notebook or the convenience of a digital notepad, Journal: Notes, Planner, Diary app has you covered.  It's the key to bringing order, efficiency, and time-saving solutions into your life.

Key Feature
Stay organized at work, school and life: Integrated with diverse planning and schedule management functionalities. With the ability to quickly and creatively take notes, you can easily capture every idea and information instantly. Personalize your notebook easily. Choose from different themes in this app to keep your notepad organized. 
 Take notes, write documents, sketch ideas: Journal: Notes, Planner, Diary app serves as a traditional physical notebook. You can take notes, brainstorm ideas, and plan on virtual pages just like real ones. Write on a plethora of customizable paper templates, Capture your thoughts using a range of multimedia tools, including pencil, highlighter, text. 
 Import & store PDF documents: You can effortlessly import PDF files, take notes, make direct annotations on the documents within the notebook. You can easily highlight key points, do exercises, and effortlessly export your notes back to PDF format.
Template & sticker collection: Whether you prefer the simplicity of a digital notepad or the structured organization of a physical notebook, this collection has you covered. Including over 1000 adorable stickers and a curated library of +300 unique templates spanning various topics. Make a uniquely expressive reflection of your thoughts and style, whether you're jotting down quick notes on your digital notepad or sketching ideas in your favorite notebook & planner.
Combined with digital calendar:  Users can seamlessly create events, set tasks, and manage their schedules directly within the digital calendar interface. Journal: Notes, Planner, Diary app helps to write notes, journal or organize notepad in the form of a calendar. This integrated functionality offers a comprehensive solution for users to efficiently manage their time and tasks all within a single, user-friendly platform.
Sync all your devices, send & share: Effortlessly synchronize your journal, notepad, planner, and diary across all your devices with our Sync feature.  This ensures that your digital space remains consistent and up-to-date across all your devices. Stay seamlessly connected and access to journal, planner & notepad anytime, anywhere
Smart reminders with link journal to event: You will not miss any events or tasks with smart reminders feature. Journal: Notes, Planner, Diary app enables you to schedule reminders for your notebooks, notepad, journal & planner ensuring you never miss important notes. Stay well-organized notepad. 
Discover a transformative journey with Journal: Notes, Planner, Diary. Where every plan, every moment in your life is elegantly recorded. Download Journal: Notes, Planner, Diary app now to redefine how you write notepad & planner, organize, and thrive in your unique journey, seamlessly integrating the best of both worlds – the tactile experience of a classic notebook and the digital efficiency of a handy notepad.

title: Smart Notes: AI Summary, Quiz
description:
Smart Notes is the study and productivity app that lets you spend less time reading and more time understanding. Upload a lengthy PDF, class hand-out or business report and Smart Notes pulls out the key ideas, lets you chat with the document in plain language, writes quiz questions that mirror real exams and creates flashcards that keep facts fresh.

Key Features
• AI Document Summarizer: Convert dense chapters, research papers and white papers into concise, keyword-rich notes in seconds.
• Document Chat: Ask any question about your uploaded file and get instant answers with cited passages.
• Quiz Generator: Produce multiple-choice questions at different difficulty levels so you can test comprehension right away.
• Flashcard Maker: Build spaced-repetition decks automatically and track recall to boost long-term memory.
• Multi-Format Support: Import PDF, DOC or TXT files directly from local storage.
• Progress Dashboard: See reading coverage, quiz scores and flashcard streaks in one neat view.
• Dark Mode and Accessibility: Eye-friendly interface with screen-reader support for comfortable study sessions.

Perfect For
• High-school and university students who need short lecture notes, realistic practice tests and quick Q&A before exams.
• Graduate researchers who want to skim journal articles faster, ask targeted questions and build flashcards for literature reviews.
• Busy professionals who summarise market reports and technical documents minutes before meetings and quiz themselves on the numbers that matter.
• Language learners who turn reading passages into vocabulary drills, comprehension checks and interactive chat for deeper understanding.
• Lifelong learners and hobbyists who transform manuals, how-to guides and non-fiction books into engaging study material for continuous self-improvement.

Policies You Should Know
End-User License Agreement: https://smartnotes.miadigital.us/eula
Terms of Service: https://smartnotes.miadigital.us/terms
Privacy Policy: https://smartnotes.miadigital.us/privacy-policy

Accuracy Notice
Content created by Smart Notes is generated by artificial intelligence for educational use only. Always double-check critical facts and figures before relying on them.

Download Smart Notes now and watch your reading list turn into actionable knowledge in minutes.

Whether you need to jot down ideas, create to-do lists, or keep track of important tasks, this notes app helps you stay productive and organized. With a user-friendly interface and powerful features, Notepad makes it simple to create, edit, and manage all your notes in one place. Easy to Use Notepad for All Your Needs Notepad lets you create different types of notes – text notes, checklists, and reminders – so you can stay on top of your daily tasks. The simple and clean design makes it easy to organize your notes without any distractions. Save important information, create shopping lists, or write down quick thoughts with just a few taps. Organize and Manage Your Notes Efficiently ・Create and categorize notes easily ・Sort notes by date, title, or priority ・Pin important notes to the top for quick access ・Search through notes instantly with the smart search feature Create To-Do Lists and Stay on Track Stay productive with a built-in to-do list feature. Create tasks, set priorities, and check off completed items to manage your daily schedule effectively. The intuitive checklist format helps you track progress and stay organized. Mark Tasks as Done Easily mark tasks as done when completed. Stay focused and track your progress by checking off items on your to-do list. Create alerts for important notes and to-do lists so you never miss a task or event. Keep your life organized with a powerful yet simple notes app designed to boost your productivity.

title: Quick & Smart Notebook Pro
description:
Quick & Smart Notebook – Offline, Secure, and Fast Note-Taking App

Quick & Smart Notebook is a simple, privacy-focused note-taking app that helps you capture ideas, stay organized, and access your notes anytime. The app works completely offline, so your data always stays on your device. It’s built for students, professionals, and anyone who prefers a clean, secure, and distraction-free workspace.

🔒 Privacy and Security

• Works fully offline
• No tracking, no ads
• Lock sensitive notes with fingerprint, face unlock, or PIN
• Backup and restore with easy import and export options

📁 Smart Note Organization

• Create folders and subfolders
• Use color labels for quick identification
• Advanced label filters: inclusive, exclusive, and strict
• Pin important notes
• Archive old notes without deleting them
• Note icons available for every title and category

⚡ Powerful Productivity Features

• Global and in-note search
• Exact-time reminders
• Smooth reading mode with paging
• Undo and redo history
• Merge multiple notes
• Quick Note from any app via share menu
• Duplicate or copy notes between folders
• Word count while typing
• Track created and last-opened time

🎨 Personalization

• Light, Dark, and Black themes
• Ten custom app icons
• Choose Nunito or Monospace fonts
• List and grid view options
• Customizable sorting modes
• Remember scroll position and cursor placement

🔧 Tools for Faster Work

• Home screen widgets for quick access
• Long-press shortcuts to create notes and folders
• Quick Settings tile for instant note creation
• Multi-selection for bulk actions
• Recent Notes view
• View all notes with upcoming reminders in one place

🌍 Made for Everyone

• Supports 10+ languages
• No account or signup needed
• Clean Material Design interface
• Lightweight and fast performance

✨ More Helpful Options

• Reading Mode settings: DND, brightness, keep screen on, full screen
• Share notes as text to any app
• Choose default mode when opening notes (Editor or Reading)

title: GEO Pro Notebook  -Note Taking
description: GEO PRO Notebook Create Text , Images And Voice Notes No Ads Privacy Friendly: This app doesn't collect any user data or connect to anything on the user's device (contacts etc). It doesn't even need an internet connection. It is a wholly contained app using only the files contained within it. Why was this app created?: Sometimes it is hard to remember required things in our daily life. This is the reason why we created this app, so that you don't go off track and keep forgetting. This app doesn't collect any user data or connect to anything on the user's device (contacts etc).It doesn't even need an internet connection. App Features: 1.Easy To Use 2.No Ads 3.Auto Save Notes 4.No Need Internet 5.You can create voice notes by recording audio 6.You can even add pictures and videos in your notes 7.You can also provide tags to your notes. 8.Convert your notes to a list. 9.Insert your codes in notes 10.Hide your notes. 11.Set reminders for your notes 12.You can duplicate your notes 13.You can disable markdown. 14.Attach files like pdf files (.pdf), Microsoft document files and many other files. 15.Pin and unpin your notes, whenever needed. Pinning a note allows you to prioritise your tasks on the basis of its importance. You will find the pin icon at the top right corner of the app. 16.Recycle Bin [for recovering the deleted notes] 17.Create multiple notebooks with colorful book covers 18.Customizable cover, title, number of pages and page style for every notebook 19.Dark And Light Mode 20.Many More Features Text Formatting: Formatting your text as bold, italics, underline, strike through, indent, outdent. Adding hyperlinks, data tablets, lists, quotations and codes to your notes. Organize Notes: 1.Add audios to your notes. 2.Add pictures and videos in your notes. 3.Organize various notes in notebooks. 4.Group notes together to create a bunch while separating it from others. 5.Keep your work organized, to make sure you are on track. Sort your notes: 1.On the basis of title in ascending or descending order. 2.On the basis of date created in ascending or descending order. 3.On the basis of date modified in ascending and descending order. 4.Reorder your notes within a notebook. 5.Move or copy your notes within your notebook. 6.Link related notes to one another. 7.You can change the visibility of your notes, according to your wish. 8.Organize your notes using tags. 9.Search your notes within the notebook. 10.Archive your notes. --------- All features are packed in just less than 6 MB (for less the download time and minimum use of phone storage memory)

Privacy Friendly:
This app doesn't collect any user data or connect to anything on the user's device (contacts etc). It doesn't even need an internet connection. It is a wholly contained app using only the files contained within it.

Sometimes it is hard to remember required things in our daily life. This is the reason why we created this app, so that you don't go off track and keep forgetting.

title: Smart Notes
description:
Smart Notes is your lightweight, easy-to-use note-taking app designed to help you capture ideas, lists, and reminders effortlessly. Whether it's a sudden thought, a to-do list, or meeting notes, Smart Notes keeps everything organized and secure on your device.

Key Features:

📝 Simple & Fast – Create and edit notes instantly.

🔒 Secure & Private – Notes are stored locally; you control your data.

☁️ Optional Cloud Backup – Sync to Google Drive (if enabled).

🎨 Clean Interface – Minimal design for distraction-free writing.

📂 Organized Notes – Search and sort notes with ease.

🌓 Light & Dark Modes – Choose your preferred theme.

Why Choose Smart Notes?

100% privacy-focused: Your notes stay on your device unless you choose to back them up.

Works offline, so your notes are always accessible.

Whether you’re writing a quick idea, managing a shopping list, or keeping a personal journal, Smart Notes is here to make note-taking simple, secure, and enjoyable.

title: Voice Notes - Speech to text
description:
Tired of typing messages? Create a voice note in Voice Notes! The app will quickly convert speech to text and save the result.

Using Voice Notes you can easily write by voice and share notes with friends and family in all popular messengers and social networks.

Voice Notes will help you if you work with texts a lot. This is a handy way to quickly dictate a note so you don't forget important thoughts.

The smart voice recognition algorithm accurately converts speech to text and provides recognition options for you to choose from. Also, after voice input, you can always edit the note manually.

You don't need the Internet to write by voice. Just download the language packages and use the app offline. Detailed information on how to do this is in the app settings.

Functions:

      - Text in the app is saved automatically
      - Selecting the recognition language
      - Selecting the font size for the list and individual notes
      - Detailed note information: number of words and characters
      - Convenient text editing and note sharing
      - Easy search and organization of notes
      - Special commands for voice input: for example, say "dot" and the character "." will be displayed in the note
      - Simple design and dark theme

To convert speech to text, Voice Notes uses Google's speech recognition service. Therefore, the Google app must be installed for voice input to work.

title: Note AI: Voice AI Transcribe
description:
Note AI: Capture, organize, and revisit every key idea with AI. Note AI provides intelligent recording and efficient organization, helping you clearly and easily capture and review important moments from lectures, meetings, and voice memos.

Still distracted by hurried note-taking? Note AI redefines the recording experience with artificial intelligence, integrating meeting recording, speech-to-text, text-to-speech, content analysis, and AI collaboration. Whether it's a class, a meeting, or a flash of inspiration, all important content is automatically organized into a high-value knowledge base.

🎧Text-to-Speech 
Not only can you "see," you can "hear." Note AI lets you turn notes, summaries, and documents into natural, flowing audio.
-One-click broadcast: Supports direct audio conversion of TXT, PDF, Word, images, scanned documents, and more.
-Personalized listening: Adjust the speed and volume to suit your learning and thinking pace.
-Listen anytime, anywhere: Whether commuting, exercising, doing chores, or reviewing before bed, save time and still learn.

🔊Smart Recording and Transcription
-Continuous background recording: Remains stable even when switching apps or locking the screen, allowing you to focus on the current conversation.
-Speech-to-text: Instantly converts audio into viewable text.
-Long-duration recording: Supports recording lectures up to two hours long and marathon meetings.
-Customizable listening experience: Adjust the speaking speed to match your comprehension rate, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.
-Speaker Recognition: Supports identifying and tracking multiple speakers.
-Auto-capture slides: Click on the transcript to return to the corresponding audio point.
-Share recordings: Share the AI-generated summary of the recorded content with colleagues or classmates with one click.

📝AI Smart Summarization
Upload an audio, PDF, Word, or TXT file, and AI will automatically analyze the content to generate summaries, key points, and to-do lists with one click.
-Summary: Condensate the content to quickly grasp the core information.
-Action Points: Automatically extract to-do items or action suggestions to drive follow-up.
-Key Topics: Summarize key topics and tags. 
- Translation: AI-generated summaries support multi-language translation.

💬 AI Chat Interaction
Communicate with your notes like you're talking to an assistant: Ask questions about uploaded files, and AI will provide accurate answers based on the context.

🎯Who needs Note AI?
▸ Students: Record lectures → Automatically generate review notes with key points
▸ Professionals: Record lengthy meetings → Generate summaries and to-do lists
▸ Content creators: Record interviews and spoken thoughts → Output structured documents with one click
▸ Multitasker: Listen and learn anytime, anywhere → Hands-free, double the efficiency

🚀 Note AI – Capture + Transcribe + Summarize + Listen
From recording to transcription, from summarizing to broadcasting, Note AI is a comprehensive AI assistant that helps you capture every crucial moment, easily organize massive amounts of content, efficiently review, and gain in-depth understanding.
Say goodbye to mechanical note-taking and let AI process information for you, freeing up your brain to focus on truly important creation and thinking.

If you have any questions, please contact us at ainotefeedback@outlook.com. We're always happy to help.

* Privacy Policy: https://aichat.emoji-keyboard.com/privacy.html
* Terms of Service: https://aichat.emoji-keyboard.com/useragreement.html
* Community Guidelines: https://aichat.emoji-keyboard.com/community-guidelines.html

title: MyDocs : Documents Organizer
description: Take all your important documents with you wherever you go (invoices, personal documents, prescriptions, bank statement, business card, contracts...). You don’t have to look through a bunch of papers to find a document or important information. Just take pictures of your document with camera / scan and keep them on your phone in a well-organized way. This makes it possible to store, organize, archive, search documents, and retrieve them quickly even if you lose the original document. Some Use Cases : • Keeping your invoices with you to consult them without having to search too much. The same can be applied to water bills, electricity bills, business cards... • Keeping your contracts, or the contracts of your customers, and the tasks to be done for them in the form of a checklist. • Keeping your personal documents with you, like ID card, Passport, Visa in case you need them. • Keeping your medical prescriptions or medications names so you don't forget or lose them. • Keeping supermarket tickets and receipts to remember purchases and the price of each item. • Taking photos of products, their prices, their models, and which seller you bought them from. • You can always create your own categories specific to your needs. MyDocs allows you to : • Add / Scan documents from the camera, from the gallery, and even PDF and text files. • Organize your documents according to several predefined categories: Invoice, Contract, Bank, Personal (e.g. identity card, etc.), Tickets (e.g. supermarket receipts...), Medicines (or prescriptions...), business card, book, water, electricity, gas bill, Product... • You can Create your own categories that suit your needs. • Group the documents of a category by personalized fields (for example by name of customer, supplier...) • Add additional informations for each document, to easily find it with the search form. You can also mark a document with a color. • Crop and correct distorted document photos/scans and their perspective. • Display the list of documents in "Normal Mode" (with all details), "Compact Mode" or "Grid Mode" (like a gallery). • Bookmark the most important documents, to find them even faster in "Bookmarks". • Assign tasks for each document in the form of a check-list (To-Do List). • Share your documents via WhatsApp or by email… • Security: You can enable PIN Code and fingerprint authentication so that you are the only one who can access the application and see your documents. • Sync & Backup: You can manually sync your device data with your Google Drive account or from a backup on your device or from the memory card, to retrieve them when you change or reset your phone, or to synchronize your documents between multiple devices. Confidentiality note : • All your documents are stored only on your device, and on your own Google Drive account if you want to make a synchronization/backup manually.

• Keeping your invoices with you to consult them without having to search too much. The same can be applied to water bills, electricity bills, business cards...

• You can always create your own categories specific to your needs.

• Add / Scan documents from the camera, from the gallery, and even PDF and text files.

title: iRecord: Transcribe Voice Note
description:
Netease Youdao AI supported: Champion of INTERSPEECH 2021 - International Automatic Speech Recognition Challenge

iRecord: High-quality Recorder with Voice Transcription.

What You Can Do With iRecord:
* Record the voice from interviews, meetings, and lectures with high quality.
* Transcribe the recordings into text with high accuracy.
* Export both recordings and transcripts into a couple of formats like Word, and PDF.
* Share the recordings and transcripts via What's App, Messenger, etc.

Why You Choose iRecord:
* High-quality voice recordings even in noisy situations or from a distance.
* High-accuracy transcriptions with global advanced AI technique. We won the championship of the International Automatic Speech Recognition Challenge in 2021.
* Friendly price: 180 minutes FREE recording time and 4 cents per hour with the VIP version which is only 1/2 the price of most other service providers.
* More advanced features in the future. Our team will update more useful functions to help you record and manage the recordings & transcripts.

Main Features:
* Live transcription: record and take meeting notes for you in real-time with high accuracy.
* Import & Export: import from any apps, transcribe and export transcripts into different formats.
* AI editor: automatically capitalize, punctuate, and break paragraphs.
* Search & Playback: search any words in audio, playback at an adjustable speed.
* Multi-scenes: supercharge your notes with Netease Youdao AI for all your meetings, interviews, lectures, and everyday voice conversations.

71 Languages Supported:
We will stand with our users from all over the world and continually provide the most advanced service to make it easier to record every important moment of your daily life. The languages supported are as below.

English, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic, German, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Bulgarian, Catalan, Czech, Danish, Greek, Finnish, Hebrew, Hindi, Croatian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Lithuanian, Latvian, Norwegian Bokmål, Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Serbian, Swedish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Amharic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Estonian, Basque, Persian, Filipino, Galician, Gujarati, Armenian, Icelandic, Javanese, Georgian, Khmer, Kannada, Lao, Macedonian, Malayalam, Mongolian, Marathi, Malay, Burmese, Nepali, Punjabi, Sinhala, Albanian, Sundanese, Swahili, Tamil, Telugu, Urdu, Uzbek, Cantonese, Zulu.

Security and Privacy Policy:
We take it seriously to your privacy and data security. Your data is confidential and will not be transferred to third parties for any reason. You have full control to delete your data from your account anytime.

Privacy Policy: https://inter.youdao.com/cloudfront/voicerecorder-youdao/privacy.html 
Terms of Services: https://inter.youdao.com/cloudfront/voicerecorder-youdao/terms.html

title: Google Gemini
description:
Supercharge your creativity and productivity with Gemini, your AI assistant from Google.

Gemini gives you direct access to Google’s best family of AI models on your phone so you can:

- Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics, and rehearse for important moments. Share your camera or screen in Gemini Live conversations to talk with Gemini about anything you see. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
- Bring your ideas to life with Canvas. From prompt to prototype, create apps, games, web pages, infographics, audio overviews and more.
- Connect with your favorite Google apps like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail, and more
- Study smarter and explore any topic with quiz and flashcard creation, interactive visuals, and real-world examples
- Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to anytime, anywhere
- Create and edit stunning images from just a few words
- Plan trips better and faster
- Get summaries, deep dives, and source links, all in one place
- Brainstorm new ideas, or improve existing ones

🍌 Try Nano Banana image generation and editing built on 2.5 Flash, and with Nano Banana Pro built on 3 Pro, create mockups by blending images, design posters with sharp text, and effortlessly build diagrams. Tap “Create Image” on the home screen and select “Thinking” from the model menu to use text and images to describe what you'd like to generate.

Get even more out of your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan, helping you tackle complex tasks and projects. Enjoy industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and higher access to our most capable model 3 Pro, Deep Research on 3 Pro and video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast. 

Gemini in Google AI Pro includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Pro subscription. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get the best of Gemini app by upgrading to the Ultra plan–unlock the highest level of access to the best of Google AI and exclusive features. Get the highest access to Google’s most powerful model, like 3 Pro, features like video generation with Veo 3.1, Deep Research on 3 Pro, and unlock Gemini 3 Deep Think. You’ll also get early access to try our newest AI innovations as they become available, including Agent Mode.

Gemini in Google AI Ultra includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Ultra subscription. Google AI Ultra for Business is available as an add-on to Google Workspace customers. Learn more: https://support.google.com/a/answer/16345165

If you opt in to the Gemini app, it will replace your Google Assistant as the primary assistant on the phone. You can switch back to Google Assistant in settings.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
https://support.google.com/gemini?p=privacy_notice
